atk-s0302a:6_11: Na hi bhagavā ayutte dese kāle ca dhammaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0302a:6_18: bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhūpagatoti bhikkhū”tiādinā nayena vacanattho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:6_34: Tena ca tesaṃ bhikkhanasīlatādiguṇayogasiddhena vacanena hīnādhikajanasevitavuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatadīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti.
atk-s0302a:6_35: “Bhikkhavo”ti iminā ca karuṇāvipphārasommahadayanayananipātapubbaṅgamena vacanena te attano abhimukhe
atk-s0302a:6_36: karonto teneva kathetukamyatādīpakena nesaṃ vacanena sotukamyataṃ janeti,
atk-s0302a:6_37: teneva ca sambodhanatthena sādhukaṃ manasikārepi niyojeti.
atk-s0302a:7_0: Aparesupi devamanussesu vijjamānesu kasmā bhikkhūyeva āmantesīti ce?
atk-s0302a:7_4: seṭṭhā anagāriyabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvā satthucariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanapaṭiggāhakattā ca,
atk-s0302a:7_7: Apica te dhammadesanāya bhājanaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattisabbhāvato.
atk-s0302a:7_8: Visesato ca ekacce bhikkhūyeva sandhāya ayaṃ desanāpīti evaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0302a:8_0: Kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā dhammaṃ desento paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū āmantesi,
atk-s0302a:8_3: Bhikkhū aññaṃ cintentāpi vikkhittacittāpi dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāpi kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontāpi nisinnā honti.
atk-s0302a:8_4: Te anāmantetvā dhamme desiyamāne “ayaṃ desanā kiṃnidānā kiṃpaccayā katamāya aṭṭhuppattiyā desitā”ti sallakkhetuṃ asakkontā duggahitaṃ vā gaṇheyyuṃ,
atk-s0302a:8_6: tena nesaṃ satijananatthaṃ bhagavā paṭhamaṃ āmantetvā pacchā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0302a:9_8: Te bhikkhūti ye bhagavā āmantesi, te.
atk-s0302a:9_10: abhimukhā hutvā suṇiṃsu sampaṭicchiṃsu paṭiggahesunti attho.
atk-s0302a:9_12: bhagavā etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ sakalasuttaṃ avoca.
atk-s0302a:9_13: Ettāvatā yaṃ āyasmatā ānandena atthabyañjanasampannassa buddhānaṃ desanāñāṇagambhīrabhāvasaṃsūcakassa
atk-s0302a:9_14: imassa suttassa sukhāvagāhaṇatthaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:10_0: Idāni paṭiccasamuppādaṃ votiādinā nayena bhagavatā nikkhittassa suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto.
atk-s0302a:10_1: Sā panesā suttavaṇṇanā yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0302a:10_8: Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva katheti,
atk-s0302a:11_0: Yāni pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā.
atk-s0302a:11_1: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ nijjhānakkhamaṃ
atk-s0302a:11_2: manaṃ abhinīhāraṃ bujjhanabhāvañca apekkhitvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni,
atk-s0302a:12_0: Bhagavantaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā catasso parisā cattāro vaṇṇā nāgā supaṇṇā gandhabbā asurā yakkhā mahārājāno
atk-s0302a:12_1: tāvatiṃsādayo devā mahābrahmāti evamādayo “bojjhaṅgā bojjhaṅgāti, bhante,
atk-s0302a:12_7: kiṃsūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena pañhaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0302a:12_8: Evaṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā yāni kathitāni bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni,
atk-s0302a:13_0: Yāni pana tāni uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni,
atk-s0302a:13_3: Cūḷasīhanādasuttaṃ puttamaṃsūpamaṃ dārukkhandhūpamaṃ aggikkhandhūpamaṃ pheṇapiṇḍūpamaṃ pāricchattakūpamanti evamādīni,
atk-s0302a:14_0: Evametesu catūsu nikkhepesu imassa paṭiccasamuppādasuttassa parajjhāsayo nikkhepo.
atk-s0302a:14_4: Cattāro hi puggalā ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti.
atk-s0302a:14_5: Tattha yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0302a:14_7: Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0302a:14_9: Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto,
atk-s0302a:14_16: bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0302a:14_18: Iti imesu catūsu puggalesu ugghaṭitaññūpuggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena idaṃ suttaṃ nikkhittaṃ.
atk-s0302a:15_0: Tadā kira pañcasatā janapadavāsikā bhikkhū sabbeva ekacarā dvicarā ticarā catucarā pañcacarā sabhāgavuttino
atk-s0302a:15_1: dhutaṅgadharā āraddhavīriyā yuttayogā vipassakā saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ paccayākāradesanaṃ patthayamānā
atk-s0302a:15_3: rattakambalasāṇiyā parikkhipamānā viya desanaṃ paccāsīsamānā parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:15_4: Tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasena bhagavā idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:15_5: Yathā hi cheko cittakāro aparikammakatabhittiṃ labhitvā,
atk-s0302a:15_12: vaṭṭikaṃ vā tūlikaṃ vā ādāya rūpameva samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0302a:15_13: evameva bhagavā akatābhinivesaṃ ādikammikakulaputtaṃ labhitvā nāssa āditova arahattapadaṭṭhānaṃ saṇhaṃ
atk-s0302a:15_15: sīlasamādhikammassakatādiṭṭhisampadāya pana yojento pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ tāva ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:16_5: sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ bhavissati diṭṭhi ca ujukā.
atk-s0302a:16_7: sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne tividhena bhāveyyāsi.
atk-s0302a:16_10: ajjhattaṃ vā kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
atk-s0302a:16_13: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
atk-s0302a:16_15: sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṃ tividhena bhāvessasi,
atk-s0302a:16_17: yā ratti vā divaso vā āgamissati,
atk-s0302a:17_1: arahattapadaṭṭhānaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ vipassanālakkhaṇaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:18_0: Parisuddhasīlaṃ pana āraddhavīriyaṃ yuttayogaṃ vipassakaṃ labhitvā,
atk-s0302a:18_2: ujukameva pana arahattapadaṭṭhānaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ vipassanālakkhaṇaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:18_3: Ime pañcasatā bhikkhū pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ parisodhetvā ṭhitā sudhantasuvaṇṇasadisā suparimajjitamaṇikkhandhasannibhā,
atk-s0302a:18_5: Iti tassāgamanatthāya satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ apekkhamāno idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:19_1: Paccayākāro hi aññamaññaṃ paṭicca sahite dhamme uppādeti.
atk-s0302a:20_6: “Kacci pana vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā”tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati.
atk-s0302a:20_21: Taṃ suṇāthāti taṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ taṃ desanaṃ mayā vuccamānaṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0302a:21_0: Sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti ettha pana sādhukaṃ sādhūti ekatthametaṃ.
atk-s0302a:21_6: bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu hi āyācane dissati. “Sādhu,
atk-s0302a:21_7: bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane.
atk-s0302a:24_1: sādhukaṃ suṇāhī”tiādīsu sādhukasaddoyeva daḷhīkamme āṇattiyantipi vuccati.
atk-s0302a:24_2: Idha panāyaṃ ettheva daḷhīkamme āṇattiyā ca attho veditabbo,
atk-s0302a:24_6: āṇattiatthena “mama āṇattiyā suṇātha” sundaratthena “sundaramimaṃ bhaddakaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāthā”ti etaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:25_1: Sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti manasikāre daḷhīkammaniyojanena manindriyavikkhepanivāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:25_11: “yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dhammagambhīro ca desanāgambhīro ca,
atk-s0302a:25_14: tasmā sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:25_16: “Taṃ suṇāthā”ti ettha paṭiññātaṃ desanaṃ saṃkhittatova na desessāmi,
atk-s0302a:25_17: apica kho vitthāratopi naṃ bhāsissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:28_1: bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:29_7: Pañcavidhā hi pucchā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā vimaticchedanāpucchā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchāti,
atk-s0302a:30_1: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:30_2: Tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0302a:31_1: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:31_2: So aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0302a:33_4: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti, aniccaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0302a:33_5: Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vāti, dukkhaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0302a:35_0: Tattha buddhānaṃ purimā tisso pucchā natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:35_1: Buddhānañhi tīsu addhāsu kiñci saṅkhataṃ addhāvimuttaṃ vā asaṅkhataṃ adiṭṭhaṃ ajotitaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:35_3: Yaṃ pana bhagavatā attano ñāṇena paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:35_4: tassa aññena samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā saddhiṃ saṃsandanakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0302a:35_6: Yasmā panesa akathaṃkathī tiṇṇavicikiccho sabbadhammesu vihatasaṃsayo.
atk-s0302a:35_8: Itarā pana dve pucchā bhagavato atthi.
atk-s0302a:36_0: Idāni tāva pucchāya puṭṭhaṃ paccayākāraṃ vibhajanto avijjāpaccayā,
atk-s0302a:36_3: Ettha ca yathā nāma “pitaraṃ kathessāmī”ti āraddho “tissassa pitā soṇassa pitā”ti paṭhamataraṃ puttampi katheti,
atk-s0302a:36_4: evameva bhagavā paccayaṃ kathetuṃ āraddho “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccaye
atk-s0302a:36_8: desessāmi paṭiccasamuppanne ca dhamme”ti ubhayaṃ ārabhitvā ubhayampi kathesi.
atk-s0302a:36_9: Idāni avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādīsu pana avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo.
atk-s0302a:36_10: Tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantīti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:36_12: vitthārena pana sabbākārasampannā anulomapaṭiccasamuppādakathā visuddhimagge kathitā,
atk-s0302a:37_0: Paṭilomakathāyaṃ pana avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya tu eva.
atk-s0302a:37_3: Evaṃnirodhānaṃ pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā viññāṇādīnañca nirodhā nāmarūpādīni niruddhāniyeva hontīti dassetuṃ
atk-s0302a:37_5: evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti āha.
atk-s0302a:37_11: Iti bhagavā anulomato dvādasahi padehi vaṭṭakathaṃ kathetvā tameva vaṭṭaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā paṭilomato dvādasahi
atk-s0302a:37_12: padehi vivaṭṭaṃ kathento arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:37_13: Desanāpariyosāne te pañcasatā āraddhavipassakā ugghaṭitaññūpuggalā sūriyarasmisamphuṭṭhāni paripākagatāni
atk-s0302a:37_14: padumāni viya saccāni bujjhitvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:38_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena sakalasuttaṃ bhagavā avoca.
atk-s0302a:38_1: Attamanā te bhikkhūti tuṭṭhacittā te pañcasatā khīṇāsavā bhikkhū.
atk-s0302a:38_2: Bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti karavīkarutamañjunā kaṇṇasukhena paṇḍitajanahadayānaṃ amatābhisekasadisena
atk-s0302a:43_5: Imasmiñca pana sutte catasso vallihārakapurisūpamā vattabbā,
atk-s0302a:43_7: Yathā hi vallihārako puriso valliyā aggaṃ disvā tadanusārena mūlaṃ pariyesanto taṃ disvā valliṃ mūle chetvā ādāya kamme upaneyya,
atk-s0302a:43_8: evaṃ bhagavā vitthāradesanaṃ desento paṭiccasamuppādassa aggabhūtā jarāmaraṇā paṭṭhāya yāva mūlabhūtaṃ avijjāpadaṃ,
atk-s0302a:43_9: tāva desanaṃ āharitvā puna vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ desento niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:44_1: jarāmaraṇaniddese tāva tesaṃ tesanti ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddesoti viññātabbo.
atk-s0302a:44_3: yā somadattassāti evañhi divasampi kathentassa neva sattā pariyādānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:44_4: Imehi pana dvīhi padehi na koci satto apariyādinno hoti.
atk-s0302a:44_7: Tamhi tamhīti ayaṃ gatijātivasena anekesaṃ sattanikāyānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso.
atk-s0302a:44_13: Ayañhi jarāti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā,
atk-s0302a:44_19: Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ milāpetvā tacavalibhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā.
atk-s0302a:44_20: Tenassā ime khaṇḍiccantiādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā.
atk-s0302a:44_21: Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā dassitā.
atk-s0302a:44_22: Yatheva hi udakassa vā vātassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃbhaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0302a:44_23: na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni,
atk-s0302a:44_24: evameva jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo,
atk-s0302a:44_25: cakkhuṃ ummīletvāpi gayhati na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarā.
atk-s0302a:45_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya āyukkhaya-
atk-s0302a:45_4: Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati,
atk-s0302a:45_6: Yasmā ca daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni
atk-s0302a:45_8: oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti,
atk-s0302a:46_0: Sā panāyaṃ evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0302a:46_1: Tattha dantādīsu khaṇḍādibhāvadassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma,
atk-s0302a:46_2: arūpadhammesu pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma.
atk-s0302a:46_5: taṃ cakkhunā disvā manodvārena cintetvā “ime dantā jarāya pahaṭā”ti jaraṃ jānāti udakaṭṭhāne baddhāni
atk-s0302a:46_6: gosīsādīni oloketvā heṭṭhā udakassa atthibhāvaṃ jānanaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:46_7: Puna avīci savīcīti evampi duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0302a:46_9: pavāḷacandasūriyādīnaṃ viya mandadasakādīsu pāṇīnaṃ viya ca pupphaphalapallavādīsu ca apāṇīnaṃ viya antarantarā
atk-s0302a:46_12: Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā savīcijarā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:47_0: Ito paraṃ tesaṃ tesantiādi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:47_1: Cuti cavanatātiādīsu pana cutīti cavanakavasena vuccati,
atk-s0302a:47_5: Antaradhānanti ghaṭasseva bhinnassa bhinnānaṃ cutikkhandhānaṃ yena kenaci pariyāyena ṭhānābhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:48_10: Atha vā yasmā cātumahārājikādīsu khandhā bhijjanteva,
atk-s0302a:48_14: Ettha ca kaḷevarassa nikkhepakāraṇato maraṇaṃ “kaḷevarassa nikkhepo”ti vuttanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:48_17: bhikkhaveti idaṃ ubhayampi ekato katvā jarāmaraṇanti kathīyati.
atk-s0302a:49_6: Te hi aṇḍakosañca vatthikosañca okkamantā pavisantā viya paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0302a:50_1: Khandhāyeva hi paramatthato pātubhavanti, na satto.
atk-s0302a:50_6: Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra uppajjamānāyatanavasena saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:50_8: Pātubhavantāneva hi tāni paṭiladdhāni nāma honti.
atk-s0302a:50_11: jātīti iminā padena vohārato paramatthato ca desitāya jātiyā nigamanaṃ karotīti.
atk-s0302a:51_0: Bhavaniddese kāmabhavoti kammabhavo ca upapattibhavo ca.
atk-s0302a:51_2: Tañhi tattha upapattibhavassa kāraṇattā “sukho buddhānaṃ uppādo dukkho pāpassa uccayo”tiādīni viya phalavohārena bhavoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:51_3: Upapattibhavo nāma tena kammena nibbattaṃ upādiṇṇakkhandhapañcakaṃ.
atk-s0302a:51_4: Tañhi tattha bhavatīti katvā bhavoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:51_5: Sabbathāpi idaṃ kammañca upapattiñca ubhayampetamidha “kāmabhavo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:52_4: Daḷhattho hi ettha upasaddo upāyāsaupakaṭṭhādīsu viya.
atk-s0302a:53_0: Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:53_5: “sassato attā ca loko ca idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”ntiādi.
atk-s0302a:54_3: Gosīlagovatādīni hi “evaṃ suddhī”ti abhinivesato sayameva upādānānīti.
atk-s0302a:54_7: Ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sīlena suddhī”ti vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:55_4: Attavādamattameva vā attāti upādiyanti etenāti attavādupādānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:55_9: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:56_1: dhammataṇhāti etaṃ cakkhudvārādīsu javanavīthiyā pavattāya taṇhāya “seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputto”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0302a:56_5: Sā kāmarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ assādentī pavattamānā kāmataṇhā,
atk-s0302a:56_6: sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassata”nti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā bhavataṇhā,
atk-s0302a:56_7: ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ ucchijjati vinassati pecca na bhavatī”ti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā
atk-s0302a:56_10: tathā saddataṇhādayopīti evaṃ tāni aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni honti.
atk-s0302a:56_15: paccuppannāni chattiṃsāti evaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni honti.
atk-s0302a:56_17: itthasmīti hotī”ti vā evamādīni ajjhattikarūpādinissitāni aṭṭhārasa,
atk-s0302a:56_19: iminā itthasmīti hotī”ti vā evamādīni bāhirarūpādinissitāni aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa,
atk-s0302a:56_22: paccuppannāni chattiṃsāti evampi aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni honti.
atk-s0302a:56_23: Puna saṅgahe kariyamāne rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu chaḷeva taṇhākāyā tissoyeva kāmataṇhādayo hontīti. Evaṃ –
atk-s0302a:59_4: atthi abyākatā”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge āgatattā cakkhudvārādīsu pavattānaṃ kusalākusalābyākatavedanānaṃ “sāriputto
atk-s0302a:59_5: mantāṇiputto”ti evamādīsu mātito nāmaṃ viya mātisadisato vatthuto nāmaṃ.
atk-s0302a:59_12: tisso manoviññāṇadhātuyoti etāhi sampayuttavasena vedanā veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:60_3: kāyasamphassoti ettāvatā ca kusalākusalavipākā pañcavatthukā dasa phassā vuttā honti.
atk-s0302a:61_1: taṃ visuddhimagge khandhaniddese ceva āyatananiddese ca vuttameva.
atk-s0302a:62_6: ime pana tayo sabbadubbalesupi cittesu santi,
atk-s0302a:62_8: Cattāro ca mahābhūtāti ettha cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0302a:62_10: Yena pana kāraṇena tāni mahābhūtānīti vuccanti,
atk-s0302a:62_13: Catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti ettha pana catunnanti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:62_20: catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ samūhaṃ upādāya vattamānaṃ rūpanti ettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:62_21: Evaṃ sabbathāpi yāni ca cattāri pathavīādīni mahābhūtāni,
atk-s0302a:62_22: yañca catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vattamānaṃ cakkhāyatanādibhedena abhidhammapāḷiyameva vuttaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0302a:64_5: vacīdvāre vacanabhedavasena pavattānaṃ vīsatiyā eva vacīsañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:64_7: kāyavacīdvāre copanaṃ akatvā raho nisīditvā cintentassa pavattānaṃ lokiyakusalākusalavasena ekūnatiṃsamanosañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:65_3: Tattha catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhe aññāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ antogadhato vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca.
atk-s0302a:65_4: Tathā hi taṃ dukkhasaccapariyāpannattā dukkhe antogadhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:65_7: dukkhasaccaṃ etaṃ paṭicchādeti tassa yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhanivāraṇena ñāṇappavattiyā cettha appadānena.
atk-s0302a:66_0: Dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṃ tīhi kāraṇehi veditabbaṃ vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca.
atk-s0302a:66_1: Nirodhe paṭipadāya ca aññāṇaṃ ekeneva kāraṇena veditabbaṃ paṭicchādanato.
atk-s0302a:66_2: Nirodhapaṭipadānañhi paṭicchādakameva aññāṇaṃ tesaṃ yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhanivāraṇena tesu ca ñāṇappavattiyā appadānena.
atk-s0302a:66_3: Na pana taṃ tattha antogadhaṃ tasmiṃ saccadvaye apariyāpannattā,
atk-s0302a:66_4: na tassa taṃ saccadvayaṃ vatthu asahajātattā,
atk-s0302a:66_9: Purimaṃ pana vacanīyattena sabhāvalakkhaṇassa duddasattā gambhīraṃ,
atk-s0302a:67_0: Apica “dukkhe”ti ettāvatā saṅgahato vatthuto ārammaṇato kiccato ca avijjā dīpitā.
atk-s0302a:67_3: Avisesato pana “aññāṇa”nti etena sabhāvato niddiṭṭhāti ñātabbā.
atk-s0302a:68_4: Apicettha sabbeheva tehi nirodhapadehi nibbānaṃ desitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:68_5: Nibbānañhi āgamma te te dhammā nirujjhanti,
atk-s0302a:68_6: tasmā taṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ nirodhoti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:68_7: Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte dvādasahi padehi vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ desento arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:68_8: Desanāpariyosāne vuttanayeneva pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0302a:71_2: Nanu ca avijjāpaccayā puññābhisaṅkhāropi atthi āneñjābhisaṅkhāropi,
atk-s0302a:71_5: Yañhi kiñci bhavattayasaṅkhātaṃ vaṭṭaṃ patthetvā pavattitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:71_6: antamaso pañcābhiññā aṭṭha vā pana samāpattiyo,
atk-s0302a:71_7: sabbaṃ taṃ vaṭṭapakkhiyaṃ vaṭṭasīsanti vaṭṭasīsattā micchāpaṭipadāva hoti.
atk-s0302a:71_8: Yaṃ pana kiñci vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ patthetvā pavattitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:71_12: Appamattakampi hi paṇṇamuṭṭhimattadānakusalaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ velāmadānādikusalaṃ vā,
atk-s0302a:71_13: sace vaṭṭasampattiṃ patthetvā vaṭṭanissitavasena micchā ṭhapitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:71_16: “Idaṃ me dānaṃ āsavakkhayāvahaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ pana vivaṭṭaṃ patthentena vivaṭṭavasena sammā ṭhapitaṃ arahattampi
atk-s0302a:71_30: “Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”ti etaṃ nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ yassā paṭipadāya phalaṃ,
atk-s0302a:71_34: Imasmiñca atthe asesavirāganirodhāti ettha virāgo nirodhasseva vevacanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:71_36: Yena vā virāgasaṅkhātena maggena asesanirodho hoti,
atk-s0302a:71_38: Evañhi sati sānubhāvā paṭipadā vibhattā hoti.
atk-s0302a:71_39: Iti imasmimpi sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:73_1: Catutthe vipassissāti tassa kira bodhisattassa yathā lokiyamanussānaṃ kiñcideva passantānaṃ parittakammābhinibbattassa
atk-s0302a:73_4: Balavakammanibbattassa pana kammajapasādassa balavattā avipphandantehi animisehi eva akkhīhi passi seyyathāpi devā tāvatiṃsā.
atk-s0302a:73_12: Ettha ca kiñcāpi pacchimabhavikānaṃ sabbabodhisattānaṃ balavakammanibbattassa kammajapasādassa balavattā akkhīni na vipphandanti,
atk-s0302a:73_13: so pana bodhisatto eteneva nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0302a:74_2: Ekadivasaṃ kira vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīditvā atthe anusāsantassa rañño alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mahāpurisaṃ āharitvā aṅke ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:74_3: Tassa taṃ aṅke katvā palāḷayamānasseva amaccā sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:74_6: Upadhārayamānā aññaṃ adisvā “aṭṭassa dubbinicchitattā evaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti puna sāmikameva sāmikaṃ katvā “ñatvā nu kho kumāro evaṃ karotī”ti?
atk-s0302a:74_9: Atha rājā “jānāti mahāpuriso”ti tato paṭṭhāya appamatto ahosi.
atk-s0302a:74_10: Tena vuttaṃ “viceyya viceyya kumāro atthe panāyati ñāyenāti kho,
atk-s0302a:74_12: vipassissa kumārassa bhiyyosomattāya ‘vipassī vipassī’tveva samaññā udapādī”ti.
atk-s0302a:75_3: paccayānaṃ vā arahattā arahāti evaṃ guṇato uppannanāmadheyyassa.
atk-s0302a:75_4: Sammāsambuddhassāti sammā nayena hetunā sāmaṃ paccattapurisakārena cattāri saccāni buddhassa.
atk-s0302a:75_5: Pubbeva sambodhāti sambodho vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:75_10: Purimabuddhānañhi pādamūle abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya paṇḍitova so satto,
atk-s0302a:75_12: Yathā vā udakato uggantvā ṭhitaṃ paripākagataṃ padumaṃ sūriyarasmisamphassena avassaṃ bujjhissatīti bujjhanakapadumanti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:75_13: evaṃ buddhānaṃ santike byākaraṇassa laddhattā avassaṃ anantarāyena pāramiyo pūretvā bujjhissatīti bujjhanakasattotipi bodhisatto.
atk-s0302a:75_15: taṃ patthayamāno pavattatīti bodhiyaṃ satto āsattotipi bodhisatto.
atk-s0302a:75_21: Cavati ca upapajjati cāti idaṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:75_23: Tañhi jarāmaraṇadukkhato nissaṭattā tassa nissaraṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:75_24: Kudāssu nāmāti katarasmiṃ nu kho kāle.
atk-s0302a:76_1: Ahu paññāya abhisamayoti paññāya saddhiṃ jarāmaraṇakāraṇassa abhisamayo samavāyo samāyogo ahosi,
atk-s0302a:76_3: Atha vā yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāyāti yoniso manasikārena ca paññāya ca abhisamayo ahu.
atk-s0302a:77_1: Samudayo samudayoti ekādasasu ṭhānesu saṅkhārādīnaṃ samudayaṃ sampiṇḍetvā niddisati.
atk-s0302a:77_11: Taṃ panetaṃ catūsu saccesu lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:79_3: bhikkhave”ti na evaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:79_7: Sabbabodhisattānañhi bodhipallaṅke nisinnānaṃ na añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā ācikkhati –
atk-s0302a:79_9: Yathā pana paṭhamakappikakāle deve vuṭṭhe udakassa gatamaggeneva aparāparaṃ vuṭṭhiudakaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0302a:79_10: evaṃ tehi tehi purimabuddhehi gatamaggeneva pacchimā pacchimā gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:79_11: Sabbabodhisattā hi ānāpānacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā taṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ sammasitvā
atk-s0302a:79_12: buddhā hontīti paṭipāṭiyā sattasu suttesu buddhavipassanā nāma kathitāti.
atk-s0302a:83_4: Bhūtānaṃ vā sattānantiādīsu bhūtāti jātā nibbattā.
atk-s0302a:83_5: Sambhavesinoti ye sambhavaṃ jātiṃ nibbattiṃ esanti gavesanti.
atk-s0302a:83_6: Tattha catūsu yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujā sattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti,
atk-s0302a:83_8: aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca bhinditvā bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma.
atk-s0302a:83_9: Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesino nāma,
atk-s0302a:83_20: Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā āyatimpi sambhavaṃ esantānaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:83_21: Evaṃ sabbathāpi imehi dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyati.
atk-s0302a:84_4: Atha vā ṭhitiyāti tassa tassa sattassa uppannadhammānaṃ anuppabandhavasena avicchedāya.
atk-s0302a:84_6: Ubhopi cetāni “bhūtānaṃ vā ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya ca,
atk-s0302a:84_7: sambhavesīnaṃ vā ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya cā”ti evaṃ ubhayattha daṭṭhabbānīti.
atk-s0302a:85_0: Kabaḷīkāro āhāroti kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharitabbako āhāro,
atk-s0302a:85_2: Oḷāriko vā sukhumo vāti vatthuoḷārikatāya oḷāriko,
atk-s0302a:85_4: Sabhāvena pana sukhumarūpapariyāpannattā kabaḷīkāro āhāro sukhumova hoti.
atk-s0302a:85_5: Sāpi cassa vatthuto oḷārikatā sukhumatā ca upādāyupādāya veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:85_6: Kumbhīlānañhi āhāraṃ upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0302a:85_10: Morānaṃ pana āhāraṃ upādāya taracchānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0302a:85_11: Te kira tivassachaḍḍitāni visāṇāni ceva aṭṭhīni ca khādanti,
atk-s0302a:85_12: tāni ca nesaṃ kheḷena temitamattāneva kandamūlaṃ viya mudukāni honti.
atk-s0302a:85_13: Taracchānaṃ āhāraṃ upādāya hatthīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0302a:85_25: Cakkavattino āhārato bhummānaṃ devānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0302a:86_0: Ettha ca oḷārike vatthusmiṃ ojā parittā hoti dubbalā,
atk-s0302a:86_2: Tathā hi ekapattapūrampi yāguṃ pīto muhutteneva jighacchito hoti yaṃkiñcideva khāditukāmo,
atk-s0302a:86_3: sappiṃ pana pasatamattaṃ pivitvā divasaṃ abhottukāmo hoti.
atk-s0302a:86_8: Dve pana ekato hutvā parissayañceva vinodenti pālenti cāti.
atk-s0302a:87_0: Phasso dutiyoti cakkhusamphassādi chabbidhopi phasso etesu catūsu āhāresu dutiyo āhāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:87_2: tasmā iminā nāma kāraṇena dutiyo tatiyo cāti idamettha na gavesitabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:87_5: Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ ṭhāne upādiṇṇakaanupādiṇṇakavasena ekarāsiṃ katvā cattāro āhāre dassesi.
atk-s0302a:87_8: Tattha sappādīhi gilitānaṃ maṇḍūkādīnaṃ vasena upādiṇṇakakabaḷīkārāhāro daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:87_9: Maṇḍūkādayo hi sappādīhi gilitā antokucchigatāpi kiñci kālaṃ jīvantiyeva.
atk-s0302a:87_14: Idaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ na ruccatīti aṭṭhakathāyameva paṭikkhipitvā idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0302a:87_15: imesaṃ sattānaṃ khādantānampi akhādantānampi bhuñjantānampi abhuñjantānampi paṭisandhicitteneva sahajātā kammajā ojā nāma atthi,
atk-s0302a:88_2: atha kasmā aññesupi sattānaṃ paccayesu vijjamānesu imeyeva cattāro vuttā”ti? Vuccate –
atk-s0302a:88_4: Visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro,
atk-s0302a:88_10: ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0302a:89_1: Kabaḷīkārāhāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āharati phassāhāro tisso vedanā,
atk-s0302a:90_1: Kabaḷīkārāhāro tāva mukhe ṭhapitamatteyeva aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0302a:90_2: dantavicuṇṇitaṃ pana ajjhohariyamānaṃ ekekaṃ sitthaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpetiyeva.
atk-s0302a:90_4: Phassāhāro pana sukhavedanīyo phasso uppajjamānoyeva sukhaṃ vedanaṃ āharati,
atk-s0302a:90_6: adukkhamasukhavedanīyo adukkhamasukhanti evaṃ sabbathāpi phassāhāro tisso vedanā āharati.
atk-s0302a:91_2: Evaṃ sabbathāpi manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave āharati.
atk-s0302a:91_3: Viññāṇāhāro pana ye ca paṭisandhikkhaṇe taṃsampayuttakā tayo khandhā,
atk-s0302a:91_4: yāni ca tisantativasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0302a:91_7: Ettha ca “manosañcetanā tayo bhave āharatī”ti sāsavakusalākusalacetanāva vuttā.
atk-s0302a:92_0: Etesu catūsu āhāresu kabaḷīkārāhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti,
atk-s0302a:92_3: Kabaḷīkārāhāro hi upatthambhentoyeva kāyaṭṭhapanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0302a:92_4: Kammajanitopi hi ayaṃ kāyo kabaḷīkārāhārena upatthaddho dasapi vassāni vassasatampi yāva āyuparimāṇā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0302a:92_6: Yathā mātuyā janitopi dārako dhātiyā thaññādīni pāyetvā posiyamāno ciraṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0302a:93_1: gehe papatante aññena dārunā upatthambhitaṃ santaṃ eva taṃ gehaṃ na patati.
atk-s0302a:93_3: ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:94_0: Evaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0302a:95_0: Evaṃ sādhentopi ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro dvinnaṃ rūpasantatīnaṃ paccayo hoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa ca upādiṇṇakassa ca.
atk-s0302a:95_3: Phasso pana sukhādivatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva sukhādivedanāpavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0302a:95_4: Manosañcetanā kusalākusalakammavasena āyūhamānāyeva bhavamūlanipphādanato sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0302a:95_5: Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva nāmarūpappavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hotīti.
atk-s0302a:96_0: Evaṃ upatthambhanādivasena āhārakiccaṃ sādhayamānesu panetesu cattāri bhayāni daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0302a:96_7: Kabaḷīkārāhāre hi nikantiṃ katvā sītādīnaṃ purakkhatā sattā āhāratthāya muddāgaṇanādikammāni karontā anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchanti.
atk-s0302a:96_8: Ekacce ca imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammādikāya anesanāya āhāraṃ pariyesantā diṭṭheva dhamme gārayhā honti,
atk-s0302a:96_10: “tassa saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitā”tiādinā lakkhaṇasaṃyutte vuttanayena samaṇapetā honti.
atk-s0302a:96_11: Iminā tāva kāraṇena kabaḷīkāre āhāre nikanti eva bhayanti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:97_0: Phassaṃ upagacchantāpi phassassādino paresaṃ rakkhitagopitesu dārādīsu bhaṇḍesu aparajjhanti,
atk-s0302a:97_1: te saha bhaṇḍena bhaṇḍasāmikā gahetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ vā chinditvā saṅkārakūṭe chaḍḍenti,
atk-s0302a:97_3: Tato te rājā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārāpeti.
atk-s0302a:97_4: Kāyassa ca bhedā duggati tesaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā hoti.
atk-s0302a:97_5: Iti phassassādamūlakaṃ diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi bhayaṃ sabbamāgatameva hoti.
atk-s0302a:97_6: Iminā kāraṇena phassāhāre upagamanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:98_0: Kusalākusalakammāyūhane pana tammūlakaṃ tīsu bhavesu bhayaṃ sabbaṃ āgatameva hoti.
atk-s0302a:98_1: Iminā kāraṇena manosañcetanāhāre āyūhanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:99_1: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ gahetvāva nibbattati.
atk-s0302a:99_2: Tasmiñca nibbatte sabbabhayāni nibbattāniyeva honti tammūlakattāti iminā kāraṇena viññāṇāhāre abhinipātoyeva bhayanti veditabboti.
atk-s0302a:100_4: Yasmā taṃ tato samudeti jāyati pabhavati,
atk-s0302a:100_11: Yasmā pana tesaṃ taṇhā yathāvuttena atthena nidānañceva samudayo ca jāti ca pabhavo ca,
atk-s0302a:101_0: Ettha ca ime cattāro āhārā taṇhānidānāti paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā attabhāvasaṅkhātānaṃ āhārānaṃ purimataṇhānaṃ vasena nidānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:101_2: sesānaṃ tato ūnaūnasantativasena uppannarūpabbhantaraṃ jātā ojā atthi,
atk-s0302a:101_4: Paṭisandhicittasampayuttā pana phassacetanā sayañca cittaṃ viññāṇanti ime taṇhānidānā upādiṇṇaka-
atk-s0302a:101_6: viññāṇāhārāti evaṃ tāva purimataṇhānidānā paṭisandhikā āhārā.
atk-s0302a:102_0: Yasmā pana bhagavā na kevalaṃ āhārānameva nidānaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0302a:102_5: kiṃnidānātiādinā nayena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā vivaṭṭaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0302a:102_6: Imasmiñca pana ṭhāne bhagavā atītābhimukhaṃ desanaṃ katvā atītena vaṭṭaṃ dasseti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:103_1: vedanāphassasaḷāyatananāmarūpaviññāṇāni yasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhatvā kammaṃ āyūhitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:103_5: dvīsu tassa janakaṃ kammanti saṅkhepena kammañceva kammavipākañcāti,
atk-s0302a:103_6: dvepi dhamme dassentena atītābhimukhaṃ desanaṃ katvā atītena vaṭṭaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:104_0: Tatrāyaṃ desanā anāgatassa adassitattā aparipuṇṇāti na daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0302a:104_2: Yathā hi cakkhumā puriso udakapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ suṃsumāraṃ disvā tassa parabhāgaṃ olokento gīvaṃ passeyya,
atk-s0302a:104_5: heṭṭhā kucchiṃ olokento pana udakagataṃ agganaṅguṭṭhañceva cattāro ca hatthapāde na passeyya,
atk-s0302a:105_1: Tīre ṭhito cakkhumā puriso viya yogāvacaro.
atk-s0302a:105_2: Tena purisena udakapiṭṭhe suṃsumārassa diṭṭhakālo viya yoginā āhāravasena imassattabhāvassa diṭṭhakālo.
atk-s0302a:105_3: Parato gīvāya diṭṭhakālo viya imassattabhāvassa janikāya taṇhāya diṭṭhakālo.
atk-s0302a:105_4: Piṭṭhiyā diṭṭhakālo viya yasmiṃ attabhāve taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0302a:105_6: Naṅguṭṭhamūlassa diṭṭhakālo viya tassattabhāvassa janakānaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ diṭṭhakālo.
atk-s0302a:105_7: Heṭṭhā kucchiṃ olokentassa pana agganaṅguṭṭhañceva cattāro ca hatthapāde adisvāpi “aparipuṇṇo suṃsumāro”ti
atk-s0302a:105_8: agahetvā nayato paripuṇṇotveva gahaṇaṃ viya yattha yattha paccayavaṭṭaṃ pāḷiyaṃ na āgataṃ,
atk-s0302a:105_9: tattha tattha “desanā aparipuṇṇā”ti agahetvā nayato paripuṇṇātveva gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:105_10: Tattha ca āhārataṇhānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:105_12: viññāṇasaṅkhārānaṃ antare ekoti evaṃ tisandhicatusaṅkhepameva vaṭṭaṃ dassitanti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:107_1: Dutiye sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāyāti imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne bhagavā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:107_3: Tassañhi parisati moḷiyaphagguno nāma bhikkhu diṭṭhigatiko nisinno.
atk-s0302a:107_6: athassāhaṃ vissajjessāmī”ti pucchāya okāsadānatthaṃ desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:112_3: Etadavocāti desanānusandhiṃ ghaṭento etaṃ “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0302a:112_7: yo etaṃ viññāṇāhāraṃ khādati vā bhuñjati vāti?
atk-s0302a:113_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ itare tayo āhāre apucchitvā imameva pucchatīti?
atk-s0302a:113_2: So hi mahante piṇḍe katvāva kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ bhuñjante passati,
atk-s0302a:113_4: Tittiravaṭṭakamorakukkuṭādayo pana mātusamphassena yāpente disvā “ete phassāhārena yāpentī”ti tassa laddhi.
atk-s0302a:113_5: Kacchapā pana attano utusamaye mahāsamuddato nikkhamitvā samuddatīre vālikantare aṇḍāni ṭhapetvā vālikāya paṭicchādetvā mahāsamuddameva otaranti.
atk-s0302a:113_9: na pana etāya laddhiyā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0302a:113_11: Yathā ummattako pacchiṃ gahetvā antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇo gomayampi pāsāṇampi gūthampi khajjakhaṇḍampi taṃ
atk-s0302a:113_12: taṃ manāpampi amanāpampi gahetvā pacchiyaṃ pakkhipati.
atk-s0302a:113_16: Teneva naṃ bhagavā “kasmā evaṃ pucchasī”ti avatvā gahitagāhameva tassa mocetuṃ no kallo pañhotiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:114_1: Āhāretīti ahaṃ na vadāmīti ahaṃ koci satto vā puggalo vā āhāretīti na vadāmi.
atk-s0302a:114_2: Āhāretīti cāhaṃ vadeyyanti yadi ahaṃ āhāretīti vadeyyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:114_3: Tatrassa kallo pañhoti tasmiṃ mayā evaṃ vutte ayaṃ pañho yutto bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:114_6: ayaṃ viññāṇāhāro katamassa dhammassa paccayoti attho.
atk-s0302a:114_7: Tatra kallaṃ veyyākaraṇanti tasmiṃ evaṃ pucchite pañhe imaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ yuttaṃ “viññāṇāhāro āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā paccayo”ti.
atk-s0302a:114_10: Tasmiṃ bhūte sati saḷāyatananti tasmiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattisaṅkhāte nāmarūpe jāte sati saḷāyatanaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0302a:115_0: Saḷāyatanapaccayā phassoti idhāpi bhagavā uttari pañhassa okāsaṃ dento desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:115_1: Diṭṭhigatiko hi navapucchaṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:115_7: Diṭṭhigatikassa hi satto nāma bhūto nibbattoyevāti laddhi,
atk-s0302a:115_8: tasmā attano laddhiviruddhaṃ idanti na pucchati.
atk-s0302a:115_9: Apica idappaccayā idaṃ idappaccayā idanti bahūsu ṭhānesu kathitattā saññattiṃ upagato,
atk-s0302a:115_12: tucchapucchameva pucchatī”ti ito paṭṭhāya desanaṃ ekābaddhaṃ katvā desesi.
atk-s0302a:115_15: Imasmiṃ pana sutte viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:117_1: Tatiye samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vāti saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthā bāhirakasamaṇabrāhmaṇā.
atk-s0302a:117_2: Jarāmaraṇaṃ nappajānantītiādīsu jarāmaraṇaṃ na jānanti dukkhasaccavasena,
atk-s0302a:117_3: jarāmaraṇasamudayaṃ na jānanti saha taṇhāya jāti jarāmaraṇassa samudayoti samudayasaccavasena,
atk-s0302a:117_7: jātisamudayaṃ na jānanti saha taṇhāya bhavo jātisamudayoti samudayasaccavasena.
atk-s0302a:117_8: Evaṃ saha taṇhāya samudayaṃ yojetvā sabbapadesu catusaccavasena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:117_9: Sāmaññatthaṃ vā brahmaññatthaṃ vāti ettha ariyamaggo sāmaññañceva brahmaññañca.
atk-s0302a:117_10: Ubhayatthāpi pana attho nāma ariyaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:117_11: Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte ekādasasu ṭhānesu cattāri saccāni kathesīti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:119_1: Catutthe ime dhamme katame dhammeti ettakaṃ papañcaṃ katvā kathitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:119_2: desanaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena ime dhamme nappajānantītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:121_1: Pañcame sammādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti yaṃ paṇḍitā devamanussā tesu tesu ṭhānesu sammādassanaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0302a:121_2: sabbampi taṃ dvīhi padehi saṅkhipitvā pucchati.
atk-s0302a:121_4: Yebhuyyenāti iminā ṭhapetvā ariyapuggale sesamahājanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0302a:121_9: Sammappaññāya passatoti sammāpaññā nāma savipassanā maggapaññā,
atk-s0302a:121_11: Yā loke natthitāti saṅkhāraloke nibbattesu dhammesu paññāyantesveva yā natthīti ucchedadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:121_14: Yā loke atthitāti saṅkhāraloke bhijjamānesu dhammesu paññāyantesveva yā atthīti sassatadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:122_2: Lokanissaye passantassāpi hi paccayānaṃ anucchedena paccayuppannassa anucchedaṃ passato yā natthīti ucchedadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:122_4: Paccayanirodhaṃ passantassāpi paccayanirodhena paccayuppannanirodhaṃ passato yā atthīti sassatadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:123_0: Upayupādānābhinivesavinibandhoti upayehi ca upādānehi ca abhinivesehi ca vinibandho.
atk-s0302a:123_1: Tattha upayāti dve upayā taṇhupayo ca diṭṭhupayo ca.
atk-s0302a:123_3: Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo hi yasmā ahaṃ mamantiādīhi ākārehi tebhūmakadhamme upenti upagacchanti,
atk-s0302a:123_5: Yasmā pana te dhamme upādiyanti ceva abhinivisanti ca,
atk-s0302a:123_6: tasmā upādānāti ca abhinivesāti ca vuccanti.
atk-s0302a:124_4: tā ca tasmiṃ abhinivisanti ceva anusenti ca,
atk-s0302a:124_5: tasmā tadubhayaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinivesānusayanti ca āha.
atk-s0302a:124_13: na añño ettha satto nāma atthī”ti kaṅkhaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0302a:125_3: sammādiṭṭhi hotīti evaṃ sattasaññāya pahīnattā ettakena sammādassanaṃ nāma hotīti missakasammādiṭṭhiṃ āha.
atk-s0302a:125_4: Ayameko antoti esa eko nikūṭanto lāmakanto paṭhamakaṃ sassataṃ.
atk-s0302a:125_5: Ayaṃ dutiyoti esa dutiyo sabbaṃ natthīti uppajjanakadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto nikūṭanto lāmakanto dutiyako ucchedoti attho.
atk-s0302a:127_4: Paṭipanno hotīti ettha sīlato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā paṭipannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:127_5: Dhammānudhammappaṭipannoti lokuttarassa nibbānadhammassa anudhammabhūtaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0302a:127_7: Nibbidā virāgā nirodhāti nibbidāya ceva virāgena ca nirodhena ca.
atk-s0302a:127_8: Anupādā vimuttoti catūhi upādānehi kiñci dhammaṃ anupādiyitvā vimutto.
atk-s0302a:127_13: Evamettha ekena nayena dhammakathikassa pucchā kathitā,
atk-s0302a:127_14: dvīhi taṃ visesetvā sekkhāsekkhabhūmiyo niddiṭṭhāti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:129_1: Sattame acelo kassapoti liṅgena acelo niccelo,
atk-s0302a:129_3: Dūratovāti mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena parivutaṃ āgacchantaṃ dūrato eva addasa.
atk-s0302a:129_6: Antaragharanti “na pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdissāmī”ti ettha antonivesanaṃ antaragharaṃ.
atk-s0302a:129_7: “Okkhittacakkhu antaraghare gamissāmī”ti ettha indakhīlato paṭṭhāya antogāmo.
atk-s0302a:130_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā kathetukāmo yāvatatiyaṃ paṭikkhipīti?
atk-s0302a:130_2: Diṭṭhigatikā hi khippaṃ kathiyamāne gāravaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0302a:130_5: Dve tayo vāre paṭikkhitte pana gāravaṃ karonti,
atk-s0302a:130_6: “samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitumpi pañhaṃ pucchitumpi dukkara”nti yāvatatiyaṃ yācite kathiyamānaṃ sussūsanti saddahanti.
atk-s0302a:130_7: Iti bhagavā “ayaṃ sussūsissati saddahissatī”ti yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā kathesi.
atk-s0302a:130_8: Apica yathā bhisakko telaṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā pacanto mudupākakharapākānaṃ pākakālaṃ āgamayamāno pākakālaṃ anatikkamitvāva otāreti.
atk-s0302a:130_9: Evaṃ bhagavā sattānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno “ettakena kālena imassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gamissatī”ti ñatvāva yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpesi.
atk-s0302a:131_3: Sayaṃkataṃ dukkhanti hi vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0302a:131_4: attā nāma koci dukkhassa kārako natthīti dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:131_11: ‘Bhavaṃ gotamo dukkhaṃ na jānāti na passatī’ti puṭṭho ‘jānāmi khvāha’nti vadati.
atk-s0302a:131_12: Kiñci nu kho mayā virajjhitvā pucchito”ti mūlato paṭṭhāya attano pucchameva sodhento evamāha.
atk-s0302a:131_14: bhagavāti idha satthari sañjātagāravo “bhava”nti avatvā “bhagavā”ti vadati.
atk-s0302a:132_2: Ettha ca satoti idaṃ bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:132_4: so karoti so paṭisaṃvedayatīti kho, kassapa,
atk-s0302a:132_5: ādimhiyeva evaṃ sati pacchā sayaṃkataṃ dukkhanti ayaṃ laddhi hoti.
atk-s0302a:132_7: Iti vadanti etassa purimena ādisaddena anantarena ca sassatasaddena sambandho hoti.
atk-s0302a:132_10: iti evaṃ vadanto āditova sassataṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0302a:132_12: Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti,
atk-s0302a:132_13: kārakañca vedakañca ekameva gaṇhantaṃ etaṃ sassataṃ upagacchatīti attho.
atk-s0302a:133_0: Añño karotītiādi pana “paraṃkataṃ dukkha”nti laddhiyā paṭisedhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:133_3: añño karoti añño paṭisaṃvediyatīti kho pana, kassapa,
atk-s0302a:133_6: tena kataṃ añño paṭisaṃvediyatī”ti evaṃ uppannāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sampayuttāya vedanāya abhitunnassa
atk-s0302a:133_7: viddhassa sato “paraṃkataṃ dukkha”nti ayaṃ laddhi hotīti.
atk-s0302a:133_12: Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti,
atk-s0302a:134_0: Ete teti ye sassatucchedasaṅkhāte ubho ante (anupagamma tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti, ete te, kassapa,
atk-s0302a:134_1: ubho ante) anupagamma pahāya anallīyitvā majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0302a:134_7: na koci kārako vā vedako vā niddiṭṭho.
atk-s0302a:134_9: Ubho ante anupagammāti iminā hi tatiyapañho paṭikkhitto.
atk-s0302a:134_10: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti iminā adhiccasamuppannatā ceva ajānanañca paṭikkhittanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:135_0: Labheyyanti idaṃ so bhagavato santike bhikkhubhāvaṃ patthayamāno āha.
atk-s0302a:135_1: Atha bhagavā yonena khandhake titthiyaparivāso paññatto,
atk-s0302a:135_3: itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhāmi upasampadaṃ. Svāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0302a:135_4: saṅghaṃ cattāro māse parivāsaṃ yācāmī”tiādinā nayena samādiyitvā parivasati,
atk-s0302a:135_9: Upasampadatthikena pana nātikālena gāmappavesanādīni aṭṭha vattāni pūrentena parivasitabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:135_12: vitthārato panesa titthiyaparivāso samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya pabbajjakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:136_4: ayaṃ na parivāsāraho”ti idaṃ mayhaṃ pākaṭanti dasseti.
atk-s0302a:136_7: yattha evaṃ ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvā yuttameva gaṇhanti,
atk-s0302a:136_11: Atha bhagavā tassa tibbacchandataṃ viditvā “na kassapo parivāsaṃ arahatī”ti aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi – “gaccha, bhikkhu,
atk-s0302a:136_13: So tathā katvā taṃ pabbājetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:136_15: Tena vuttaṃ alattha kho acelo kassapo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ,
atk-s0302a:138_1: Aṭṭhame sā vedanātiādi “sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti laddhiyā nisedhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:138_7: ādimhiyeva evaṃ sati “sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti ayaṃ laddhi hoti.
atk-s0302a:138_8: Evañhi sati vedanāya eva vedanā katā hoti.
atk-s0302a:138_9: Evañca vadanto imissā vedanāya pubbepi atthitaṃ anujānāti,
atk-s0302a:138_11: Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti,
atk-s0302a:138_13: Purimañhi atthaṃ sandhāyevetaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0302a:138_14: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ taṃ yojetvāvassa attho dīpito.
atk-s0302a:139_0: Aññā vedanātiādi “paraṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti laddhiyā paṭisedhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:139_1: Idhāpi ayaṃ atthayojanā –“aññā vedanā añño vediyatī”ti kho,
atk-s0302a:139_3: ādimhiyeva evaṃ sati pacchā yā purimapakkhe kārakavedanā,
atk-s0302a:139_5: Tāya pana kataṃ añño vediyatīti evaṃ uppannāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sampayuttāya vedanāya abhitunnassa
atk-s0302a:139_10: Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti,
atk-s0302a:139_12: Idhāpi hi imāni padāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āharitvā yojitāneva.
atk-s0302a:139_14: Tañca kho vipākasukhadukkhameva vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:141_2: Evamayaṃ kāyo samudāgatoti evaṃ avijjāya nivāritattā taṇhāya ca sampayuttattāyeva ayaṃ kāyo nibbatto.
atk-s0302a:141_3: Ayañceva kāyoti ayañcassa attano saviññāṇako kāyo.
atk-s0302a:141_4: Bahiddhā ca nāmarūpanti bahiddhā ca paresaṃ saviññāṇako kāyo.
atk-s0302a:141_5: Attano ca parassa ca pañcahi khandhehi chahi āyatanehi cāpi ayaṃ attho dīpetabbova.
atk-s0302a:141_7: Dvayaṃ paṭicca phassoti aññattha cakkhurūpādīni dvayāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā,
atk-s0302a:141_11: Yehi phuṭṭhoti yehi kāraṇabhūtehi āyatanehi uppannena phassena phuṭṭho.
atk-s0302a:142_3: tasmiṃ parinibbute ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime dhamme uppādetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0302a:142_4: bhagavatā pana no ime dhammā uppāditā.
atk-s0302a:142_5: Bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmāti evaṃ bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammāti.
atk-s0302a:142_6: Bhagavaṃnettikāti bhagavā hi dhammānaṃ netā vinetā anunetā,
atk-s0302a:142_7: yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā dassetāti dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā nāma honti.
atk-s0302a:142_8: Bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇāti catubhūmakadhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchamānā bhagavati paṭisaranti nāmāti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
atk-s0302a:142_10: Apica mahābodhimaṇḍe nisinnassa bhagavato paṭivedhavasena phasso āgacchati “ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāmo”ti?
atk-s0302a:142_11: Tvaṃ phusanaṭṭhena phasso nāma. Vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,
atk-s0302a:142_13: tvaṃ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0302a:142_15: Bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātūti bhagavatova etassa bhāsitassa attho upaṭṭhātu,
atk-s0302a:143_0: Sā ceva avijjāti ettha kiñcāpi sā avijjā ca taṇhā ca kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhitvā niruddhā,
atk-s0302a:143_1: yathā pana ajjāpi yaṃ hiyyo bhesajjaṃ pītaṃ,
atk-s0302a:143_2: tadeva bhojanaṃ bhuñjāti sarikkhakattena tadevāti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:143_3: evamidhāpi sā ceva avijjā sā ca taṇhāti idampi sarikkhakattena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:143_6: Kāyūpago hotīti aññaṃ paṭisandhikāyaṃ upagantā hoti.
atk-s0302a:143_9: Iti imasmiṃ sutte sabbopi sapaṭisandhiko puthujjano “bālo”ti,
atk-s0302a:143_11: Sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino pana “paṇḍitā”ti vā “bālā”ti vā na vattabbā,
atk-s0302a:145_2: desessāmi paṭiccasamuppanne ca dhammeti satthā imasmiṃ sutte paccaye ca paccayanibbatte ca sabhāvadhamme desessāmīti ubhayaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:145_6: Ṭhitāva sā dhātūti ṭhitova so paccayasabhāvo,
atk-s0302a:145_7: na kadāci jāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayo na hoti.
atk-s0302a:145_8: Dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatāti imehipi dvīhi paccayameva katheti.
atk-s0302a:145_25: Passathāti cāhāti passatha iti ca vadati. Kinti?
atk-s0302a:146_5: So tehi tehi paccayehi anūnādhikeheva tassa tassa dhammassa sambhavato tathatāti,
atk-s0302a:146_6: sāmaggiṃ upagatesu paccayesu muhuttampi tato nibbattānaṃ dhammānaṃ asambhavābhāvato avitathatāti,
atk-s0302a:146_8: jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ paccayato vā paccayasamūhato vā idappaccayatāti vutto.
atk-s0302a:147_1: Ettha ca aniccanti na jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ,
atk-s0302a:147_2: aniccasabhāvānaṃ pana khandhānaṃ jarāmaraṇattā aniccaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0302a:147_4: Ettha ca saṅkhatanti paccayehi samāgantvā kataṃ.
atk-s0302a:147_11: Janakapaccayānaṃ vā kiccānubhāvakkhaṇe diṭṭhattā ekena pariyāyenettha aniccātiādīni yujjantiyeva.
atk-s0302a:148_2: Ahosiṃ nu khotiādīsu “ahosiṃ nu kho nanu kho”ti sassatākārañca adhiccasamuppattiākārañca nissāya atīte attano vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:148_4: ummattako viya bālaputhujjano yathā vā tathā vā pavattati.
atk-s0302a:148_5: Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgupapattiyo nissāya “khattiyo nu kho ahosiṃ,
atk-s0302a:148_7: Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ rassaodātakaṇhapamāṇikaappamāṇikādīnaṃ aññataro”ti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:148_8: Keci pana “issaranimmānādīni nissāya ‘kena nu kho kāraṇena ahosi’nti hetuto kaṅkhatī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0302a:148_9: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti jātiādīni nissāya “khattiyo hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe…
atk-s0302a:148_10: devo hutvā manusso”ti attano paramparaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:148_13: Bhavissāmi nu kho nanu khoti sassatākārañca ucchedākārañca nissāya anāgate attano vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:149_0: Etarahi vā paccuppannaṃ addhānanti idāni vā paṭisandhimādiṃ katvā cutipariyantaṃ sabbampi vattamānakālaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0302a:149_1: Ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī bhavissatīti attano khandhesu vicikicchī bhavissati.
atk-s0302a:149_2: Ahaṃ nu khosmīti attano atthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:149_9: so uṭṭhāya “ahaṃ nu kho cūḷamātāya putto”ti cintesi.
atk-s0302a:149_10: Evaṃ ahaṃ nu khosmīti kaṅkhā hoti.
atk-s0302a:149_11: No nu khosmīti attano natthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:149_13: eko kira macche gaṇhanto udake ciraṭṭhānena sītibhūtaṃ attano ūruṃ macchoti cintetvā pahari.
atk-s0302a:149_14: Aparo susānapasse khettaṃ rakkhanto bhīto saṅkuṭito sayi,
atk-s0302a:149_15: so paṭibujjhitvā attano jaṇṇukāni dve yakkhāti cintetvā pahari.
atk-s0302a:150_0: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyova samāno attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:150_2: Devo pana samāno devabhāvaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0302a:150_3: sopi pana “ahaṃ rūpī nu kho arūpī nu kho”tiādinā nayena kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:150_5: Apaccakkhā tesaṃ tattha tattha kule uppatti.
atk-s0302a:150_7: pabbajitāpi “kuppaṃ nu kho me kamma”ntiādinā nayena gahaṭṭhasaññino.
atk-s0302a:150_8: Manussāpi ca rājāno viya attani devasaññino honti.
atk-s0302a:150_10: Kevalañhettha abbhantare jīvo nāma atthīti gahetvā tassa saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu khosmi rassacaturassachaḷaṃsaaṭṭhaṃsasoḷasaṃsādīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:150_13: Sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ pana paccuppannaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:150_14: Kuto āgato so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhanto evaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:156_1: Dutiyaṃ bhagavatā attano ajjhāsayassa vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:159_28: “Dasabalasamannāgato”ti ettha pana etaṃ saṅgahaṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0302a:159_29: Etañhi bāhirakaṃ lāmakaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ sīhādīnampi hoti.
atk-s0302a:159_30: Etañhi nissāya dukkhapariññā vā samudayappahānaṃ vā maggabhāvanā vā phalasacchikiriyā vā natthi.
atk-s0302a:159_31: Aññaṃ pana dasasu ṭhānesu akampanatthena upatthambhanatthena ca dasavidhaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0302a:160_3: ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato jānanaṃ ekaṃ,
atk-s0302a:160_4: atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso yathābhūtaṃ vipākajānanaṃ ekaṃ,
atk-s0302a:161_0: “Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0302a:161_1: Yampi tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0302a:161_3: yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-s0302a:162_1: Atthavaṇṇanāpi nesaṃ vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyañceva papañcasūdaniyā ca majjhimaṭṭhakathāya sabbākārato vuttā.
atk-s0302a:163_0: Catūhi ca vesārajjehīti ettha sārajjapaṭipakkhaṃ vesārajjaṃ,
atk-s0302a:163_1: catūsu ṭhānesu vesārajjabhāvaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasomanassamayañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0302a:163_3: “Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”tiādīsu codanāvatthūsu.
atk-s0302a:164_4: ‘Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā’ti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo
atk-s0302a:164_5: vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ saha dhammena paṭicodessatīti nimittametaṃ,
atk-s0302a:164_9: nimittaṃ asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi.
atk-s0302a:164_10: ‘Khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ime āsavā aparikkhīṇā’ti tatra vata maṃ…pe…
atk-s0302a:164_11: ‘ye kho pana te antarāyikā dhammā vuttā,
atk-s0302a:164_12: te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā’ti tatra vata maṃ…pe…
atk-s0302a:164_13: ‘yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desito,
atk-s0302a:164_14: so na niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā’ti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā…pe…
atk-s0302a:165_7: sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi asampakampiyo nisabho,
atk-s0302a:165_11: Ṭhānanti catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā avaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:165_13: Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho usabhabalena samannāgato catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0302a:165_14: evaṃ tathāgatopi dasahi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ uppīḷetvā
atk-s0302a:165_15: sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0302a:165_16: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamāno ca taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti upagacchati na paccakkhāti,
atk-s0302a:166_3: Khattiyaparisā brāhmaṇaparisā gahapatiparisā samaṇaparisā cātumahārājikaparisā tāvatiṃsaparisā māraparisā brahmaparisā”ti,
atk-s0302a:166_8: Yathā vā sīho sahanato ceva hananato ca sīhoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:166_9: evaṃ tathāgato lokadhammānaṃ sahanato parappavādānañca hananato sīhoti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:166_11: Tattha yathā sīho sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati,
atk-s0302a:166_12: evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso,
atk-s0302a:167_0: Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetīti ettha brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ,
atk-s0302a:167_2: Taṃ pana dhammacakkaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti paṭivedhañāṇañca desanāñāṇañca.
atk-s0302a:167_6: Tañhi abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:167_8: Tusitabhavanato vā yāva mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:167_10: Dīpaṅkarato vā paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:167_17: Ubhayampi panetaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānaṃyeva orasañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:168_0: Idāni yaṃ iminā ñāṇena samannāgato sīhanādaṃ nadati,
atk-s0302a:168_2: Tattha iti rūpanti idaṃ rūpaṃ ettakaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0302a:168_3: ito uddhaṃ rūpaṃ natthīti ruppanasabhāvañceva bhūtupādāyabhedañca ādiṃ katvā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānavasena anavasesarūpapariggaho vutto.
atk-s0302a:168_4: Iti rūpassa samudayoti iminā evaṃ pariggahitassa rūpassa samudayo vutto.
atk-s0302a:168_5: Tattha itīti evaṃ samudayo hotīti attho.
atk-s0302a:168_7: kammasamudayā āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayoti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passatī”ti evaṃ veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:168_9: vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa nirodhaṃ passatī”ti ayaṃ vitthāro.
atk-s0302a:169_0: Iti vedanātiādīsupi ayaṃ vedanā ettakā vedanā,
atk-s0302a:169_7: Iti vedanāya samudayotiādīhi pana evaṃ pariggahitānaṃ vedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ samudayo vutto.
atk-s0302a:169_8: Tatrāpi itīti evaṃ samudayo hotīti attho.
atk-s0302a:169_9: Tesampi vitthāro “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo”ti rūpe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:169_15: Vitthārato pana udayabbayavinicchayo sabbākāraparipūro visuddhimagge vutto.
atk-s0302a:170_0: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti ayampi aparo sīhanādo.
atk-s0302a:170_2: imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye sati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:170_3: Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa uppādā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:170_4: Imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye asati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0302a:170_5: Imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa nirodhā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ nirujjhati.
atk-s0302a:170_6: Idāni yathā taṃ hoti ceva nirujjhati ca,
atk-s0302a:170_7: taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ yadidaṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:171_0: Evaṃ svākkhātoti evaṃ pañcakkhandhavibhajanādivasena suṭṭhu akkhāto kathito.
atk-s0302a:171_5: Chinnapilotikoti pilotikā vuccati chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ tattha tattha sibbitagaṇṭhitaṃ jiṇṇavatthaṃ,
atk-s0302a:171_6: taṃ yassa natthīti aṭṭhahatthaṃ navahatthaṃ vā ahatasāṭakaṃ nivattho,
atk-s0302a:171_16: Yathā hi catuhatthaṃ sāṭakaṃ gahetvā pariggahaṇaṃ karonto puriso ito cito ca añchanto kilamati,
atk-s0302a:171_17: evaṃ bāhirakasamaye pabbajitā attano parittakaṃ dhammaṃ “evaṃ sati evaṃ bhavissatī”ti kappetvā kappetvā vaḍḍhentā kilamanti.
atk-s0302a:171_18: Yathā pana aṭṭhahatthanavahatthena pariggahaṇaṃ karonto yathāruci pārupati na kilamati,
atk-s0302a:171_20: evaṃ imasmimpi dhamme kappetvā kappetvā vibhajanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0302a:171_21: tehi tehi kāraṇehi mayāva ayaṃ dhammo suvibhatto suvitthāritoti idampi sandhāya “chinnapilotiko”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:171_23: imasmiñca sāsane samaṇakacavaraṃ nāma patiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati.
atk-s0302a:177_0: Iti samaṇakacavarassa chinnattāpi ayaṃ dhammo chinnapilotiko nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:178_2: Kulaputtenāti dve kulaputtā ācārakulaputto jātikulaputto ca.
atk-s0302a:178_3: Tattha yo yato kutoci kulā pabbajitvā sīlādayo pañca dhammakkhandhe pūreti,
atk-s0302a:178_5: Yo pana yasakulaputtādayo viya jātisampannakulā pabbajito,
atk-s0302a:178_12: Idānissa caturaṅgaṃ dassento kāmaṃ taco cātiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:178_17: Idañca pana caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahantena navasu ṭhānesu samādhātabbaṃ purebhatte pacchābhatte
atk-s0302a:178_18: purimayāme majjhimayāme pacchimayāme gamane ṭhāne nisajjāya sayaneti.
atk-s0302a:179_2: kusīto viharatīti imasmiṃ sāsane yo kusīto puggalo,
atk-s0302a:179_7: Sadatthanti sobhanaṃ vā atthaṃ sakaṃ vā atthaṃ,
atk-s0302a:179_10: Kusītapuggalassa hi cha dvārāni aguttāni honti,
atk-s0302a:179_14: So sabrahmacārīnaṃ akkhimhi patitarajaṃ viya upaghātakaro hutvā dukkhaṃ viharati,
atk-s0302a:179_18: tena bhutto raṭṭhapiṇḍopi na mahapphalo hoti.
atk-s0302a:180_1: bhikkhaveti āraddhavīriyo puggalo imasmiṃyeva sāsane sukhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0302a:180_6: Āraddhavīriyassa hi cha dvārāni suguttāni honti,
atk-s0302a:180_8: ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ sīlaṃ pariyodātaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ akkhimhi susītalañjanaṃ viya dhātugatacandanaṃ viya ca manāpo hutvā sukhaṃ viharati,
atk-s0302a:182_1: tathāgatā evaṃ vanditabbā”ti paṭikkhipitvā tāya yācito vanditabbākāraṃ ācikkhanto evamāha –
atk-s0302a:184_0: Samagge sāvake passa, esā buddhāna vandanā”ti. ;
atk-s0302a:185_0: Evaṃ āraddhavīriyo satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:185_2: Tassa hi buddhuppādo dhammadesanā saṅghasuppaṭipatti saphalā hoti saudrayā,
atk-s0302a:186_0: Hīnena aggassāti hīnāya saddhāya hīnena vīriyena hīnāya satiyā hīnena samādhinā hīnāya paññāya aggasaṅkhātassa arahattassa patti nāma na hoti.
atk-s0302a:186_1: Aggena ca khoti aggehi saddhādīhi aggassa arahattassa patti hoti.
atk-s0302a:186_4: Yañhi pivitvā antaravīthiyaṃ patito visaññī attano sāṭakādīnampi assāmiko hoti,
atk-s0302a:186_6: mayhaṃ pana sāsanaṃ evaṃ pasannañca pātabbañcāti dassento “maṇḍapeyya”nti āha.
atk-s0302a:187_5: Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ ācikkhanā desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:187_11: Bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo devā manussā ye vā panaññepi keci viññātāro,
atk-s0302a:187_21: assaddhiyaṃ kasaṭaṃ chaḍḍetvā saddhindriyassa adhimokkhamaṇḍaṃ pivatīti maṇḍapeyyantiādināpi nayenettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:187_24: tasmā vīriyasampayogaṃ katvā pivatha etaṃ maṇḍaṃ.
atk-s0302a:187_25: Bāhirakañhi bhesajjamaṇḍampi vejjassa asammukhā pivantānaṃ pamāṇaṃ vā uggamanaṃ vā niggamanaṃ vā na jānāmāti āsaṅkā hoti.
atk-s0302a:187_27: Evameva amhākaṃ dhammassāmi satthā sammukhībhūtoti vīriyaṃ katvā pivathāti maṇḍapāne nesaṃ niyojento tasmātiha,
atk-s0302a:187_31: Idāni niyojanānurūpaṃ sikkhitabbataṃ niddisanto attatthaṃ vā hi,
atk-s0302a:189_5: Evaṃ santepi “jānato”ti ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ upādāya puggalaṃ niddisati.
atk-s0302a:189_11: Āsavānaṃ khayanti ettha āsavānaṃ pahānaṃ asamuppādo khīṇākāro natthibhāvoti ayampi āsavakkhayoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:189_13: “Āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimutti”ntiādīsu hi khīṇākāro āsavakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:189_14: “Yo āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhāna”nti ettha bhaṅgo.
atk-s0302a:191_0: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. ; –
atk-s0302a:192_1: So hi āsave khepento vūpasamento uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:194_4: No ajānato no apassatoti yo pana na jānāti na passati,
atk-s0302a:194_6: Etena ye ajānato apassatopi saṃsārādīhiyeva suddhiṃ vadanti,
atk-s0302a:195_0: Idāni yaṃ jānato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti,
atk-s0302a:195_5: Dabbajātiko eva hi koci bhikkhu chattaṃ kātuṃ jānāti,
atk-s0302a:195_7: tassa īdisāni kammāni vattasīse ṭhatvā karontassa sā jānanā saggamaggaphalānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:195_8: Yo pana sāsane pabbajitvā vejjakammādīni kātuṃ jānāti,
atk-s0302a:195_10: Tasmā yaṃ jānato passato ca āsavānaṃ khayo hoti,
atk-s0302a:195_11: tadeva dassento iti rūpantiādimāha. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0302a:195_13: jānatoti evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ jānantassa.
atk-s0302a:195_14: Āsavānaṃ khayo hotīti āsavānaṃ khayante jātattā “āsavānaṃ khayo”ti laddhanāmaṃ arahattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:196_0: Evaṃ arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā idāni khīṇāsavassa āgamanīyaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ yampissa taṃ,
atk-s0302a:196_2: Tattha khayasmiṃ khayeñāṇanti āsavakkhayasaṅkhāte arahattaphale paṭiladdhe sati paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:196_3: Tañhi arahattaphalasaṅkhāte khayasmiṃ paṭhamavāraṃ uppanne pacchā uppannattā khayeñāṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:196_7: Evaṃ ito paresupi labbhamānavasena paccayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:197_1: So hi kilese virājento khepento uppanno,
atk-s0302a:197_5: Balavavipassanāti bhayatūpaṭṭhāne ñāṇaṃ ādīnavānupassane ñāṇaṃ muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:197_9: Taruṇavipassanāti saṅkhāraparicchede ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇe ñāṇaṃ sammasane ñāṇaṃ maggāmagge ñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:197_15: Sā hi appanāpubbabhāgassa sukhassa paccayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:197_27: (So hi savikārāya jātiyā paccayo hoti.) Etenupāyena sesapadānipi veditabbāni.
atk-s0302a:198_1: Pabbatakandarapadarasākhāti ettha kandaraṃ nāma ‘ka’ntiladdhanāmena udakena dārito udakabhinno pabbatapadeso,
atk-s0302a:198_3: Padaraṃ nāma aṭṭhamāse deve avassante phalito bhūmippadeso.
atk-s0302a:199_0: Yathā pabbatamatthake devo vassitvā pabbatakandarādīni pūrento anupubbena mahāsamuddaṃ sāgaraṃ pūreti,
atk-s0302a:199_1: evaṃ avijjāpabbatamatthake tāva abhisaṅkhārameghassa vassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:199_2: Assutavā hi bālaputhujjano avijjāya aññāṇī hutvā taṇhāya abhilāsaṃ katvā kusalākusalakammaṃ āyūhati,
atk-s0302a:199_5: Iti pabbatamatthake vuṭṭhadevassa kandarādayo pūretvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitakālo viya avijjāpabbatamatthake
atk-s0302a:199_6: vuṭṭhassa abhisaṅkhārameghassa paramparapaccayatāya anupubbena viññāṇādivaṭṭaṃ pūretvā ṭhitakālo.
atk-s0302a:199_7: Buddhavacanaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ agahitampi “idha tathāgato loke uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:199_8: agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajatī”ti imāya pāḷiyā vasena gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:199_11: So buddhānaṃ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgamma vaṭṭadosadīpakaṃ lakkhaṇāhaṭaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā vaṭṭavasena pīḷito hoti,
atk-s0302a:199_12: evamassa savikārā khandhajāti vaṭṭadukkhassa paccayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:199_13: So vaṭṭadukkhena pīḷito aparāparaṃ saddhaṃ janetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajati,
atk-s0302a:199_15: So pabbajjāmatteneva asantuṭṭho ūnapañcavassakāle nissayaṃ gahetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ pūrento dvemātikā
atk-s0302a:199_16: paguṇaṃ katvā kammākammaṃ uggahetvā yāva arahattā nijjaṭaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasanto
atk-s0302a:199_24: So samādhinā cittakallataṃ janetvā taruṇavipassanāya kammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0302a:199_30: Evaṃ devassa anupubbena sāgaraṃ pūretvā ṭhitakālo viya khīṇāsavassa vimuttisāgaraṃ pūretvā ṭhitakālo veditabboti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:201_5: Yathā “gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti nikkhantapuriso taṃ gāmaṃ appattopi “kahaṃ itthannāmo”ti vutte “gāmaṃ gato”ti vuccati, evaṃ.
atk-s0302a:201_6: Atippagoti tadā kira therassa atippagoyeva nikkhantadivaso ahosi,
atk-s0302a:201_7: atippagoyeva nikkhantabhikkhū bodhiyaṅgaṇe cetiyaṅgaṇe nivāsanapārupanaṭṭhāneti imesu ṭhānesu yāva bhikkhācāravelā hoti,
atk-s0302a:201_10: tāva paribbājakehi saddhiṃ ekadvekathāvāre karissāmī”ti cintayato yaṃnūnāhanti etadahosi.
atk-s0302a:201_11: Paribbājakānaṃ ārāmoti so kira ārāmo dakkhiṇadvārassa ca veḷuvanassa ca antarā ahosi.
atk-s0302a:201_13: Kiṃvādī kimakkhāyīti kiṃ vadati kiṃ ācikkhati,
atk-s0302a:201_14: kiṃ ettha samaṇassa gotamassa dassananti pucchanti.
atk-s0302a:201_18: Sahadhammiko vādānupātoti parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādānupāto vādappavatti
atk-s0302a:201_19: viññūhi garahitabbaṃ kāraṇaṃ koci appamattakopi kathaṃ nāgaccheyya?
atk-s0302a:201_21: kathaṃ sabbākārenapi samaṇassa gotamassa vāde gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na bhaveyyāti?
atk-s0302a:202_0: Iti vadanti phassapaccayā dukkhanti evaṃ vadantoti attho.
atk-s0302a:202_2: Te vata aññatra phassāti idaṃ “tadapi phassapaccayā”ti paṭiññāya sādhakavacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:202_3: Yasmā hi na vinā phassena dukkhapaṭisaṃvedanā atthi,
atk-s0302a:202_4: tasmā jānitabbametaṃ yathā “tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0302a:203_5: Idaṃ vacanaṃ “na kevalaṃ sāriputtova rājagahaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0302a:203_9: Na kevalañca tasseva sā titthiyehi saddhiṃ kathā jātā,
atk-s0302a:204_1: Vacanattho panettha accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttanti acchariyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:204_3: Ekena padenāti “phassapaccayā dukkha”nti iminā ekena padena.
atk-s0302a:204_7: Idāni thero jarāmaraṇādikāya paṭiccasamuppādakathāya taṃ atthagambhīrañceva gambhīrāvabhāsañca karonto sace maṃ,
atk-s0302a:204_9: tadeva padaṃ gahetvā vivaṭṭaṃ dassento channaṃtvevātiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:206_4: yasmā idaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ na kevalaṃ phassapaccayā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:206_11: tasmā tassa aparampi paccayavisesaṃ dassetuṃ kāye vā hānanda,
atk-s0302a:206_15: Ettha ca kāyadvāre kāmāvacarakusalākusalavasena vīsati cetanā labbhanti,
atk-s0302a:206_17: Manodvāre navahi rūpārūpacetanāhi saddhiṃ ekūnatiṃsāti tīsu dvāresu ekūnasattati cetanā honti,
atk-s0302a:206_19: Avijjāpaccayā cāti idaṃ tāpi cetanā avijjāpaccayā hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:206_20: Yasmā pana taṃ yathāvuttacetanābhedaṃ kāyasaṅkhārañceva vacīsaṅkhārañca manosaṅkhārañca parehi anussāhito sāmaṃ asaṅkhārikacittena karoti,
atk-s0302a:206_25: mātāpitūsu cetiyavandanādīni karontesu anukarontā dārakā viya kevalaṃ kammameva jānanto “imassa pana
atk-s0302a:206_26: kammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti vipākaṃ ajānantopi karoti,
atk-s0302a:206_27: tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ sāmaṃ vā taṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0302a:207_1: dhammesūti ye ime “sāmaṃ vā taṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0302a:207_2: kāyasaṅkhāra”ntiādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu vuttā chasattati dvesatā cetanādhammā,
atk-s0302a:207_4: Sabbepi hi te “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:207_6: So kāyo na hotīti yasmiṃ kāye sati kāyasañcetanāpaccayaṃ ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:207_19: Khīṇāsavena hi kataṃ kammaṃ neva kusalaṃ hoti nākusalaṃ.
atk-s0302a:207_21: tenassa te kāyādayo na hontīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:208_0: Khettaṃ taṃ na hotītiādīsupi viruhanaṭṭhena taṃ khettaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0302a:208_5: sā sañcetanā etesaṃ viruhanādīnaṃ atthānaṃ abhāvena tassa sukhadukkhassa neva khettaṃ,
atk-s0302a:209_0: Chaṭṭhaṃ upavāṇasuttaṃ uttānameva. Ettha pana vaṭṭadukkhameva kathitanti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:211_1: Sattame paṭipāṭiyā vuttesu pariyosānapadaṃ gahetvā katamañca,
atk-s0302a:211_4: Evaṃ paccayaṃ pajānātīti evaṃ dukkhasaccavasena paccayaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0302a:211_15: Amatadvāraṃ āhacca tiṭṭhatīti amataṃ nāma nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:213_2: Te hi parīti upasaggaṃ pakkhipitvā vuccamāne paṭivijjhituṃ sakkonti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:214_0: Dasame sabbaṃ uttānameva. Imesu dvīsu suttesu catusaccapaṭivedhova kathito. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:218_2: Saṅkhātadhammāseti saṅkhātadhammā vuccanti ñātadhammā tulitadhammā tīritadhammā.
atk-s0302a:218_4: Puthūti teyeva satta jane sandhāya puthūti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:218_9: Iriyanti vuttiṃ ācāraṃ gocaraṃ vihāraṃ paṭipattiṃ.
atk-s0302a:218_11: Sekkhānañca saṅkhātadhammānañca khīṇāsavānañca paṭipattiṃ mayā pucchito paṇḍita, mārisa,
atk-s0302a:219_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti kasmā yāva tatiyaṃ puṭṭho tuṇhī ahosi?
atk-s0302a:219_6: sā ca khandhavasena dhātuvasena āyatanavasena paccayākāravasenāti bahūhi kāraṇehi sakkā kathetuṃ.
atk-s0302a:219_7: Kathaṃ kathento nu kho satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti?
atk-s0302a:219_9: “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño pattaṃ ādāya caranto sāvako nāma paññāya sāriputtasamo natthi.
atk-s0302a:219_10: Ayampi mayā pañhaṃ puṭṭho yāva tatiyaṃ tuṇhī eva.
atk-s0302a:219_13: Atha “ajjhāsaye”ti ñatvā pañhakathanatthāya nayaṃ dadamāno bhūtamidanti,
atk-s0302a:220_4: imaṃ pañhaṃ kathehī”ti therassa nayaṃ deti.
atk-s0302a:220_5: Sahanayadānena pana therassa tīre ṭhitapurisassa vivaṭo ekaṅgaṇo mahāsamuddo viya nayasatena nayasahassena pañhabyākaraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:220_9: Sammappaññāya passatīti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya sammā passati.
atk-s0302a:220_10: Paṭipanno hotīti sīlato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā nibbidādīnaṃ atthāya paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0302a:220_13: tasmā taṃ āhārasambhavaṃ nāma katvā dassetuṃ idaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:220_14: Iti imināpi pariyāyena sekkhapaṭipadā kathitā hoti.
atk-s0302a:220_18: tasmā taṃ āhāranirodhasambhavaṃ nāma katvā dassetuṃ idaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:220_19: Iti imināpi pariyāyena sekkhasseva paṭipadā kathitā.
atk-s0302a:220_21: Anupādā vimuttoti catūhi upādānehi kañci dhammaṃ agahetvā vimutto.
atk-s0302a:220_22: Sādhu sādhūti iminā therassa byākaraṇaṃ sampahaṃsetvā sayampi tatheva byākaronto puna “bhūtamida”ntiādimāhāti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:222_5: Assāsamalatthāti assāsaṃ avassayaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ na hi nūna alattha,
atk-s0302a:222_6: tayo magge tīṇi ca phalāni nūna nālatthāti dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:222_8: na sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatteyyāti ayaṃ therassa adhippāyo.
atk-s0302a:222_15: Āyatiṃ panāvusoti iminā “āyatiṃ paṭisandhi tumhākaṃ ugghāṭitā,
atk-s0302a:222_18: vicikicchāmīti iminā thero tattha vicikicchābhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:223_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti “imaṃ sutakāraṇaṃ bhagavato ārocessāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0302a:223_2: Khīṇā jātīti na therena evaṃ byākatā,
atk-s0302a:223_3: ayaṃ pana thero tuṭṭho pasanno evaṃ padabyañjanāni āropetvā āha.
atk-s0302a:223_4: Aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesīti taṃ sutvā satthā cintesi –
atk-s0302a:223_6: Na so kenaci kāraṇena evaṃ byākarissati.
atk-s0302a:223_8: Pakkosāpetvā naṃ pañhaṃ byākarāpessāmī”ti aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0302a:224_0: Sace taṃ sāriputtāti idaṃ bhagavā “na esa attano dhammatāya aññaṃ byākarissati,
atk-s0302a:224_2: taṃ kathentova aññaṃ byākarissatī”ti aññaṃ byākarāpetuṃ evaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0302a:224_5: tassa paccayassa khayā khīṇasmiṃ jātiyā paccaye jātisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ khīṇanti viditaṃ.
atk-s0302a:224_6: Idhāpi ca thero pañhe akaṅkhitvā ajjhāsaye kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:224_12: kilesā khīṇātiādīhi bahūhi kāraṇehi sakkā byākātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:224_13: kathaṃ kathento pana satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:225_6: Yasmā pana bhagavā uttari pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0302a:225_7: tasmā tena taṃ byākaraṇaṃ anumoditanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:226_0: Kathaṃ jānato pana teti idaṃ kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0302a:226_2: Thero kira sūkaranikhātaleṇadvāre dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasutte kathiyamāne tālavaṇṭaṃ
atk-s0302a:226_3: gahetvā satthāraṃ bījayamāno ṭhito tisso vedanā pariggahetvā sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ adhigato,
atk-s0302a:226_5: Imasmiṃ savisaye ṭhito sīhanādaṃ nadissatīti naṃ sandhāya satthā idaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0302a:226_7: Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhanti ettha kiñcāpi sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā,
atk-s0302a:226_10: vipariṇāmakoṭiyā pana sabbāva dukkhā nāma jātā.
atk-s0302a:226_11: Viditanti yasmā evaṃ vedanāttayaṃ dukkhanti viditaṃ,
atk-s0302a:227_1: Thero hi vedanā ekāti vā dve tisso catassoti vā avuttepi vuttanayena tāsaṃ tissoti paricchedaṃ aññāsi,
atk-s0302a:227_3: Dukkhasminti idaṃ bhagavā iminā adhippāyena āha –
atk-s0302a:227_5: yaṃ tayā ‘iminā kāraṇena vedanāsu taṇhā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti byākataṃ,
atk-s0302a:227_7: ‘Tisso vedanā’ti vibhajantena pana te atippapañco kato,
atk-s0302a:227_8: taṃ ‘dukkhasmi’nti byākarontenapi hi te subyākatameva bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:227_10: taṃ dukkhanti ñātamattepi hi vedanāsu taṇhā na tiṭṭhati”.
atk-s0302a:228_1: katarena vimokkhena tayā aññā byākatāti attho?
atk-s0302a:228_11: Tasmā koci bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā te vavatthapetvā bahiddhā otāreti,
atk-s0302a:228_13: tassa ajjhatta saṅkhāre sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:228_14: Iti ajjhattaṃ abhiniveso ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:228_15: Koci ajjhattaṃ saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā te vavatthapetvā bahiddhā otāreti,
atk-s0302a:228_16: tassa bahiddhā saṅkhāre sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:228_17: Iti ajjhattaṃ abhiniveso bahiddhā vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:228_21: tassa bahiddhā saṅkhāre sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:228_22: Iti bahiddhā abhiniveso bahiddhā vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:228_23: Koci bahiddhā saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā te vavatthapetvā ajjhattaṃ otāreti,
atk-s0302a:228_25: Iti bahiddhā abhiniveso ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:228_26: Tatra thero “ajjhattasaṅkhāre pariggahetvā tesaṃ vavatthānakāle maggavuṭṭhānena arahattaṃ pattosmī”ti dassento ajjhattaṃ vimokkhā khvāhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:229_1: Tathā sato viharāmīti tenākārena satiyā samannāgato viharāmi.
atk-s0302a:229_2: Yathā sataṃ viharantanti yenākārena maṃ satiyā samannāgataṃ viharantaṃ.
atk-s0302a:229_3: Āsavā nānussavantīti cakkhuto rūpe savanti āsavanti sandanti pavattantīti evaṃ chahi dvārehi chasu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0302a:230_1: Tesvāhaṃ na kaṅkhāmīti tesu ahaṃ “kataro kāmāsavo,
atk-s0302a:230_6: Te me pahīnāti na vicikicchāmīti te mayhaṃ pahīnāti vicikicchaṃ na uppādemi.
atk-s0302a:230_7: Idaṃ bhagavā “evaṃ byākarontenapi tayā subyākataṃ bhaveyya ‘ajjhattaṃ vimokkhā khvāhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:230_8: āvuso’tiādīni pana te vadantena atippapañco kato”ti dassento āha.
atk-s0302a:231_0: Uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisīti paññattavarabuddhāsanato uṭṭhahitvā vihāraṃ antomahāgandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi asambhinnāya eva parisāya. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:231_1: Buddhā hi aniṭṭhitāya desanāya asambhinnāya parisāya uṭṭhāyāsanā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisantā puggalathomanatthaṃ vā pavisanti dhammathomanatthaṃ vā.
atk-s0302a:231_2: Tattha puggalathomanatthaṃ pavisanto satthā evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0302a:231_3: “imaṃ mayā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ vitthārena ca avibhattaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū uggahetvā
atk-s0302a:231_4: ānandaṃ vā kaccāyanaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pucchissanti,
atk-s0302a:231_11: ahampi naṃ evameva byākareyya’nti evaṃ te puggale thomessāmi.
atk-s0302a:231_12: Tato tesu gāravaṃ janetvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamissanti,
atk-s0302a:231_13: tepi bhikkhū atthe ca dhamme ca niyojessanti,
atk-s0302a:231_14: te tehi niyojitā tisso sikkhā paripūretvā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0302a:232_3: taṃ mama thomanaṃ sutvā gāravajātā bhikkhū imaṃ upasaṅkamitabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:232_5: taṃ tesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti dhammathomanatthaṃ pavisanto evaṃ cintesi yathā dhammadāyādasutte cintesi.
atk-s0302a:232_7: “mayi vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe āmisadāyādaṃ garahanto dhammadāyādañca thomento imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno sāriputto dhammaṃ desessati,
atk-s0302a:232_8: evaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ ekajjhāsayāya matiyā desitā ayaṃ desanā aggā ca garukā ca bhavissati pāsāṇacchattasadisā”ti.
atk-s0302a:233_0: Idha pana āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ ukkaṃsetvā pakāsetvā ṭhapetukāmo puggalathomanatthaṃ uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0302a:233_1: Īdisesu ṭhānesu bhagavā nisinnāsaneyeva antarahito cittagatiyā vihāraṃ pavisatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:233_4: sā ekavāraṃ bhinnā puna dussannipātā bhaveyyāti bhagavā adissamānena kāyena cittagatiyā eva pāvisi.
atk-s0302a:234_0: Evaṃ paviṭṭhe pana bhagavati bhagavato adhippāyānurūpameva sīhanādaṃ naditukāmo tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto
atk-s0302a:234_2: Pubbe appaṭisaṃviditanti idaṃ nāma pucchissatīti pubbe mayā aviditaṃ aññātaṃ.
atk-s0302a:234_6: evaṃ puccheyyuṃ kathaṃ jānatā pana tayā,
atk-s0302a:234_8: kathaṃ passatā aññā byākatā khīṇā jātī”ti imaṃ paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:234_14: jātī”ti evaṃ vissajjitaṃ paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodi.
atk-s0302a:235_0: Etadahosīti bhagavatā anumodite nayasatena nayasahassena pañhassa ekaṅgaṇikabhāvena pākaṭībhūtattā etaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:235_1: Divasampāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyanti sakaladivasampi ahaṃ bhagavato etaṃ paṭiccasamuppādatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:235_3: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ kirassa ahosi –
atk-s0302a:236_0: Sā hi bhikkhu sāriputtassa dhammadhātūti ettha dhammadhātūti paccayākārassa vivaṭabhāvadassanasamatthaṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:236_2: Yathā buddhānaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannā dhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa pākaṭā honti,
atk-s0302a:236_3: evaṃ therassa sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ sabbepi sāvakañāṇassa gocaradhamme jānātīti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:238_1: Tatiye taṃ suṇāthāti taṃ ñāṇavatthudesanaṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0302a:238_3: Jarāmaraṇe ñāṇantiādīsu catūsu paṭhamaṃ savanamayañāṇaṃ sammasanañāṇaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti catubbidhaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0302a:238_5: Tatiyaṃ pana ṭhapetvā sammasanañāṇaṃ tividhameva hoti,
atk-s0302a:238_9: Iminā dhammenāti iminā catusaccadhammena vā maggañāṇadhammena vā.
atk-s0302a:239_2: Akālikenāti kiñci kālaṃ anatikkamitvā paṭivedhānantaraṃyeva phaladāyakena.
atk-s0302a:239_5: Atītānāgate nayaṃ netīti “ye kho kecī”tiādinā nayena atīte ca anāgate ca nayaṃ neti.
atk-s0302a:239_6: Ettha ca na catusaccadhammena vā maggañāṇadhammena vā sakkā atītānāgate nayaṃ netuṃ,
atk-s0302a:239_7: catusacce pana maggañāṇena paṭividdhe parato paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:239_11: etarahīti yathā ahaṃ etarahi catusaccavasena jānāmi.
atk-s0302a:239_16: Imasmiṃ sutte khīṇāsavassa sekkhabhūmi kathitā hoti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:241_1: Catutthe sattasattarīti satta ca sattari ca.
atk-s0302a:241_4: tasmā tesaṃ ajjhāsayena idaṃ suttaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:241_6: Paccayākāro hi dhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhitikāraṇattā dhammaṭṭhitīti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:241_13: Sattasattarīti ekekasmiṃ satta satta katvā ekādasasu padesu sattasattari.
atk-s0302a:243_1: Pañcame samudayo hotīti satthā idheva desanaṃ osāpesi.
atk-s0302a:243_6: athassāhaṃ vissajjessāmīti tassa okāsadānatthaṃ desanaṃ osāpesi.
atk-s0302a:243_13: yathā pana satasahassagghanike suvaṇṇathāle vaḍḍhitassa subhojanassa matthake āmalakamattepi gūthapiṇḍe
atk-s0302a:243_14: ṭhapite sabbaṃ bhojanaṃ dubbhojanaṃ hoti chaḍḍetabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:243_16: Iminā sattūpaladdhivādapadena gūthapiṇḍena taṃ bhojanaṃ dubbhojanaṃ viya ayampi sabbo duppañhova jātoti.
atk-s0302a:244_1: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti yassa hi ayaṃ diṭṭhi,
atk-s0302a:244_4: Evaṃ gaṇhato sā diṭṭhi “satto ucchijjatī”ti gahitattā ucchedadiṭṭhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:244_5: Sace pana saṅkhārāva uppajjanti ceva nirujjhanti cāti gaṇheyya,
atk-s0302a:244_7: Ariyamaggo ca nāmeso vaṭṭaṃ nirodhento vaṭṭaṃ samucchindanto uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:244_8: tadeva taṃ vaṭṭaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiyā gahitākārassa sambhave sati vināva maggabhāvanāya nirujjhatīti maggabhāvanā niratthakā hoti.
atk-s0302a:245_0: Dutiyanaye aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti yassa ayaṃ diṭṭhi,
atk-s0302a:245_3: jīvitaṃ pana pañjarato sakuṇo viya yathāsukhaṃ gacchatī”ti gaṇhāti.
atk-s0302a:245_4: Evaṃ gaṇhato sā diṭṭhi “imasmā lokā jīvitaṃ paralokaṃ gata”nti gahitattā sassatadiṭṭhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:245_6: so ekasaṅkhārepi nicce dhuve sassate sati uppannopi vaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkotīti maggabhāvanā niratthakā hoti.
atk-s0302a:245_7: Tena vuttaṃ “aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā bhikkhu diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso na hotī”ti.
atk-s0302a:246_1: Sā hi sammādiṭṭhiyā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena visūkamiva attānaṃ āvaraṇato visūkāyikaṃ,
atk-s0302a:246_2: sammādiṭṭhiṃ ananuvattitvā tassā virodhena pavattanato visevitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:246_3: kadāci ucchedassa kadāci sassatassa gahaṇato virūpaṃ phanditaṃ vipphanditanti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:246_5: puna aviruhaṇaṭṭhena matthakacchinnatālo viya samūlaṃ tālaṃ uddharitvā tassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ viya ca katānīti attho.
atk-s0302a:248_3: yo vadeyyāti tassaṃ parisati diṭṭhigatiko pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo atthi,
atk-s0302a:248_4: so pana avisāradadhātuko uṭṭhāya dasabalaṃ pucchituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:248_5: tasmā tassa ajjhāsayena sayameva pucchitvā vissajjento satthā evamāha. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:250_1: Sattame na tumhākanti attani hi sati attaniyaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:250_4: Napi aññesanti añño nāma paresaṃ attā,
atk-s0302a:252_11: anusetīti dvādasannaṃ cetanānaṃ sahajātakoṭiyā ceva upanissayakoṭiyā ca anusayo gahito.
atk-s0302a:252_12: Ārammaṇametaṃ hotīti (cetanādidhammajāte sati kammaviññāṇassa uppattiyā avāritattā) etaṃ cetanādidhammajātaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:252_16: Patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hotīti tassa kammaviññāṇassa patiṭṭhā hoti.
atk-s0302a:252_17: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇeti tasmiṃ kammaviññāṇe patiṭṭhite.
atk-s0302a:252_18: Virūḷheti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya nibbattamūle jāte.
atk-s0302a:253_3: No ce pakappetīti iminā taṇhādiṭṭhikappānaṃ appavattanakkhaṇo.
atk-s0302a:253_4: Atha ce anusetīti iminā tebhūmakavipākesu parittakiriyāsu rūpeti ettha appahīnakoṭiyā anusayo gahito.
atk-s0302a:253_5: Ārammaṇametaṃ hotīti anusaye sati kammaviññāṇassa uppattiyā avāritattā etaṃ anusayajātaṃ paccayova hoti.
atk-s0302a:254_0: No ceva cetetītiādīsu paṭhamapade tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā nivattā,
atk-s0302a:254_2: tatiyapade vuttappakāresu dhammesu yo appahīnakoṭiyā anusayito anusayo,
atk-s0302a:255_3: na ceteti na pakappeti na anusetīti idampi catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:255_5: Dutiyanaye cetetīti tebhūmakakusalacetanā ceva catasso ca akusalacetanā gahitā.
atk-s0302a:255_6: Na pakappetīti aṭṭhasu cittesu taṇhādiṭṭhiyo nivattā.
atk-s0302a:255_8: catūsu akusalacetanāsu sahajātakoṭiyā ceva upanissayakoṭiyā ca anusayo gahito.
atk-s0302a:255_10: na pakappetīti aṭṭhasu cittesu taṇhādiṭṭhiyo nivattā,
atk-s0302a:255_11: anusetīti sutte āgataṃ vāretvā tebhūmakakusalākusalavipākakiriyārūpesu appahīnakoṭiyā upanissayo gahito.
atk-s0302a:256_5: Ettha ca viññāṇassa ceva āyatiṃ punabbhavassa ca antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:260_2: Sā hi piyarūpesu rūpādīsu namanaṭṭhena “natī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:260_3: Āgati gati hotīti āgatimhi gati hoti,
atk-s0302a:260_4: āgate paccupaṭṭhite kamme vā kammanimitte vā gahinimitte vā paṭisandhivasena viññāṇassa gati hoti.
atk-s0302a:260_5: Cutūpapātoti evaṃ viññāṇassa āgate paṭisandhivisaye gatiyā sati ito cavanasaṅkhātā cuti,
atk-s0302a:260_6: tatthūpapattisaṅkhāto upapātoti ayaṃ cutūpapāto nāma hoti.
