atk-s0302a:260_7: Evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte natiyā ca āgatigatiyā ca antare ekova sandhi kathitoti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:264_4: (sotāpattiyā ca aṅgaṃ,) yaṃ pubbabhāge sotāpattipaṭilābhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0302a:264_6: paṭiladdhaguṇassa ca sotāpattiṃ patvā ṭhitassa aṅgaṃ,
atk-s0302a:264_11: Ñāyoti paṭiccasamuppannaṃ ñatvā ṭhitañāṇampi paṭiccasamuppādopi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:264_15: Sudiṭṭho hotīti aparāparaṃ uppajjitvā dassanavasena suṭṭhu diṭṭho.
atk-s0302a:265_0: Khīṇanirayotiādīsu āyatiṃ tattha anuppajjanatāya khīṇo nirayo mayhanti so ahaṃ khīṇanirayo.
atk-s0302a:265_5: Sambodhiparāyanoti uttarimaggattayasaṅkhāto sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ mayhanti sohaṃ sambodhiparāyano,
atk-s0302a:266_2: Verañca nāmetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti bāhiraṃ ajjhattikanti.
atk-s0302a:266_3: Ekena hi ekassa pitā mārito hoti,
atk-s0302a:266_4: so cintesi “etena kira me pitā mārito,
atk-s0302a:266_5: ahampi taṃyeva māressāmī”ti nisitaṃ satthaṃ ādāya carati.
atk-s0302a:266_8: Yā pana itarassa “ayaṃ kira maṃ māressāmīti carati,
atk-s0302a:266_9: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ māressāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:266_12: Yā pana taṃ niraye uppannaṃ disvā “etaṃ paharissāmī”ti jalitaṃ ayamuggaraṃ gaṇhato nirayapālassa cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:266_14: Yā cassa “ayaṃ niddosaṃ maṃ paharissāmīti āgacchati,
atk-s0302a:266_15: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ paharissāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:266_24: surāmadamattena idaṃ nāma kata”ntiādinā nayena veruppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:266_31: taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge anussatiniddese vuttameva. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:270_2: Samudayanti dve samudayā khaṇikasamudayo ca paccayasamudayo ca.
atk-s0302a:270_8: Desessāmīti idaṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa samudayaatthaṅgamaṃ nibbattibhedaṃ nāma desessāmi,
atk-s0302a:270_10: Paṭiccāti nissayavasena ceva ārammaṇavasena ca paccayaṃ katvā.
atk-s0302a:270_11: Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phassoti tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phasso. Ayaṃ kho,
atk-s0302a:270_13: dukkhassa samudayoti ayaṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa nibbatti nāma.
atk-s0302a:270_15: Evañhi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti appaṭisandhiyaṃ. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:272_0: 44. Catutthe lokassāti saṅkhāralokassa. Ayamettha viseso. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:274_5: yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatena sakkā hoti bhagavato saddaṃ sotuṃ,
atk-s0302a:274_7: So kira gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanatthaṃ āgato attano kammaṃ pahāya bhagavato dhammaghosaṃ suṇanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:274_8: Addasāti tadā kira bhagavato āditova paccayākāraṃ manasikarontassa “idaṃ iminā paccayena hoti,
atk-s0302a:274_9: idaṃ iminā”ti āvajjato yāva bhavaggā ekaṅgaṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0302a:274_10: satthā manasikāraṃ pahāya vacasā sajjhāyaṃ karonto yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā,
atk-s0302a:274_11: “api nu kho imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ koci assosī”ti āvajjento taṃ bhikkhumaddasa.
atk-s0302a:275_1: Atha vā assosi noti amhākaṃ bhāsantānaṃ assosīti.
atk-s0302a:275_2: Uggaṇhāhītiādīsu sutvā tuṇhībhūtova paguṇaṃ karonto uggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-s0302a:275_3: Padānupadaṃ ghaṭetvā vācāya paricitaṃ karonto pariyāpuṇāti nāma.
atk-s0302a:275_4: Ubhayathāpi paguṇaṃ ādhārappattaṃ karonto dhāreti nāma.
atk-s0302a:275_7: Iti tīsupi imesu suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:277_0: 46. Chaṭṭhe aññataroti nāmavasena apākaṭo aññataro brāhmaṇo. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:279_0: 47. Sattame jāṇussoṇīti ṭhānantaravasena evaṃladdhanāmo asītikoṭivibhavo mahāpurohito. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:281_5: mahantaṃ gambhīranti upadhāritabbaṃ parittaṃ bhāvaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ.
atk-s0302a:281_9: devamanussādibhāvena paṭhamaṃ hutvā pacchā na hotīti ucchedaṃ sandhāya pucchati.
atk-s0302a:281_13: sabbaṃ puthutta”nti imā dve ucchedadiṭṭhiyoti veditabbā. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:283_0: 49. Navame kiṃ nu khoti saṃsayuppattiākāradassanaṃ. Samudayatīti uppajjati. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:285_0: 50. Dasame dvepi nayā ekato vuttā. Idameva purimena nānattaṃ, sesaṃ tādisamevāti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:289_2: Jarāmaraṇanti kasmā jarāmaraṇaṃ ekameva “anekavidhaṃ nānappakāraka”nti vatvā gahitanti ce?
atk-s0302a:289_4: Yathā hi cūḷāya gahite purise so puriso gahitova hoti,
atk-s0302a:289_5: evaṃ jarāmaraṇe gahite sabbadukkhaṃ gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0302a:289_6: Tasmā “yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjatī”ti nhatvā ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ viya sabbadukkhaṃ
atk-s0302a:289_7: dassetvā taṃ cūḷāya gaṇhanto viya jarāmaraṇaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:290_0: Jarāmaraṇanirodhasāruppagāminīti jarāmaraṇanirodhassa sāruppabhāvena nikkilesatāya parisuddhatāya sadisāva hutvā gāminīti attho.
atk-s0302a:290_1: Tathā paṭipanno ca hotīti yathā taṃ paṭipannoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:290_5: Dukkhakkhayāya paṭipannoti sīlaṃ ādiṃ katvā jarāmaraṇadukkhassa nirodhatthāya paṭipanno.
atk-s0302a:291_0: Idāni arahattaphalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ satatavihārañca dassetvā desanā nivattetabbā siyā,
atk-s0302a:291_1: tathā akatvā avijjāgatoti idaṃ kasmā gaṇhātīti?
atk-s0302a:291_3: Apica puna vaṭṭaṃ ārabhitvā vivaṭṭe kathiyamāne bujjhanakasatto cettha atthi,
atk-s0302a:291_5: Tattha avijjāgatoti avijjāya gato upagato samannāgato.
atk-s0302a:291_8: Buddhānañhi sammutikathā paramatthakathāti dve kathā honti.
atk-s0302a:291_9: Tattha “satto naro puriso puggalo tisso nāgo”ti evaṃ pavattā sammutikathā nāma.
atk-s0302a:291_10: “Khandhā dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti evaṃ pavattā paramatthakathā nāma.
atk-s0302a:291_12: Te sammutiṃ kathentāpi paramatthaṃ kathentāpi saccameva kathenti.
atk-s0302a:296_2: Puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇanti kammaviññāṇaṃ kammapuññena upagataṃ sampayuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:296_4: Apuññaṃ ce saṅkhāranti dvādasacetanābhedaṃ apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti.
atk-s0302a:296_8: Ettha ca tividhassa kammābhisaṅkhārassa gahitattā dvādasapadiko paccayākāro gahitova hoti.
atk-s0302a:297_4: Ettha ca paṭhamameva avijjāya pahīnāya vijjā uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:297_5: Yathā pana caturaṅgepi tame rattiṃ padīpujjalena andhakāro pahīyati,
atk-s0302a:297_7: Na kiñci loke upādiyatīti loke kiñci dhammaṃ na gaṇhāti na parāmasati.
atk-s0302a:297_8: Anupādiyaṃ na paritassatīti anupādiyanto agaṇhanto neva taṇhāparitassanāya,
atk-s0302a:298_0: So sukhaṃ ce vedananti idaṃ kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0302a:298_1: Khīṇāsavassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dassetvā satatavihāraṃ dassetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:298_6: Sukhaṃ abhinandantoyeva hi dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāma dukkhaṃ patvā sukhaṃ patthanato sukhassa ca vipariṇāmadukkhatoti.
atk-s0302a:299_0: Tattha pañcadvārikavedanā pacchā uppajjitvā paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati,
atk-s0302a:299_3: Pañcadvārikā pavatte pañcadvāravasena pavattamānā paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena adhimattā balavatī hoti,
atk-s0302a:299_5: saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya parihāyamānā asītinavutivassakāle mandā hoti.
atk-s0302a:299_6: Tadā hi sattā “cirarattaṃ ekato nisīdimhā nipajjimhā”ti vadantepi “na sañjānāmā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0302a:299_8: “sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ vā sāduṃ asāduṃ vā thaddhaṃ mudukanti vā na jānāmā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0302a:299_11: Sāpi anupubbena parihāyamānā maraṇasamaye hadayakoṭiṃyeva nissāya pavattati.
atk-s0302a:301_0: Yathā hi puriso pañcaudakamaggasampannaṃ vāpiṃ kareyya,
atk-s0302a:301_1: paṭhamaṃ deve vuṭṭhe pañcahi udakamaggehi udakaṃ pavisitvā antovāpiyaṃ āvāṭe pūreyya,
atk-s0302a:301_2: punappunaṃ deve vassante udakamagge pūretvā gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ottharitvā udakaṃ tiṭṭheyya tato tato vissandamānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:301_3: atha niddhamanatumbe vivaritvā khettesu kamme kariyamāne udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ,
atk-s0302a:301_4: sassapākakāle (udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ,) udakaṃ parihīnaṃ “macche gaṇhāmā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:302_0: Paṭhamaṃ deve vassante pañcahi maggehi udake pavisante āvāṭānaṃ pūraṇakālo viya hi paṭhamameva paṭisandhikkhaṇe
atk-s0302a:302_2: punappunaṃ deve vassante pañcannaṃ maggānaṃ pūritakālo viya pavatte pañcadvārikavedanāya pavattikālo,
atk-s0302a:302_3: gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanādivasena tassā adhimattabalavabhāvo,
atk-s0302a:302_5: tāva pūrāya vāpiyā ṭhitakālo viya paññāsavassakāle tassā ṭhitakālo,
atk-s0302a:302_6: niddhamanatumbesu vivaṭesu kammante kariyamāne udakassa nikkhamanakālo viya saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya tassā parihāni,
atk-s0302a:302_7: udake bhaṭṭhe udakamaggesu parittodakassa ṭhitakālo viya asītinavutivassakāle pañcadvārikavedanāya mandakālo,
atk-s0302a:302_8: āvāṭesuyeva udakassa patiṭṭhānakālo viya hadayavatthukoṭiṃ nissāya manodvārikavedanāya pavattikālo,
atk-s0302a:302_9: āvāṭesu parittepi udake sati “vāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthī”ti vattabbakālo viya yāva sā pavattati,
atk-s0302a:302_11: Yathā pana āvāṭesu udake chinne “natthi vāpiyaṃ udaka”nti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:302_13: Imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno”ti.
atk-s0302a:304_5: ādittakumbhakārapāko viya hi tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0302a:304_9: daṇḍakena uṇhakumbhaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā same bhūmibhāge kumbhassa ṭhapitakālo viya āraddhavipassakassa rūpasattakaṃ
atk-s0302a:304_10: arūpasattakaṃ vipassantassa kammaṭṭhāne ca paguṇe vibhūte upaṭṭhahamāne tathārūpaṃ utusappāyādiṃ labhitvā
atk-s0302a:304_11: ekāsane nisinnassa vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ patvā catūhi apāyehi attabhāvaṃ uddharitvā
atk-s0302a:304_13: Khīṇāsavo pana uṇhakumbho viya arahattappattadivaseyeva na parinibbāti,
atk-s0302a:304_14: sāsanappaveṇiṃ pana ghaṭayamāno paṇṇāsasaṭṭhivassāni ṭhatvā carimakacittappattiyā upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāti.
atk-s0302a:304_15: Athassa kumbhassa viya kapallāni anupādiṇṇakasarīrāneva avasissantīti.
atk-s0302a:304_16: Sarīrāni avasissantīti pajānātīti idaṃ pana khīṇāsavassa anuyogāropanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:305_2: Evametanti yadetaṃ tividhe abhisaṅkhāre asati paṭisandhiviññāṇassa appaññāṇantiādi,
atk-s0302a:305_5: Esevanto dukkhassāti ayameva vaṭṭadukkhassa anto ayaṃ paricchedo,
atk-s0302a:307_1: Dutiye upādāniyesūti catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ paccayesu tebhūmakadhammesu.
atk-s0302a:307_6: Evameva khoti ettha aggikkhandho viya hi tayo bhavā,
atk-s0302a:307_9: sukkhatiṇagomayādipakkhipanaṃ viya assādānupassino puthujjanassa taṇhādivasena chahi dvārehi kusalākusalakammakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:307_10: Tiṇagomayādīsu khīṇesu punappunaṃ tesaṃ pakkhipanena aggikkhandhassa vaḍḍhanaṃ viya bālaputhujjanassa
atk-s0302a:308_0: Na kālena kālaṃ sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyāti tañhi koci atthakāmo evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-s0302a:308_1: “bho kasmā uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya kalāpe bandhitvā sukkhatiṇakaṭṭhānaṃ pacchiyañca pūretvā sukkhagomayāni pakkhipanto etaṃ aggiṃ jālesi?
atk-s0302a:308_2: Api nu te atthi itonidānaṃ kāci vaḍḍhīti?
atk-s0302a:308_6: Ahañhi imaṃ aggiṃ jagganto neva nhāyituṃ na bhuñjituṃ na nipajjituṃ labhāmīti.
atk-s0302a:308_7: Tena hi bho kiṃ te iminā niratthakena aggijālanena?
atk-s0302a:308_8: Ehi tvaṃ etāni ābhatāni tiṇādīni ettha nikkhipa,
atk-s0302a:308_10: tvaṃ pana asukasmiṃ ṭhāne sītodakā pokkharaṇī atthi,
atk-s0302a:308_12: mālāgandhavilepanehi attānaṃ maṇḍetvā sunivattho supārutova pādukāhi nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaramāruyha
atk-s0302a:308_13: vātapānaṃ vivaritvā mahāvīthiyaṃ virocamāno nisīda ekaggo sukhasamappito hutvā,
atk-s0302a:308_14: tattha te nisinnassa tiṇādīnaṃ khayena sayameva ayaṃ aggi appaṇṇattibhāvaṃ gamissatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:308_16: Tatheva ca tattha nisinnassa so aggi upādānakkhayena appaṇṇattibhāvaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-s0302a:309_0: Evameva khoti ettha pana idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ –
atk-s0302a:309_1: cattālīsāya kaṭṭhavāhānaṃ jalamāno mahāaggikkhandho viya hi tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:309_4: tena purisena tassa dinnaovādo viya tathāgatena “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0302a:309_6: evaṃ vaṭṭadukkhā muccissasī”ti tassa tebhūmakadhammesu kammaṭṭhānassa kathitakālo,
atk-s0302a:309_7: tassa purisassa yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā pāsāde nisinnakālo viya yogino sugatovādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0302a:309_8: suññāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa tebhūmakadhammesu vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā anukkamena yathānurūpaṃ āhārasappāyādiṃ labhitvā,
atk-s0302a:309_10: tassa nhānavilepanādīhi sudhotamaṇḍitakāyattā tasmiṃ nisinnassa ekaggasukhasamappitakālo viya yogino
atk-s0302a:309_11: ariyamaggapokkharaṇiyaṃ maggañāṇodakena sunhātasudhotakilesamalassa hirottappasāṭake nivāsetvā sīlavilepanānulittassa
atk-s0302a:309_12: arahattamaṇḍanena attabhāvaṃ maṇḍetvā vimuttipupphadāmaṃ piḷandhitvā iddhipādapādukā āruyha nibbānanagaraṃ
atk-s0302a:309_13: pavisitvā dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha satipaṭṭhānamahāvīthiyaṃ virocamānassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0302a:309_15: Tassa pana purisassa tasmiṃ nisinnassa tiṇādīnaṃ khayena aggikkhandhassa appaṇṇattigamanakālo viya khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0302a:309_16: yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa mahāvaṭṭavūpasamo
atk-s0302a:311_3: Telaṃ āsiñceyya vaṭṭiṃ upasaṃhareyyāti dīpapaṭijagganatthaṃ telabhājanañca mahantañca vaṭṭikapālaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0302a:311_4: samīpe niccaṃ ṭhitova tele khīṇe telaṃ āsiñceyya,
atk-s0302a:311_6: Sesamettha saddhiṃ opammasaṃsandanena purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:313_0: 54. Catutthe upamaṃ paṭhamaṃ katvā pacchā attho vutto. Sesaṃ tādisameva. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:315_1: Pañcame uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantīti pathavīrasañca āporasañca upari āropenti.
atk-s0302a:315_2: Ojāya āropitattā hatthasatubbedhassa rukkhassa aṅkuraggesu bindubindūni viya hutvā sineho tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0302a:315_6: mūlehi ojāya ārohanaṃ viya chahi dvārehi kammārohanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:315_7: ojāya abhiruḷhattā mahārukkhassa yāvakappaṭṭhānaṃ viya vaṭṭanissitabālaputhujjanassa chahi dvārehi kammaṃ
atk-s0302a:315_8: āyūhantassa aparāparaṃ vaṭṭassa vaḍḍhanavasena dīgharattaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:316_1: Khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindeyyāti khuddakamahantāni khaṇḍākhaṇḍāni karonto chindeyya.
atk-s0302a:316_8: rukkhassa mūle chinnakālo viya yogino ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā manasikarontassa paññā,
atk-s0302a:316_9: khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindanakālo viya saṅkhepato catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ manasikāro,
atk-s0302a:316_11: sakalikaṃ sakalikaṃ karaṇakālo viya upādārūpassa ceva rūpakkhandhārammaṇassa viññāṇassa cāti imesaṃ vasena nāmarūpapariggaho,
atk-s0302a:316_12: mūlānaṃ upacchedanaṃ viya tasseva nāmarūpassa paccayapariyesanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:316_13: vātātape visosetvā agginā ḍahanakālo viya anupubbena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aññataraṃ sappāyaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0302a:316_14: kammaṭṭhāne vibhūte upaṭṭhahamāne ekapallaṅke nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karontassa aggaphalappatti,
atk-s0302a:316_15: masikaraṇaṃ viya arahattappattadivaseyeva aparinibbāyantassa yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhita kālo,
atk-s0302a:316_16: mahāvāte opunanaṃ nadiyā pavāhanaṃ viya ca upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa vaṭṭavūpasamo veditabbo. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:318_0: 56. Chaṭṭhepi upamaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā attho vutto, idameva nānattaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:320_3: Paṃsuṃ dadeyyāti thaddhapharusapaṃsuṃ haritvā mudugomayacuṇṇamissaṃ madhurapaṃsuṃ pakkhipeyya.
atk-s0302a:320_10: rukkhassa vuḍḍhiāpajjanaṃ viya puthujjanassa tīhi dvārehi kammaṃ āyūhato aparāparaṃ vaṭṭappavatti.
atk-s0302a:322_1: Dasame kurūsu viharatīti kurūti evaṃ bahuvacanavasena laddhavohāre janapade viharati.
atk-s0302a:322_2: Kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamoti evaṃnāmako kurūnaṃ nigamo,
atk-s0302a:322_6: Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti cha nisajjadose vivajjento dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalassa abhimukhaṭṭhāne chabbaṇṇānaṃ buddharasmīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:322_7: anto pavisitvā pasannalākhārasaṃ vigāhanto viya suvaṇṇapaṭaṃ pārupanto viya rattakambalavitānamajjhaṃ
atk-s0302a:322_8: pavisanto viya dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko āyasmā ānando nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:323_0: Kāya pana velāya kena kāraṇena ayamāyasmā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamantoti?
atk-s0302a:323_2: Taṃ divasaṃ kira ayamāyasmā kulasaṅgahatthāya gharadvāre gharadvāre sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ nikkhipanto viya
atk-s0302a:323_3: kammāsadhammaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto satthu vattaṃ dassetvā satthari gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe
atk-s0302a:323_4: satthāraṃ vanditvā attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gantvā antevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṃ paṭisammajjitvā
atk-s0302a:323_5: cammakkhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā udakatumbato udakena hatthapāde sītalaṃ katvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno sotāpattiphalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0302a:323_7: Atha paricchinnakālavasena samāpattito vuṭṭhāya paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāresi.
atk-s0302a:323_11: majjhato paṭṭhāya ubho ante pāpento tikkhattuṃ dvādasapadaṃ paccayākāraṃ sammasi.
atk-s0302a:323_12: Tassevaṃ sammasantassa paccayākāro vibhūto hutvā uttānakuttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:323_14: “ayaṃ paccayākāro sabbabuddhehi gambhīro ceva gambhīrāvabhāso cāti kathito,
atk-s0302a:323_15: mayhaṃ kho pana padesañāṇe ṭhitassa sāvakassa sato uttāno viya vibhūto pākaṭo hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:323_16: mayhaṃyeva nu kho esa uttānako viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:323_17: udāhu aññesampīti attano upaṭṭhānakāraṇaṃ satthu ārocessāmī”ti nisinnaṭṭhānato uṭṭhāya cammakkhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0302a:324_5: Ekañhi uttānameva gambhīrāvabhāsaṃ hoti pūtipaṇṇarasavasena kāḷavaṇṇaṃ purāṇaudakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:324_7: Ekaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānāvabhāsaṃ hoti maṇibhāsaṃ vippasannaudakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:324_9: Ekaṃ uttānaṃ uttānāvabhāsaṃ hoti pātiādīsu udakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:324_10: Ekaṃ gambhīraṃ gambhīrāvabhāsaṃ hoti sinerupādakamahāsamudde udakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:324_13: Ayañhi gambhīro ca gambhīrāvabhāso cāti ekameva nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-s0302a:324_14: Evarūpo samānopi atha ca pana me uttānakuttānako viya khāyati,
atk-s0302a:324_16: bhanteti evaṃ attano vimhayaṃ pakāsento pañhaṃ pucchitvā tuṇhībhūto nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:325_0: Bhagavā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ānando bhavaggagahaṇāya hatthaṃ pasārento viya sineruṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ
atk-s0302a:325_1: nīharituṃ vāyamamāno viya vinā nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo viya pathaviṃ parivattetvā pathavojaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0302a:325_2: vāyamamāno viya buddhavisayaṃ pañhaṃ attano uttānuttānanti vadati,
atk-s0302a:325_3: handassa gambhīrabhāvaṃ ācikkhāmī”ti cintetvā mā hevantiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:326_3: “Mā heva”nti ca idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ussādentopi bhaṇati apasādentopi.
atk-s0302a:326_6: tena te gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya khāyati,
atk-s0302a:327_1: cha māse subhojanarasapuṭṭhassa kira katayogassa mahāmallassa samajjasamaye katamallapāsāṇaparicayassa
atk-s0302a:327_6: “Ukkhipituṃ na sakkomā”ti vutte sayaṃ gantvā “kuhiṃ imassa bhāriyaṭṭhāna”nti vatvā dvīhi hatthehi dve
atk-s0302a:327_7: pāsāṇe ukkhipitvā kīḷāguḷe viya khipitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:327_8: Tattha mallassa mallapāsāṇo lahukoti na aññesampi lahukoti vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:327_9: Cha māse subhojanarasapuṭṭho mallo viya hi kappasatasahassaṃ abhinīhārasampanno āyasmā ānando.
atk-s0302a:327_11: evaṃ therassa mahāpaññatāya paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:328_0: Mahāsamudde ca timi nāma mahāmaccho dviyojanasatiko,
atk-s0302a:328_3: ānando timinando ajjhāroho mahātimīti ime cattāro yojanasahassikā.
atk-s0302a:328_5: Tassa kira dakkhiṇakaṇṇaṃ cālentassa pañcayojanasate padese udakaṃ calati,
atk-s0302a:328_9: Dve pana kaṇṇe cāletvā naṅguṭṭhena paharitvā sīsaṃ aparāparaṃ katvā kīḷituṃ āraddhassa sattaṭṭhayojanasate
atk-s0302a:328_10: ṭhāne bhājane pakkhipitvā uddhane āropitaṃ viya udakaṃ pakkuthati.
atk-s0302a:328_11: Yojanasatamatte padese udakaṃ piṭṭhiṃ chādetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0302a:328_16: Tattha kāyūpapannassa timirapiṅgalassa mahāsamuddo uttānoti aññesañca khuddakamacchānaṃ uttānoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:328_17: evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:328_25: tasmiṃ supaṇṇavātaṃ dassetuṃ āraddhe sattaṭṭhayojanasataṃ ṭhānaṃ nappahoti.
atk-s0302a:328_30: Tattha kāyūpapannassa supaṇṇarañño ākāso parittoti aññesañca khuddakapakkhīnaṃ parittoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:328_31: evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:329_0: Rāhu asurindo pana pādantato yāva kesantā yojanānaṃ cattāri sahassāni aṭṭha ca satāni honti.
atk-s0302a:329_9: Tassa mahāsamuddaṃ otiṇṇassa gambhīraṃ udakaṃ jāṇuppamāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:329_14: Tattha kāyūpapannassa rāhuno mahāsamuddo uttānoti aññesañca uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:329_15: Evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:329_16: Etamatthaṃ sandhāya bhagavā mā hevaṃ, ānanda, mā hevaṃ,
atk-s0302a:330_0: Therassa hi catūhi kāraṇehi gambhīro paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:331_0: Ito kira satasahassime kappe padumuttaro nāma satthā loke uppajji.
atk-s0302a:331_5: So puttassa jātadivase mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamma pabbajitvā padhānamanuyutto anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā,
atk-s0302a:331_6: “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke vītināmetvā “pathaviyaṃ pādaṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti pādaṃ abhinīhari.
atk-s0302a:331_7: Atha pathaviṃ bhinditvā mahantaṃ padumaṃ uṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:332_4: Tassa ekādasahatthena pādena dvādasahatthāya kaṇṇikāya akkantamattāya navaghaṭappamāṇā reṇu uṭṭhāya aṭṭhapaññāsahatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:332_7: Tassa devilo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0302a:332_8: amitā ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0302a:332_10: Padumuttaro bhagavā pitusaṅgahaṃ kurumāno bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro haṃsavatiyā rājadhāniyā vasati.
atk-s0302a:333_1: Tassa rājā haṃsavatito vīsayojanasate bhogaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0302a:333_2: So kadāci āgantvā pitarañca satthārañca passati.
atk-s0302a:333_9: Rājā tuṭṭho “sīghaṃ mama putto āgacchatū”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:333_12: “mayhaṃ pitā tuṭṭho sace me varaṃ deti,
atk-s0302a:333_22: tasmā deve varaṃ dadamāne temāsaṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ varaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0302a:333_30: bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto jīvitaṃ avañjhaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:333_31: idaṃ me varaṃ dehī”ti āha. Na sakkā, tāta,
atk-s0302a:333_39: ahaṃ bhagavato cittaṃ jānissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:334_0: Tena ca samayena bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0302a:334_1: So maṇḍalamāḷe sannisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:334_8: icchiticchitakkhaṇe satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmā”ti. Ko pana, bhante,
atk-s0302a:334_17: rājaputtā”ti taṃ gahetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe ṭhapetvā gandhakuṭiṃ āruhi.
atk-s0302a:334_28: bhikkhū pana “na mayaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmā”ti maṃ therassa santikaṃ pāhesuṃ,
atk-s0302a:334_29: thero pana ekavacaneneva dassesi, thero, bhante,
atk-s0302a:334_32: vallabho esa bhikkhu mayhaṃ sāsaneti. Bhante,
atk-s0302a:334_33: buddhānaṃ sāsane kiṃ katvā vallabho hotīti?
atk-s0302a:334_34: Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā, kumārāti.
atk-s0302a:334_35: Bhagavā ahampi thero viya buddhasāsane vallabho hotukāmo,
atk-s0302a:334_37: “atthi nu kho gatena attho”ti oloketvā “atthī”ti disvā “suññāgāre kho,
atk-s0302a:334_43: mayā pesite bhikkhusatasahassena saddhiṃ āgacchathā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā pitu santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0302a:334_46: mayā pahite tumhe bhagavantaṃ peseyyāthā”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā yojane yojane vihāraṃ kāretvā vīsayojanasataṃ addhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:334_47: Gantvā attano nagare vihāraṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sobhanassa nāma kuṭumbikassa uyyānaṃ disvā satasahassena kiṇitvā satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā vihāraṃ kāresi.
atk-s0302a:334_49: sesabhikkhūnañca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānatthāya kuṭileṇamaṇḍape kārāpetvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakañca
atk-s0302a:334_50: niṭṭhāpetvā pitu santikaṃ pesesi “niṭṭhitaṃ mayhaṃ kiccaṃ,
atk-s0302a:335_0: Rājā bhagavantaṃ bhojetvā “bhagavā sumanassa kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:335_2: Bhagavā satasahassabhikkhuparivāro yojane yojane vihāresu vasamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:335_3: Kumāro “satthā āgacchatī”ti sutvā yojanaṃ paccuggantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamāno vihāraṃ pavesetvā –
atk-s0302a:338_1: So vassūpanāyikadivase dānaṃ datvā attano puttadāre ca amacce ca pakkosāpetvā āha –“satthā amhākaṃ santikaṃ dūrato āgato,
atk-s0302a:338_4: Tasmā ahaṃ imaṃ temāsaṃ dve sāṭake nivāsetvā dasa sīlāni samādiyitvā idheva vasissāmi,
atk-s0302a:338_5: tumhe khīṇāsavasatasahassassa imināva nīhārena temāsaṃ dānaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0302a:339_0: So sumanattherassa vasanaṭṭhānasabhāgeyeva ṭhāne vasanto yaṃ thero bhagavato vattaṃ karoti,
atk-s0302a:339_4: upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase bhikkhūsatasahassassa
atk-s0302a:339_6: yadetaṃ mayā magge yojanantarikavihārakārāpanato paṭṭhāya puññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0302a:339_10: Tasmā ahampi bhagavā anāgate sumanatthero viya ekassa buddhassa upaṭṭhāko homī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena patitvā vanditvā nipanno.
atk-s0302a:339_14: “anāgate ito satasahassime kappe gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0302a:341_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0302a:342_1: Kumāro sutvā “buddhā nāma advejjhakathā hontī”ti dutiyadivaseyeva tassa bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchanto viya ahosi.
atk-s0302a:342_2: So tasmiṃ buddhuppāde vassasatasahassaṃ dānaṃ datvā sagge nibbattitvā kassapabuddhakālepi piṇḍāya carato
atk-s0302a:342_3: therassa pattaggahaṇatthaṃ uttarisāṭakaṃ datvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0302a:342_4: Puna sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasirājā hutvā aṭṭhannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ paṇṇasālāyo kāretvā maṇiādhārake
atk-s0302a:342_5: upaṭṭhapetvā catūhi paccayehi dasavassasahassāni upaṭṭhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0302a:343_0: Kappasatasahassaṃ pana dānaṃ dadamānova amhākaṃ bodhisattena saddhiṃ tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cuto
atk-s0302a:343_1: amitodanasakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā anupubbena katābhinikkhamano sammāsambodhiṃ patvā paṭhamagamanena
atk-s0302a:343_2: kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā tato nikkhamante bhagavati bhagavato parivāratthaṃ rājakumāresu pabbajantesu bhaddiyādīhi
atk-s0302a:343_3: saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa santike
atk-s0302a:343_6: tassimāya pubbūpanissayasampattiyā gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:344_0: Titthavāsoti pana garūnaṃ santike uggahaṇasavanaparipucchanadhāraṇāni vuccanti.
atk-s0302a:344_3: Sotāpannānañca nāma paccayākāro uttānako hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:344_5: Bahussutānaṃ catuhatthe ovarake padīpe jalamāne mañcapīṭhaṃ viya nāmarūpaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0302a:344_7: Iti bāhusaccabhāvenapissa gambhīropi paccayākāro uttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:344_10: Sā sabbāpi therassa uttānakā viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:344_11: Tena bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ussādento mā hevantiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:344_14: tena te gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya khāyati.
atk-s0302a:344_15: Tasmā “mayhameva nu kho esa uttānako viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:345_2: “atha ca pana me uttānakuttānako viya khāyatī”ti mā hevaṃ avaca.
atk-s0302a:345_3: Yadi hi te esa uttānakuttānako viya khāyati,
atk-s0302a:345_4: kasmā tvaṃ attano dhammatāya sotāpanno nāhosi,
atk-s0302a:345_5: mayā dinnanaye ṭhatvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhi? Ānanda,
atk-s0302a:345_8: atha kasmā oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgānusayaṃ paṭighānusayanti ime
atk-s0302a:345_9: cattāro kilese samugghātetvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ na sacchikarosi,
atk-s0302a:345_10: teyeva aṇusahagate cattāro kilese samugghātetvā anāgāmiphalaṃ na sacchikarosi,
atk-s0302a:345_12: mānānusayaṃ bhavarāgānusayaṃ avijjānusayanti ime aṭṭha kilese samugghātetvā arahattaṃ na sacchikarosi?
atk-s0302a:345_13: Kasmā vā satasahassakappādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pūritapāramino sāriputtamoggallānā viya sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ na paṭivijjhasi,
atk-s0302a:345_14: satasahassakappādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramino paccekabuddhā viya ca paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ na paṭivijjhasi?
atk-s0302a:345_15: Yadi vā te sabbathāva esa uttānako hutvā upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:345_16: Atha kasmā satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri aṭṭha soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramino buddhā viya sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ na sacchikarosi?
atk-s0302a:345_19: tvaṃ nāma sāvakapadesañāṇe ṭhito atigambhīraṃ paccayākāraṃ “uttānako viya me upaṭṭhātī”ti vadasi.
atk-s0302a:345_20: Tassa te idaṃ vacanaṃ buddhānaṃ kathāya paccanīkaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:345_21: Tādisena nāma bhikkhunā buddhānaṃ kathāya paccanīkaṃ kathetabbanti na yuttametaṃ.
atk-s0302a:345_23: imaṃ paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantasseva kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkantāni.
atk-s0302a:345_24: Paccayākārapaṭivijjhanatthāya ca pana me adinnadānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0302a:345_26: “Ajja paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhissāmī”ti pana me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassa ayaṃ mahāpathavī dvaṅgulamattampi nākampi,
atk-s0302a:345_30: “avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ navahi ākārehi paccayo hotī”ti diṭṭhamatteyeva dasasahassilokadhātu ayadaṇḍena ākoṭitakaṃsathālo
atk-s0302a:345_31: viya viravasataṃ viravasahassaṃ muñcamānā vātāhate paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu viya pakampittha.
atk-s0302a:346_4: Yathā nāma dunnikkhittaṃ mūsikacchinnaṃ pesakārānaṃ tantaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ ākulaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:346_7: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:346_8: Evameva sattā imasmiṃ paccayākāre khalitā ākulā byākulā honti,
atk-s0302a:346_10: Tattha tantaṃ paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkāpi bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:346_11: ṭhapetvā pana dve bodhisatte añño satto attano dhammatāya paccayākāraṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:346_12: Yathā pana ākulaṃ tantaṃ kañjiyaṃ datvā kocchena pahaṭaṃ tattha tattha guḷakajātaṃ hoti gaṇṭhibaddhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:346_13: evamime sattā paccayesu pakkhalitvā paccaye ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatavasena guḷakajātā honti gaṇṭhibaddhā.
atk-s0302a:346_15: sabbe te paccayaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontāyeva.
atk-s0302a:347_3: Yathā hi tadubhayampi ākulaṃ aggena vā aggaṃ,
atk-s0302a:347_4: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaranti purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:348_0: Muñjapabbajabhūtāti muñjatiṇaṃ viya pabbajatiṇaṃ viya ca bhūtā tādisā jātā.
atk-s0302a:348_1: Yathā hi tāni tiṇāni koṭṭetvā katarajju jiṇṇakāle katthaci patitaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ tiṇānaṃ “idaṃ aggaṃ,
atk-s0302a:348_4: tampi paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkā bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:348_5: ṭhapetvā pana dve bodhisatte añño satto attano dhammatāya paccayākāraṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0302a:348_6: evamayaṃ pajā paccayaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontī diṭṭhigatavasena gaṇṭhikajātā hutvā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattati.

atk-s0302a:352_3: sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu mahāsamudde vātakkhittā nāvā viya yante yuttagoṇo viya ca
atk-s0302a:352_5: Iti sabbametaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ apasādento āha.
atk-s0302a:356_2: Puthujjanoti puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādikāraṇehi puthujjano.
atk-s0302a:356_5: Apica puthūnaṃ gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjano,
atk-s0302a:356_6: puthu vā ayaṃ visuṃyeva saṅkhaṃ gato,

atk-s0302a:359_3: Cātumahābhūtikasminti catumahābhūtakāye catumahābhūtehi nibbatte catumahābhūtamayeti attho.
atk-s0302a:360_0: Tasmāti yasmā ime cattāro vuḍḍhihāninibbattibhedā paññāyanti,
atk-s0302a:360_2: Iti bhagavā cātumahābhūtike kāye rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ ayuttarūpaṃ katvā arūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ yuttarūpaṃ karoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:360_3: Tesañhi bhikkhūnaṃ rūpasmiṃ gāho balavā adhimatto,
atk-s0302a:360_4: tena tesaṃ rūpe gāhassa pariggahetabbarūpataṃ dassetvā nikkaḍḍhanto arūpe patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ evamāha.
atk-s0302a:361_1: Tañhi cittavatthutāya cittagocaratāya sampayuttadhammacittatāya ca cittaṃ,
atk-s0302a:362_2: Paṭhamañhi tena rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ ayuttarūpaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0302a:362_4: atha “tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpato gāho nikkhamitvā arūpaṃ gato”ti ñatvā taṃ nikkaḍḍhituṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:362_8: Kiṃ atirekavassasataṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ rūpaṃ nāma atthi?
atk-s0302a:362_9: Nanu paṭhamavaye pavattaṃ rūpaṃ majjhimavayaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0302a:362_23: tattha tattheva odhi odhi pabbaṃ pabbaṃ hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya paṭapaṭāyantā saṅkhārā bhijjantīti?
atk-s0302a:362_25: Yathā pana padīpassa jalato jātā taṃ taṃ vaṭṭippadesaṃ anatikkamitvā tattha tattheva bhijjati,
atk-s0302a:362_26: atha ca pana paveṇisambandhavasena sabbarattiṃ jalito padīpoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:362_27: evamidhāpi paveṇivasena ayampi kāyo evaṃ ciraṭṭhitiko viya katvā dassito.
atk-s0302a:363_0: Rattiyā ca divasassa cāti rattimhi ca divase ca.
atk-s0302a:363_3: aññaṃ nirujjhatīti yaṃ rattiṃ uppajjati ca nirujjhati ca,
atk-s0302a:363_4: tato aññadeva divā uppajjati ca nirujjhati cāti attho.
atk-s0302a:363_6: anuppannameva aññaṃ nirujjhatīti evaṃ pana attho na gahetabbo.
atk-s0302a:363_7: “Rattiyā ca divasassa cā”ti idaṃ purimapaveṇito parittakaṃ paveṇiṃ gahetvā paveṇivaseneva vuttaṃ,
atk-s0302a:363_8: ekarattiṃ pana ekadivasaṃ vā ekameva cittaṃ ṭhātuṃ samatthaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:364_4: ekaccharākkhaṇe pavattassa cittassa ettakā vīhī lakkhaṃ ṭhapīyamānā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyu”nti.
atk-s0302a:365_2: taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhātīti iminā na so gaṇhitabbasākhaṃ alabhitvā bhūmiṃ otarati.
atk-s0302a:365_3: Atha kho tasmiṃ mahāvane vicaranto taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhantoyeva caratīti ayamattho dassito.
atk-s0302a:366_2: Tasmiṃ vane vicaraṇamakkaṭo viya ārammaṇavane uppajjanakacittaṃ.
atk-s0302a:366_4: Yathā so araññe vicaranto makkaṭo taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ pahāya taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0302a:366_5: evamidaṃ ārammaṇavane vicarantaṃ cittampi kadāci rūpārammaṇaṃ gahetvā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:366_11: Yathā ca so araññe vicaranto makkaṭo sākhaṃ alabhitvā oruyha bhūmiyaṃ nisinnoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:366_13: evameva ārammaṇavane vicarantaṃ cittampi ekaṃ olubbhārammaṇaṃ alabhitvā uppannanti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:366_14: ekajātiyaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ gahetvāva uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:366_15: Ettāvatā ca pana bhagavatā rūpato nīharitvā arūpe gāho patiṭṭhāpito,
atk-s0302a:367_5: athassa visaṃ harissāmīti cheko bhisakko āgantvā vamanaṃ kāretvā heṭṭhā garuḷo,
atk-s0302a:367_6: upari nāgoti mantaṃ parivattetvā visaṃ upari āropesi.
atk-s0302a:367_7: So yāva akkhippadesā āruḷhabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ito paraṃ abhiruhituṃ na dassāmi,
atk-s0302a:367_9: heṭṭhā nāgoti mantaṃ parivattetvā kaṇṇe dhumetvā daṇḍakena paharitvā visaṃ otāretvā daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:367_10: Tatrassa ṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā agadalepena visaṃ nimmathetvā nhāpetvā “sukhī hohī”ti vatvā yenakāmaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0302a:368_0: Tattha āsīvisena daṭṭhassa kāye visapatiṭṭhānaṃ viya imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpe adhimattagāhakālo,
atk-s0302a:368_2: mantaṃ parivattetvā upari visassa āropitakālo viya tathāgatena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpato gāhaṃ nīharitvā arūpe patiṭṭhāpitakālo,
atk-s0302a:368_3: yāva akkhippadesā āruḷhavisassa upari abhiruhituṃ adatvā puna mantabalena otāretvā daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapanaṃ
atk-s0302a:368_4: viya satthārā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ arūpato gāhaṃ nīharitvā rūpe patiṭṭhāpitakālo.
atk-s0302a:368_5: Daṭṭhaṭṭhāne ṭhitassa visassa agadalepena nimmathanaṃ viya ubhayato gāhaṃ nīharaṇatthāya imissā desanāya āraddhakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:368_6: Tattha nibbindaṃ virajjatīti iminā maggo kathito,
atk-s0302a:370_3: Nanu ca cakkhusamphasso sukhavedanāya paccayo na hotīti?
atk-s0302a:370_14: Tejo abhinibbattatīti aggicuṇṇo nikkhamatīti na gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:372_10: Sabbadisāsu hissa yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo “ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ
atk-s0302a:372_17: Sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ
atk-s0302a:372_18: āhacca tiṭṭhanti ceva anuppavattanti ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya.

atk-s0302a:374_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvara-
atk-s0302a:375_1: etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0302a:375_2: aññaṃ ekasaṅghampi samanupassāmi evaṃ lābhaggayasaggapattaṃ yatharivāyaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0302a:376_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca saṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ mahānadīnaṃ udakaṃ viya appameyyo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:376_4: Kiṃ nu kho bhikkhū āhārapariggāhakena satisampajaññena samannāgatā majjhattā nicchandarāgā hutvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0302a:377_0: So addasa ekacce adhunā pabbajite kulaputte apaccavekkhitvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjamāne.
atk-s0302a:377_2: “mayā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūrentena na cīvarādihetu pūritā,
atk-s0302a:377_4: Imepi bhikkhū mama santike pabbajantā na cīvarādihetu pabbajitā,
atk-s0302a:377_6: Te idāni asārameva sāraṃ anatthameva ca atthaṃ karontī”ti evamassa dhammasaṃvego udapādi.
atk-s0302a:377_9: apaccavekkhitāhāraparibhogo pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ katvā paññapetabbo bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:377_12: Yathā pana kathite pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ viya naṃ passissanti.
atk-s0302a:377_14: yaṃ āvajjitvā āvajjitvā anāgate bhikkhū cattāro paccaye paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjissantī”ti.
atk-s0302a:378_0: Cattāro pana āhāre vitthāretvā idāni tesu ādīnavaṃ dassetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0302a:378_3: Tattha jāyampatikāti jāyā ceva pati ca.
atk-s0302a:378_4: Parittaṃ sambalanti puṭabhattasattumodakādīnaṃ aññataraṃ appamattakaṃ pātheyyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:378_7: Kantāranti corakantāraṃ vāḷakantāraṃ amanussakantāraṃ nirudakakantāraṃ appabhakkhakantāranti pañcavidhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:378_12: Yattha balavāmukhayakkhiniādīnaṃ amanussānaṃ vasena bhayaṃ atthi,
atk-s0302a:378_14: Yattha pātuṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā udakaṃ natthi,
atk-s0302a:378_16: Yattha khāditabbaṃ vā bhuñjitabbaṃ vā antamaso kandamūlādimattampi natthi,
atk-s0302a:378_22: Idha pana nirudakaṃ appabhakkhaṃ yojanasatikakantāraṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0302a:378_24: Paṭipajjeyyunti chātakabhayena ceva rogabhayena ca rājabhayena ca upaddutā paṭipajjeyyuṃ “etaṃ kantāraṃ
atk-s0302a:378_25: nittharitvā dhammikassa rañño nirupaddave raṭṭhe sukhaṃ vasissāmā”ti maññamānā.
atk-s0302a:379_0: Ekaputtakoti ukkhipitvā gahito anukampitabbayutto athirasarīro ekaputtako.
atk-s0302a:380_0: Ayaṃ panettha bhūtamatthaṃ katvā ādito paṭṭhāya saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0302a:380_1: dve kira jāyampatikā puttaṃ gahetvā parittena pātheyyena yojanasatikaṃ kantāramaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:380_5: “bhadde ito samantā paññāsayojanāni gāmo vā nigamo vā natthi.
atk-s0302a:380_6: Tasmā yaṃ taṃ purisena kātabbaṃ bahumpi kasigorakkhādikammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:380_7: na dāni sakkā taṃ mayā kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:380_8: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti.
atk-s0302a:380_10: “sāmi mayā dāni yaṃ taṃ itthiyā kātabbaṃ bahumpi suttakantanādikammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:380_12: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti.
atk-s0302a:380_15: Na hi mando kumāro mātarā vinā jīvituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0302a:380_30: “mayā puttaṃ patthentiyā govatakukkuravatadevatāyācanādīhipi tāva anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0302a:380_32: Na sakkomi ahaṃ puttaṃ māretu”nti vatvā “tāta,
atk-s0302a:380_35: Te taṃ disvā paridevitvā vuttanayena maṃsāni gahetvā khādantā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:381_0: Tesaṃ so puttamaṃsāhāro navahi kāraṇehi paṭikūlattā neva davāya hoti,
atk-s0302a:381_6: Sajātimaṃsatāya ñātimaṃsatāya puttamaṃsatāya piyaputtamaṃsatāya taruṇamaṃsatāya āmakamaṃsatāya abhogamaṃsatāya aloṇatāya adhūpitatāyāti.
atk-s0302a:381_7: Evañhi te navahi kāraṇehi paṭikūlaṃ taṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādantā na sārattā giddhamānasā hutvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:381_9: Na aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṭṭhānāni apanetvā thūlathūlaṃ varamaṃsameva khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:381_12: thokaṃ thokaṃ pana ekadivasaṃ yāpanamattameva khādiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:381_15: Na aññaṃ kiñci migamaṃsaṃ vā moramaṃsādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ khādāmāti sammūḷhā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:381_17: Na “aho vata mayaṃ punapi evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādeyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ katvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:381_19: Na “ettakaṃ kantāre khāditvā avasiṭṭhaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamma loṇambilādīhi yojetvā khādissāmā”ti sannidhiṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:381_20: kantārapariyosāne pana “pure mahājano passatī”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā nikhaṇiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:381_22: Na “koci añño amhe viya evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādituṃ na labhatī”ti mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:381_24: “Kiṃ iminā aloṇena anambilena adhūpitena duggandhenā”ti na hīḷetvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:381_26: Na “tuyhaṃ bhāgo mayhaṃ bhāgo tava putto mama putto”ti aññamaññaṃ atimaññiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:381_28: Imaṃ nesaṃ evarūpaṃ nicchandarāgādiparibhogaṃ sampassamāno satthā bhikkhusaṅghampi taṃ kāraṇaṃ anujānāpento taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
atk-s0302a:381_30: api nu te davāya vā āhāraṃ āhāreyyuntiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:382_0: Evameva khoti navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasena piyaputtamaṃsasadiso katvā daṭṭhabboti attho.
atk-s0302a:382_6: tāni panetāni gamanapāṭikulyatādīni visuddhimagge āhārapāṭikulyatāniddese vitthāritāneva.
atk-s0302a:382_7: Iti imesaṃ navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasena puttamaṃsūpamaṃ katvā āhāro paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:383_0: Yathā te jāyampatikā pāṭikulyaṃ piyaputtamaṃsaṃ khādantā na sārattā giddhamānasā hutvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:383_3: Yathā ca te na aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṃ apanetvā thūlathūlaṃ varamaṃsameva khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:383_5: evaṃ sukkhabhattamandabyañjanādīni piṭṭhihatthena apaṭikkhipitvā vaṭṭakena viya kukkuṭena viya ca odhiṃ
atk-s0302a:383_6: adassetvā tato tato sappimaṃsādisaṃsaṭṭhavarabhojanaṃyeva vicinitvā abhuñjantena sīhena viya sapadānaṃ
atk-s0302a:384_0: Yathā ca te na yāvadatthaṃ kaṇṭhappamāṇaṃ khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:384_1: thokaṃ thokaṃ pana ekekadivasaṃ yāpanamattameva khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:384_2: evameva āharahatthakādibrāhmaṇānaṃ aññatarena viya yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ abhuñjantena catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-s0302a:384_3: vā ālopānaṃ okāsaṃ ṭhapetvāva dhammasenāpatinā viya paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:384_4: So kira pañcacattālīsa vassāni tiṭṭhamāno “pacchābhatte ambiluggārasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ katvā ekadivasampi āhāraṃ
atk-s0302a:384_5: na āhāresi”nti vatvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0302a:387_0: Yathā ca te na aññamaññaṃ maccharāyantā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:387_2: evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā amaccharāyitvā “imaṃ sabbaṃ gaṇhantassa sabbaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0302a:387_6: Yathā ca te na “aññaṃ kiñci mayaṃ migamaṃsaṃ vā moramaṃsādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ khādāmā”ti sammūḷhā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:387_8: evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā “ahaṃ khādāmi bhuñjāmī”ti attūpaladdhisammohaṃ anuppādetvā “kabaḷīkārāhāro na jānāti ‘cātumahābhūtikakāyaṃ vaḍḍhemī’ti,
atk-s0302a:388_0: Yathā ca te na “aho vata mayaṃ punapi evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādeyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ katvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:388_2: evameva paṇītabhojanaṃ laddhā ‘aho vatāhaṃ svepi punadivasepi evarūpaṃ labheyyaṃ’,
atk-s0302a:388_3: lūkhaṃ vā pana laddhā “hiyyo viya me ajja paṇītabhojanaṃ na laddha”nti patthanaṃ vā anusocanaṃ vā akatvā nittaṇhena –
atk-s0302a:392_0: Yathā ca te na “ettakaṃ kantāre khāditvā avasiṭṭhaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamma loṇambilādīhi yojetvā khādissāmā”ti sannidhiṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:392_1: kantārapariyosāne pana “pure mahājano passatī”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā nikhaṇiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:397_0: Imaṃ ovādaṃ anussarantena catūsu paccayesu yaṃ yaṃ labhati,
atk-s0302a:397_2: sesaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ vissajjetvā sannidhiṃ parivajjantena paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:397_3: Yathā ca te na “koci añño amhe viya evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādituṃ na labhatī”ti mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:397_5: evameva paṇītabhojanaṃ labhitvā “ahamasmi lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātādīna”nti na māno vā dappo vā kātabbo.
atk-s0302a:397_7: arahattahetu panāyaṃ pabbajjā”ti paccavekkhitvā nihatamānadappeneva paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:398_0: Yathā ca te “kiṃ iminā aloṇena anambilena adhūpitena duggandhenā”ti hīḷetvā na khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:398_2: evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā “kiṃ iminā assagoṇabhattasadisena lūkhena nirasena,
atk-s0302a:398_3: suvānadoṇiyaṃ taṃ pakkhipathā”ti evaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vā “ko imaṃ bhuñjissati,
atk-s0302a:398_4: kākasunakhādīnaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ dāyakaṃ vā ahīḷentena –
atk-s0302a:400_0: Appaṃ dānaṃ na hīḷeyya, dātāraṃ nāvajāniyā”ti. ; –
atk-s0302a:401_3: tava putto mama putto”ti aññamaññaṃ atimaññiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:401_6: evamevaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā yathā ekacco “ko tumhādisānaṃ dassati nikkāraṇā ummāresu pakkhalantānaṃ
atk-s0302a:401_7: āhiṇḍantānaṃ vijātamātāpi vo dātabbaṃ na maññati,
atk-s0302a:401_8: mayaṃ pana gatagataṭṭhāne paṇītāni cīvarādīni labhāmā”ti sīlavante sabrahmacārī atimaññati,
atk-s0302a:402_0: “So tena lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññati.
atk-s0302a:403_0: Evaṃ kañci anatimaññitvā sabbehi sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ samaggena sammodamānena hutvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:404_0: Pariññāteti ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññāti imāhi tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:404_1: Idha bhikkhu “kabaḷīkārāhāro nāma ayaṃ savatthukavasena ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:404_6: Iti ojaṭṭhamakaṃ jivhāpasādo tassa paccayāni mahābhūtānīti ime dhammā rūpakkhandho nāma,
atk-s0302a:404_7: taṃ pariggaṇhato uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā cattāro arūpakkhandhā.
atk-s0302a:404_8: Iti sabbepime pañcakkhandhā saṅkhepato nāmarūpamattaṃ hotī”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0302a:404_9: So te dhamme sarasalakkhaṇato vavatthapetvā tesaṃ paccayaṃ pariyesanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passati.
atk-s0302a:404_10: Ettāvatānena kabaḷīkārāhāramukhena sappaccayassa nāmarūpassa yāthāvato diṭṭhattā kabaḷīkārāhāro ñātapariññāya pariññāto hoti.
atk-s0302a:404_11: So tadeva sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena sammasati.
atk-s0302a:404_13: Tasmiṃyeva nāmarūpe chandarāgāvakaḍḍhanena anāgāmimaggena parijānatā pahānapariññāya pariññāto hotīti.
atk-s0302a:405_1: Ettha pana tisso pariññā ekapariññā sabbapariññā mūlapariññāti.
atk-s0302a:405_4: tena pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññātova hotīti. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:405_6: Sāyeva hi taṇhā cakkhudvāre uppannā rūparāgo nāma hoti,
atk-s0302a:405_8: Iti yathā ekasseva corassa pañcamagge hanato ekasmiṃ magge gahetvā sīse chinne pañcapi maggā khemā honti,
atk-s0302a:405_9: evaṃ jivhādvāre rasataṇhāya pariññātāya pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññāto hotīti ayaṃ ekapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:406_1: Patte pakkhittapiṇḍapātasmiñhi ekasmiṃyeva pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo labbhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:406_2: Parisuddhaṃ tāvassa vaṇṇaṃ olokayato rūparāgo hoti,
atk-s0302a:406_3: uṇhe sappimhi tattha āsiñcante paṭapaṭāti saddo uṭṭhahati,
atk-s0302a:406_4: tathārūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā khādantassa murumurūti saddo uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:406_9: Iti imasmiṃ āhāre satisampajaññena pariggahetvā nicchandarāgaparibhogena paribhutte sabbopi so pariññāto hotīti ayaṃ sabbapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:407_3: Brāhmaṇatissabhaye kira dvādasa vassāni jāyampatikānaṃ upanijjhānacittaṃ nāma nāhosi. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:407_5: Bhaye pana vūpasante yojanasatiko tambapaṇṇidīpo dārakānaṃ jātamaṅgalehi ekamaṅgalo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:407_6: Iti mūlabhūte āhāre pariññāte pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññātova hotīti ayaṃ mūlapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:408_0: Natthi taṃ saṃyojananti tena rāgena saddhiṃ pahānekaṭṭhatāya pahīnattā natthi.
atk-s0302a:408_2: “Ettakena pana mā vosānaṃ āpajjiṃsū”ti etesaṃyeva rūpādīnaṃ vasena pañcasu khandhesu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yāva arahattā kathetuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0302a:409_0: Dutiye niccammāti khurato paṭṭhāya yāva siṅgamūlā sakalasarīrato uddālitacammā kiṃsukarāsivaṇṇā.
atk-s0302a:409_1: Kasmā pana aññaṃ hatthiassagoṇādiupamaṃ agahetvā niccammagāvūpamā gahitāti?
atk-s0302a:409_3: Mātugāmo hi uppannaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ titikkhituṃ adhivāsetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:409_4: evameva phassāhāro abalo dubbaloti dassanatthaṃ sadisameva upamaṃ āhari.
atk-s0302a:409_11: Sā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne taṃ taṃṭhānasannissayamūlikaṃ pāṇakhādanabhayaṃ sampassamānā neva attano sakkārasammānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:409_13: evameva bhikkhu phassāhāramūlakaṃ kilesapāṇakakhādanabhayaṃ sampassamāno tebhūmakaphassena anatthiko hoti.
atk-s0302a:410_8: tesaṃ vatthārammaṇāni rūpakkhandho”ti evaṃ sappaccayassa nāmarūpassa yāthāvato dassanaṃ ñātapariññā.
atk-s0302a:410_9: Tattheva tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccādito tulanaṃ tīraṇapariññā.
atk-s0302a:410_10: Tasmiṃyeva pana nāmarūpe chandarāganikkaḍḍhano arahattamaggo pahānapariññā.
atk-s0302a:410_11: Tisso vedanāti evaṃ phassāhāre tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte tisso vedanā pariññātāva honti tammūlakattā taṃsampayuttattā ca.
atk-s0302a:410_12: Iti phassāhāravasena desanā yāva arahattā kathitā.
atk-s0302a:411_0: Tatiye aṅgārakāsūti aṅgārānaṃ kāsu. Kāsūti rāsipi vuccati āvāṭopi.
atk-s0302a:418_4: Jālāya vā hi dhūme vā sati vāto samuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:419_4: Tesaṃ taṃ purisaṃ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuṃ upakaḍḍhanakālo viya puthujjanassa kammāyūhanakālo.
atk-s0302a:419_6: Aṅgārakāsunidānaṃ dukkhaṃ viya kammanidānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:420_2: Tisso taṇhāti kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti imā pariññātā honti. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:420_4: Na hi hetumhi appahīne phalaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0302a:420_5: Iti manosañcetanāhāravasenapi yāva arahattā desanā kathitā.
atk-s0302a:421_1: Kathaṃ so purisoti so puriso kathaṃbhūto,
atk-s0302a:422_4: āgucāriṃ purisaṃ “tīhi sattisatehi hanathā”ti raññā āṇattakālo viya kammaraññā vaṭṭasannissitaputhujjanaṃ gahetvā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanakālo.
atk-s0302a:422_5: Tattha kiñcāpi tīṇi sattisatāni viya paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:422_9: dinnāya pana paṭisandhiyā pavatte vipākadukkhaṃ sattipahaṭavaṇamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0302a:423_3: Viññāṇasmiñhi pariññāte taṃ pariññātameva hoti tammūlakattā sahuppannattā ca.
atk-s0302a:423_4: Iti viññāṇāhāravasenapi yāva arahattā desanā kathitāti.
atk-s0302a:425_5: Patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷhanti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya patiṭṭhitañceva virūḷhañca.
atk-s0302a:425_8: Atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhīti idaṃ imasmiṃ vipākavaṭṭe ṭhitassa āyativaṭṭahetuke saṅkhāre sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:425_9: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti atthi.
atk-s0302a:426_3: Yathā rajakacittakārā parisuddhesu phalakādīsu rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0302a:426_5: Tattha yathā akusalena cittakārena samuṭṭhāpitaṃ rūpaṃ virūpaṃ hoti dussaṇṭhitaṃ amanāpaṃ,
atk-s0302a:426_6: evameva ekacco kammaṃ karonto ñāṇavippayuttena cittena karoti,
atk-s0302a:426_7: taṃ kammaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ sampattiṃ adatvā dubbaṇṇaṃ dussaṇṭhitaṃ mātāpitūnampi amanāpaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0302a:426_8: Yathā pana kusalena cittakārena samuṭṭhāpitaṃ rūpaṃ surūpaṃ hoti susaṇṭhitaṃ manāpaṃ,
atk-s0302a:426_9: evameva ekacco kammaṃ karonto ñāṇasampayuttena cittena karoti,
atk-s0302a:426_10: taṃ kammaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ sampattiṃ datvā suvaṇṇaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ viya rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0302a:427_0: Ettha ca āhāraṃ viññāṇena saddhiṃ saṅkhipitvā āhāranāmarūpānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:427_1: vipākavidhiṃ nāmarūpena saṅkhipitvā nāmarūpasaṅkhārānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:427_2: saṅkhārānañca āyatibhavassa ca antare eko sandhīti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:428_2: Evameva khoti ettha khīṇāsavassa kammaṃ sūriyarasmisamaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:428_4: sā kevalaṃ patiṭṭhāya abhāvena appatiṭṭhā nāma jātā,
atk-s0302a:428_7: tehi pana katakammaṃ kusalākusalaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-s0302a:428_9: Evamassa kammaṃ natthitāya eva appatiṭṭhaṃ nāma jātanti.
atk-s0302a:430_1: Pañcame nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇanti ettha “saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇa”nti ca “avijjāya sati saṅkhārā”ti ca vattabbaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0302a:430_4: tehi saddhiṃ ayaṃ vipassanā na ghaṭīyati.
atk-s0302a:431_0: Nanu ca avijjāsaṅkhāresu adiṭṭhesu na sakkā buddhena bhavitunti.
atk-s0302a:431_3: Tasmā yathā nāma godhaṃ anubandhanto puriso taṃ kūpaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ disvā otaritvā paviṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā godhaṃ gahetvā pakkameyya,
atk-s0302a:431_6: Evaṃ mahāpurisopi godhaṃ anubandhanto puriso viya bodhipallaṅke nisinno jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya “imassa ayaṃ paccayo,
atk-s0302a:431_7: imassa ayaṃ paccayo”ti pariyesanto yāva nāmarūpadhammānaṃ paccayaṃ disvā tassapi paccayaṃ pariyesanto viññāṇameva addasa.
atk-s0302a:431_9: parato tucchakūpassa abhinnaṭṭhānaṃ viya avijjāsaṅkhāradvayaṃ atthi,
atk-s0302a:431_10: tadetaṃ heṭṭhā vipassanāya gahitattā pāṭiyekkaṃ sammasanūpagaṃ na hotīti na aggahesi.
atk-s0302a:432_7: Ettāvatā jāyetha vātiādīsu viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte,
atk-s0302a:432_9: dvīsupi aññamaññapaccayesu hontesu ettakena jāyetha vā upapajjetha vā.
atk-s0302a:432_10: Ito hi paraṃ kimaññaṃ jāyetha vā upapajjetha vā,
atk-s0302a:432_11: nanu etadeva jāyati ca upapajjati cāti?
atk-s0302a:433_0: Evaṃ saddhiṃ aparāparacutipaṭisandhīhi pañca padāni dassetvā puna taṃ ettāvatāti vuttamatthaṃ niyyātento yadidaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:433_1: viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti vatvā tato paraṃ anulomapaccayākāravasena viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpamūlakaṃ āyatijarāmaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:434_1: Uddhāpavantanti āpato uggatattā uddhāpanti laddhavohārena pākāravatthunā samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0302a:434_2: Ramaṇīyanti samantā catunnaṃ dvārānaṃ abbhantare ca nānābhaṇḍānaṃ sampattiyā ramaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:434_5: Kārento ca paṭhamaṃ aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo pesetvā “sampuṇṇa”nti pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni pañcakulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:434_6: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni pañcapaññāsakulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:434_7: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni tiṃsa kulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:434_8: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparaṃ kulasahassaṃ peseyya.
atk-s0302a:434_9: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni ekādasanahutāni kulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:434_10: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni caturāsītikulasahassāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:434_15: iminā nayena kulāni pesetvā na sakkā pūretuṃ,
atk-s0302a:434_16: bheriṃ pana carāpetvā ‘amhākaṃ nagaraṃ imāya ca imāya ca sampattiyā sampannaṃ,
atk-s0302a:434_19: imañcimañca parihāraṃ labhissantī’ti nagarassa ceva vaṇṇaṃ lokassa ca parihāralābhaṃ ghosāpethā”ti vadeyya.
atk-s0302a:434_21: Tato manussā nagaraguṇañceva parihāralābhañca sutvā sabbadisāhi samosaritvā nagaraṃ pūreyyuṃ.
atk-s0302a:434_22: Taṃ aparena samayena iddhañceva assa phītañca.
atk-s0302a:434_23: Taṃ sandhāya tadassa nagaraṃ aparena samayena iddhañceva phītañcātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:436_1: araññapavane caramānapuriso viya hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya pāramiyo pūrayamāno mahāpuriso daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0302a:436_2: tassa purisassa pubbakehi manussehi anuyātamaggadassanaṃ viya mahāsattassa anupubbena bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa
atk-s0302a:436_4: purisassa taṃ ekapadikamaggaṃ anugacchato aparabhāge mahāmaggadassanaṃ viya mahāsattassa uparivipassanāya ciṇṇante lokuttaramaggadassanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:436_5: purisassa teneva maggena gacchato purato nagaradassanaṃ viya tathāgatassa nibbānanagaradassanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:436_10: Tassa purisassa catunnaṃ dvārānaṃ diṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatassa catunnaṃ maggānaṃ diṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0302a:436_11: tassa catūhi dvārehi nagaraṃ paviṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatassa catūhi maggehi nibbānaṃ paviṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0302a:436_12: tassa nagarabbhantare bhaṇḍavavatthānakālo viya tathāgatassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇena paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammavavatthānakālo.
atk-s0302a:436_13: Nagarassa agārakaraṇatthaṃ kulapariyesanakālo viya satthu phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya veneyyasatte volokanakālo,
atk-s0302a:436_14: tena purisena yācitassa rañño ekaṃ mahākuṭumbikaṃ diṭṭhakālo viya mahābrahmunā yācitassa bhagavato aññāsikoṇḍaññattheraṃ diṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0302a:436_15: rañño mahākuṭumbikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “nagaravāsaṃ karohī”ti pahitakālo viya bhagavato ekasmiṃ pacchābhatte
atk-s0302a:436_16: aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā āsāḷhipuṇṇamadivase bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatanaṃ pavisitvā theraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ
atk-s0302a:436_18: mahākuṭumbikena aṭṭhārasa purisakoṭiyo gahetvā nagaraṃ ajjhāvuṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatena dhammacakke pavattite
atk-s0302a:436_19: therassa aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitakālo,
atk-s0302a:436_21: tato sampuṇṇaṃ nagaranti pucchitvā na tāvāti vutte pañca kulāni ādiṃ katvā yāva caturāsītikulasahassapesanaṃ
atk-s0302a:436_22: viya tathāgatassa pañcamadivasato paṭṭhāya anattalakkhaṇasuttādīni desetvā pañcavaggiye ādiṃ katvā yasapamukhā
atk-s0302a:436_27: tirokuṭṭānumodane caturāsītisahassānīti ettakassa janassa ariyamaggaṃ otāretvā nibbānanagaraṃ pesitakālo,
atk-s0302a:436_28: atha tena nayena nagare apūriyamāne bheriṃ carāpetvā nagarassa vaṇṇaghosanaṃ kulānaṃ parihāralābhaghosanaṃ
atk-s0302a:436_29: viya ca māsassa aṭṭha divase tattha tattha nisīditvā dhammakathikānaṃ nibbānavaṇṇassa ceva nibbānappattānaṃ
atk-s0302a:436_31: tato sabbadisāhi āgantvā manussānaṃ nagarasamosaraṇaṃ viya tattha tattha dhammakathaṃ sutvā tato tato
atk-s0302a:436_32: nikkhamitvā pabbajjaṃ ādiṃ katvā anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannānaṃ aparimāṇānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibbānasamosaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:437_8: Yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitanti yāva dasasahassacakkavāḷe devamanussehi paricchedo atthi,
atk-s0302a:437_9: etasmiṃ antare suppakāsitaṃ sudesitaṃ tathāgatenāti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:439_3: Tasmiṃ kira janapade manussā sahetukā paññavanto.
atk-s0302a:439_6: te gambhīraṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ dhammakathaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā honti.
atk-s0302a:439_9: saṃyuttake cūḷanidānādisuttanti evamādīni aññāni gambhīrāni suttāni tattheva kathesi.
atk-s0302a:439_12: Na so bhikkhu bhagavato cittaṃ ārādhesīti paccayākāravasena byākārāpetukāmassa bhagavato tathā abyākaritvā
atk-s0302a:440_4: Aññattha hi evaṃ vuttaṃ nāma natthi.
