atk-s0302a:505_10: tadeva ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppanno pariḷāho rūpapariḷāho nāma,
atk-s0302a:505_11: sahāye gaṇhitvā tassa pariyesanaṃ rūpapariyesanā nāma,
atk-s0302a:505_12: pariyesitvā laddhaṃ saha taṇhāya ārammaṇaṃ rūpalābho nāma.
atk-s0302a:506_2: pāḷiṃ pana parivaṭṭetvā vuttappakāre ārammaṇe uppannā saññā rūpasaññā,
atk-s0302a:506_3: tasmiṃyeva saṅkappo rūpasaṅkappo tasmiṃ chando rūpacchando,
atk-s0302a:506_6: pariyesitvā laddhaṃ saha taṇhāya ārammaṇaṃ rūpalābho.
atk-s0302a:506_9: Rūpasamphasso rūpasamphassajā vedanāti idaṃ dvayaṃ labbhatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:506_11: Ārammaṇañhi sāṇipākārehi vā parikkhittaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādīhi vā paṭicchannaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:506_13: suṭṭhu naṃ passissāmī”ti olokayato tasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppannā saññā rūpasaññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:506_14: Tasmiṃyeva uppannā saṅkappādayo rūpasaṅkappādayo nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:506_15: Etthāpi ca saññāsaṅkappaphassavedanāchandā ekajavanavārepi nānājavanavārepi labbhanti,
atk-s0302a:510_2: Ālokassapi ālokakasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā uppannajjhānassāpīti sahārammaṇassa jhānassa etaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0302a:510_6: Iti bhagavā anusandhikusalassa bhikkhuno tattha nisīditvā pañhaṃ pucchitukāmassa okāsaṃ dento desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:511_0: Andhakāraṃ paṭiccāti andhakāro hi ālokena paricchinno,
atk-s0302a:511_10: Rūpāvacarasamāpattiyā hi sati ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti nāma hoti rūpasamatikkamo vā,
atk-s0302a:511_13: Nirodhaṃ paṭiccāti catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭisaṅkhāappavattiṃ paṭicca.
atk-s0302a:511_17: Ettha ca catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodhova nirodhasamāpattīti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:512_0: Kathaṃ samāpatti pattabbāti kathaṃ samāpattiyo kīdisā samāpattiyo nāma hutvā pattabbāti?
atk-s0302a:512_1: Saññāsamāpatti pattabbāti saññāya atthibhāvena saññāsamāpattiyo saññāsamāpattiyo nāma hutvā pattabbā.
atk-s0302a:512_2: Saṅkhārāvasesasamāpatti pattabbāti sukhumasaṅkhārānaṃ avasiṭṭhatāya saṅkhārāvasesasamāpatti nāma hutvā pattabbā.
atk-s0302a:512_3: Nirodhasamāpatti pattabbāti nirodhova nirodhasamāpatti nirodhasamāpatti nāma hutvā pattabbāti attho. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:515_1: Kāmapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā micchāsaṅkappo,
atk-s0302a:515_3: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
atk-s0302a:515_4: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:516_0: Ettha sabbasaṅgāhikā asambhinnāti dve kathā honti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:516_1: Kāmadhātuggahaṇena hi byāpādadhātuvihiṃsādhātuyo gahitā hontīti ayaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikā.
atk-s0302a:516_2: Tāsaṃ pana dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ visuṃ āgatattā sesadhammā kāmadhātūti ayaṃ asambhinnakathā.
atk-s0302a:516_3: Ayamidha gahetabbā imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ ārammaṇavasena vā sampayogavasena vā paṭicca kāmasaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:516_4: Kāmasaññaṃ paṭiccāti kāmasaññaṃ pana sampayogavasena vā upanissayavasena vā paṭicca kāmasaṅkappo nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:517_0: Byāpādadhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha byāpādavitakkopi byāpādadhātu byāpādopi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:518_3: Dasasu āghātavatthūsu cittassa āghāto paṭivirodho kopo pakopo…pe…
atk-s0302a:519_0: Imaṃ byāpādadhātuṃ sahajātapaccayādivasena paṭicca byāpādasaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:520_0: Vihiṃsādhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha vihiṃsāvitakkopi vihiṃsādhātu vihiṃsāpi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:521_3: Idhekacco pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā rajjuyā vā aññataraññatarena vā satte viheṭheti.
atk-s0302a:521_4: Yā evarūpā heṭhanā viheṭhanā hiṃsanā vihiṃsanā rosanā parūpaghāto,
atk-s0302a:522_0: Imaṃ vihiṃsādhātuṃ sahajātapaccayādivasena paṭicca vihiṃsāsaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:523_2: Evameva khoti ettha sukkhatiṇadāyo viya ārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:523_5: Yathā sukkhatiṇadāye ṭhapitaṃ tiṇukkaṃ khippaṃ vāyamitvā anibbāpentassa te pāṇā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0302a:523_6: Evameva ye samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā uppannaṃ akusalasaññaṃ vikkhambhanatadaṅgasamucchedappahānehi nappajahanti,
atk-s0302a:524_1: Na khippameva pajahatīti vikkhambhanādivasena sīghaṃ nappajahati.
atk-s0302a:524_3: Na byantīkarotīti bhaṅgamattampi anavasesento na vigatantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0302a:524_4: Na anabhāvaṃ gametīti na anuabhāvaṃ gameti.
atk-s0302a:525_1: bhikkhaveti ettha nekkhammavitakkopi nekkhammadhātu sabbepi kusalā dhammā. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:527_1: Nekkhammadhātuggahaṇena hi itarāpi dve dhātuyo gahaṇaṃ gacchanti kusaladhammapariyāpannattā,
atk-s0302a:527_3: Tā pana dhātuyo visuṃ dīpetabbāti tā ṭhapetvā sesā sabbakusalā nekkhammadhātūti ayaṃ asambhinnā.
atk-s0302a:527_4: Imaṃ nekkhammadhātuṃ sahajātādipaccayavasena paṭicca nekkhammasaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:528_0: Abyāpādadhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha abyāpādavitakkopi abyāpādadhātu abyāpādopi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:529_3: Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti,
atk-s0302a:530_0: Imaṃ abyāpādadhātuṃ paṭicca vuttanayeneva abyāpādasaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:531_0: Avihiṃsādhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti etthāpi avihiṃsāvitakkopi avihiṃsādhātu karuṇāpi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:532_3: Yā sattesu karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti,
atk-s0302a:533_0: Imaṃ avihiṃsādhātuṃ paṭicca vuttanayeneva avihiṃsāsaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:535_2: bhikkhaveti ito paṭṭhāya ajjhāsayaṃ dhātūti dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:535_3: Uppajjati saññāti ajjhāsayaṃ paṭicca saññā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:535_6: Idhāpi “kaccāno pañhaṃ pucchissatī”ti tassa okāsadānatthaṃ ettāvatāva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:535_9: Kiṃ paṭicca paññāyatīti kismiṃ sati hotīti?
atk-s0302a:535_11: Asammāsambuddhesu tesu sammāsambuddhā eteti evaṃ uppannaṃ titthiyasāvakānampi diṭṭhiṃ pucchatiyeva.
atk-s0302a:536_0: Idāni yasmā tesaṃ avijjādhātuṃ paṭicca sā diṭṭhi hoti,
atk-s0302a:536_2: tasmā mahatiṃ dhātuṃ paṭicca tassā uppattiṃ dīpento mahatī kho esātiādimāha. Hīnaṃ, kaccāna,
atk-s0302a:536_5: Sā panesā itthibhāvaṃ vā makkaṭāditiracchānabhāvaṃ vā patthentassa uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:536_6: Hīno puggaloti yassete hīnā dhammā uppajjanti,
atk-s0302a:536_10: Hīnaṃ ācikkhatīti so ācikkhantopi hīnameva ācikkhati,
atk-s0302a:536_12: Upapattīti dve upapattiyo paṭilābho ca nibbatti ca.
atk-s0302a:536_15: Tassa hi pañcasu nīcakulesu uppajjanato hīnā nibbatti,
atk-s0302a:536_21: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne nibbattiyeva adhippetāti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:540_4: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti mahāpaññesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:540_5: Iti naṃ “khandhantaraṃ dhātvantaraṃ āyatanantaraṃ satipaṭṭhānabodhipakkhiyadhammantaraṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ
atk-s0302a:540_7: Sopi tesaṃ pathaviṃ pattharento viya sinerupādato vālikaṃ uddharanto viya cakkavāḷapabbataṃ bhindanto
atk-s0302a:540_8: viya sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya ākāsaṃ vitthārento viya candimasūriye uṭṭhāpento viya ca pucchitapucchitaṃ katheti.
atk-s0302a:541_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti iddhimantesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:541_3: Iti naṃ “parikammaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vikubbanaṃ pucchissāmā”ti iddhimantova parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:542_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti dhutavādesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:542_3: Iti naṃ “dhutaṅgaparihāraṃ ānisaṃsaṃ samodhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhedaṃ pucchissāmā”ti dhutavādāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:543_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti dibbacakkhukesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:543_3: Iti naṃ “dibbacakkhussa parikammaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ upakkilesaṃ pucchissāmā”ti dibbacakkhukāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:544_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo mantāṇiputto”ti dhammakathikesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:544_3: Iti naṃ “dhammakathāya saṅkhepavitthāragambhīruttānavicitrakathādīsu taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ pucchissāmā”ti dhammakathikāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:544_5: dhammakathikena nāma ādito parisaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0302a:544_7: ante catusaccavasena kūṭaṃ gaṇhitu”nti evaṃ taṃ taṃ dhammakathānayaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:545_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”ti vinayadharesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:545_3: Iti naṃ “garukalahukaṃ satekicchaatekicchaṃ āpattānāpattiṃ pucchissāmā”ti vinayadharāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:546_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti bahussutesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:546_3: Iti naṃ “dasavidhaṃ byañjanabuddhiṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ anusandhiṃ pubbāparaṃ pucchissāmā”ti bahussutāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:547_1: tena naṃ “kulasaṅgaṇhanaparihāraṃ nānappakārakaṃ kohaññataṃ pucchissāmā”ti pāpicchāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:547_2: Sopi tesaṃ taṃ taṃ niyāmaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:548_1: “Devadatto satthari paduṭṭhacitto anatthampi kātuṃ upakkameyyā”ti ārakkhaggahaṇatthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:548_6: Kiṃ pana devadatto bhagavato anatthaṃ kātuṃ samattho,
atk-s0302a:550_1: Chaṭṭhe gūtho gūthena saṃsandati sametīti samuddantare janapadantare cakkavāḷantare ṭhitopi vaṇṇenapi
atk-s0302a:550_2: gandhenapi rasenapi nānattaṃ anupagacchanto saṃsandati sameti,
atk-s0302a:550_5: Ayaṃ pana aniṭṭhaupamā hīnajjhāsayānaṃ hīnaajjhāsayassa sarikkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ āhaṭā,
atk-s0302a:551_2: Asaṃsaggena chijjatīti ekato ṭhānanisajjādīni akarontassa asaṃsaggena adassanena chijjati.
atk-s0302a:553_1: Sattame assaddhā assaddhehītiādīsu buddhe vā dhamme vā saṅghe vā saddhāvirahitā nirojā nirasā puggalā
atk-s0302a:553_2: samuddassa orimatīre ṭhitā pārimatīrepi ṭhitehi assaddhehi saddhiṃ tāya assaddhatāya ekasadisā nirantarā honti.
atk-s0302a:553_8: duppaññā khandhādiparicchedikāya paññāya abhāvena nippaññā tādiseheva duppaññehi,
atk-s0302a:553_12: bahussutā sutadharā āgamadharā tantipālakā vaṃsānurakkhakā bahussutehi,
atk-s0302a:553_15: paññavanto mahāpaññehi vajirūpamañāṇehi paññavantehi saddhiṃ dūre ṭhitāpi tāya paññāsampattiyā saṃsandanti samenti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:555_1: Aṭṭhamādīni teyeva assaddhādidhamme tikavasena katvā desitāni.
atk-s0302a:555_2: Tattha aṭṭhame assaddhādimūlakā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhavasena pañca tikā vuttā,
atk-s0302a:555_6: dvādasame kusītamūlako eko tiko vuttoti sabbepi pañcasu suttantesu pannarasa tikā honti.
atk-s0302a:559_5: Evaṃ vuccamāne bujjhanakapuggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena hi etāni vuttāni.
atk-s0302a:561_4: Tattha tatiye surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhāyinoti surāmerayasaṅkhātaṃ majjaṃ yāya pamādacetanāya pivanti,
atk-s0302a:562_6: paresaṃ atthabhañjakaṃ tucchaṃ alikaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāroti attho.
atk-s0302a:562_13: Micchā pāpikā viññugarahitā etesaṃ diṭṭhīti micchādiṭṭhikā,
atk-s0302a:562_14: kammapathapariyāpannāya “natthi dinna”ntiādivatthukāya micchattapariyāpannāya aniyyānikadiṭṭhiyā samannāgatāti attho.
atk-s0302a:562_15: Sammā sobhanā viññupasatthā etesaṃ diṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhikā,
atk-s0302a:562_16: kammapathapariyāpannāya “atthi dinna”ntiādikāya kammassakatadiṭṭhiyā sammattapariyāpannāya maggadiṭṭhiyā ca samannāgatāti attho.
atk-s0302a:563_0: Yo pana tesaṃ pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo abhijjhā
atk-s0302a:563_1: byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti kaṇhapakkhe dasavidho attho hoti.
atk-s0302a:563_6: Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
atk-s0302a:563_7: So guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:563_13: Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:564_11: Atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbo.
atk-s0302a:565_3: yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo hoti.
atk-s0302a:565_4: Tasmiṃ pana parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:565_8: Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ,
atk-s0302a:565_9: taṃ taṃ guṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0302a:566_10: kusāvahāroti imesaṃ avahārānaṃ vasena pavattāti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0302a:567_2: Lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro.
atk-s0302a:567_3: Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitā piturakkhitā mātāpiturakkhitā bhāturakkhitā
atk-s0302a:567_4: bhaginirakkhitā ñātirakkhitā gottarakkhitā dhammarakkhitā sārakkhā saparidaṇḍāti māturakkhitādayo dasa,
atk-s0302a:567_5: dhanakkītā chandavāsinī bhogavāsinī paṭavāsinī odapattakinī obhatacumbaṭā dāsī ca bhariyā ca kammakārī
atk-s0302a:567_6: ca bhariyā ca dhajāhaṭā muhuttikāti etā dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati itthiyo.
atk-s0302a:567_8: dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā.
atk-s0302a:567_10: So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:568_0: Musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako vacīpayogo kāyappayogo vā,
atk-s0302a:568_5: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0302a:568_9: Api ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya natthītiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:568_11: Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena “ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:568_19: So kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:568_20: Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0302a:569_5: Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ karoti,
atk-s0302a:570_1: attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇavācā.
atk-s0302a:570_9: iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsikoti piyakamyatā vā,
atk-s0302a:571_2: eko kira dārako mātu vacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0302a:571_5: Athassa tatheva araññe mahiṃsī uṭṭhāsi. Dārako,
atk-s0302a:571_11: Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti.
atk-s0302a:571_12: Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0302a:571_14: uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti.
atk-s0302a:571_15: Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0302a:571_19: Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti,
atk-s0302a:571_21: Na hi mārāpetukāmassa “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā hoti.
atk-s0302a:573_2: Sā “aho vatidaṃ mamassā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā adinnādānaṃ viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca.
atk-s0302a:573_3: Tassā dve sambhārā parabhaṇḍaṃ attano pariṇāmanañca.
atk-s0302a:573_4: Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0302a:573_5: yāva na “aho vatidaṃ mamassā”ti attano pariṇāmetīti.
atk-s0302a:574_5: Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0302a:574_6: yāva na “aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā”ti tassa vināsaṃ cinteti.
atk-s0302a:575_1: Sā “natthi dinna”ntiādinā nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā samphappalāpo viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca.
atk-s0302a:575_5: vatthuno ca gahitākāraviparītatā yathā ca naṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0302a:576_0: Imesaṃ pana dasannaṃ akusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:576_1: Tattha dhammatoti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanādhammāva honti,
atk-s0302a:576_4: micchādiṭṭhi cāti ime aṭṭha kammapathā eva honti,
atk-s0302a:576_7: Abhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā lobho akusalamūlaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:577_7: Samphappalāpo diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena sattārammaṇo vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā,
atk-s0302a:578_1: Kiñcāpi hi rājāno coraṃ disvā hasamānāpi “gacchatha naṃ ghātethā”ti vadanti,
atk-s0302a:580_1: Yāya pana viratiyā ete paṭiviratā nāma honti,
atk-s0302a:580_2: sā bhedato tividhā hoti sampattavirati samādānavirati samucchedaviratīti.
atk-s0302a:580_3: Tattha asamādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ attano jātivayabāhusaccādīni paccavekkhitvā “ayuttaṃ amhākaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:580_4: kātu”nti sampattaṃ vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati sampattaviratīti veditabbā sīhaḷadīpe
atk-s0302a:580_6: Tassa kira daharakāleyeva mātu rogo uppajji.
atk-s0302a:580_8: Tato cakkanassa bhātā “gaccha tāta khettaṃ āhiṇḍāhī”ti cakkanaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0302a:580_10: Tasmiñca samaye eko saso taruṇasassaṃ khādituṃ āgato hoti.
atk-s0302a:580_11: So taṃ disvā vegena dhāvanto valliyā baddho “kiri kirī”ti saddamakāsi.
atk-s0302a:580_12: Cakkano tena saddena gantvā taṃ gahetvā cintesi “mātu bhesajjaṃ karomī”ti.
atk-s0302a:580_15: yvāhaṃ mātu jīvitakāraṇā paraṃ jīvitā voropeyya”nti.
atk-s0302a:580_16: Atha naṃ “gaccha araññe sasehi saddhiṃ tiṇodakaṃ paribhuñjā”ti muñci.
atk-s0302a:580_22: nābhijānāmi sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropetā”ti saccaṃ vatvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0302a:581_0: Samādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ pana sikkhāpadasamādāne ca tatuttari ca attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ
atk-s0302a:581_3: So kira ambariyavihāravāsīpiṅgalabuddharakkhitattherassa santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā khettaṃ kasati.
atk-s0302a:581_11: yvāhaṃ bhāvanīyassa garuno santike sikkhāpadaṃ gahetvā bhindeyya”nti.
atk-s0302a:581_14: na sikkhāpada”nti aṃse ṭhapitaṃ tikhiṇadaṇḍavāsiṃ araññe chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0302a:582_1: yassā uppattito pabhuti pāṇaṃ ghātessāmīti ariyapuggalānaṃ cittampi na uppajjatīti.
atk-s0302a:583_1: evaṃ imesampi kusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:583_2: Tattha dhammatoti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanāpi vaṭṭanti viratiyopi,
atk-s0302a:584_2: ante tayo kammapathā ceva mūlāni ca.
atk-s0302a:584_3: Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā alobho kusalamūlaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:585_3: Yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati,
atk-s0302a:585_4: evaṃ jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāpete kammapathā pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:586_0: Vedanātoti sabbe sukhavedanā vā honti majjhattavedanā vā. Kusalaṃ patvā hi dukkhavedanā nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:587_0: Mūlatoti paṭipāṭiyā satta ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosaamohavasena timūlā honti,
atk-s0302a:587_4: Alobho pana attanāva attano mūlaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0302a:589_0: 112. Chaṭṭhaṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅgavasena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:595_6: vitthārato pana vīsatikoṭṭhāsādivasena etā kathetabbā. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:597_1: Dutiye ayaṃ pathavīdhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ pathavīdhātunissayo assādo.
atk-s0302a:597_3: “idha me aṅgulaṃ pavesituṃ vāyamathā”ti vā hatthaṃ pasāretvā,
atk-s0302a:597_9: Ayaṃ pathavīdhātuyā ādīnavoti yena ākārena sā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā,
atk-s0302a:597_11: Chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti nibbānaṃ āgamma pathavīdhātuyā chandarāgo vinīyati ceva pahīyati ca,
atk-s0302a:598_0: Ayaṃ āpodhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ āpodhātunissayo assādo.
atk-s0302a:598_2: “kiṃ ayaṃ nipannakālato paṭṭhāya passāvaṭṭhānābhimukho nikkhamati ceva pavisati ca,
atk-s0302a:598_3: appamattakampissa kammaṃ karontassa sedatintaṃ vatthaṃ pīḷetabbatākāraṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0302a:598_5: mayaṃ pana sāyaṃ nipannā pātova uṭṭhahāma,
atk-s0302a:598_7: mahākammaṃ karontānaṃ sedamattampi no na uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:598_8: asanisaddena viya dhammaṃ kathentānaṃ sarīre usumākāramattampi no natthī”ti evaṃ pavattānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:599_0: Ayaṃ tejodhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ tejodhātunissayo assādo.
atk-s0302a:599_2: “kiṃ ime kiñcideva yāgubhattakhajjamattaṃ ajjhoharitvā thaddhakucchino nisīditvā sabbarattiṃ aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ pariyesanti,
atk-s0302a:599_3: phusitamattesupi sarīre patitesu aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ ottharitvā pārupitvāva nipajjanti?
atk-s0302a:599_4: Mayaṃ pana atithaddhampi maṃsaṃ vā pūvaṃ vā khādāma,
atk-s0302a:599_6: tāvadeva no sabbaṃ pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilīyati,
atk-s0302a:599_7: sattāhavaddalikāya vattamānāya sarīre sītānudahanamattampi no natthī”ti evaṃ pavattānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:600_0: Ayaṃ vāyodhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ vāyodhātunissayo assādo.
atk-s0302a:600_2: “imesaṃ appamattakampi kammaṃ karontānaṃ anumodanamattampi kathentānaṃ sarīraṃ vāto vijjhati,
atk-s0302a:600_5: kucchivātasīsavātakaṇṇavātādīhi niccupaddutā telaphāṇitādīni vātabhesajjāneva karontā atināmenti,
atk-s0302a:600_6: amhākaṃ pana mahākammaṃ karontānampi tiyāmarattiṃ dhammaṃ kathentānampi ekadivaseneva dasa yojanāni gacchantānampi
atk-s0302a:600_7: hatthapādasaṃsīdanamattaṃ vā piṭṭhirujjanamattaṃ vā na hotī”ti,
atk-s0302a:600_9: Evaṃ pavattā hi etā dhātuyo assādenti nāma.
atk-s0302a:601_1: Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti uttaravirahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ,
atk-s0302a:601_4: “Bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti ca “antarā ca bodhiṃ antarā ca gaya”nti ca āgataṭṭhānesu hi rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:601_5: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo.
atk-s0302a:602_9: Buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti abhiseko viya rañño sabbalokissariyabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0302a:602_10: Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hoti.
atk-s0302a:603_0: Abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsinti “abhisambuddho ahaṃ patto paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito”ti evaṃ paṭijāniṃ.
atk-s0302a:603_1: Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādīti adhigataguṇadassanasamatthaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇañca me udapādi.
atk-s0302a:603_2: Akuppā me vimuttīti “ayaṃ mayhaṃ arahattaphalavimutti akuppā”ti evaṃ ñāṇaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0302a:603_3: Tattha dvīhākārehi akuppatā veditabbā kāraṇato ca ārammaṇato ca.
atk-s0302a:603_4: Sā hi catūhi maggehi samucchinnakilesānaṃ puna anivattanatāya kāraṇatopi akuppā,
atk-s0302a:603_5: akuppadhammaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattatāya ārammaṇatopi akuppā.
atk-s0302a:603_7: Natthi dāni punabbhavoti idāni puna añño bhavo nāma natthīti.
atk-s0302a:604_0: Imasmiṃ sutte cattāri saccāni kathitāni. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:604_6: Ettha hi yaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
atk-s0302a:604_13: Yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi,
atk-s0302a:606_0: 116. Tatiye acarinti ñāṇacārena acariṃ, anubhavanacārenāti attho. Yāvatāti yattako. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:608_1: Catutthe nissaṭātiādīni ādito vuttapaṭisedhena yojetvā “na nissaṭā,
atk-s0302a:608_4: na vimariyādikatena cetasā vihariṃsū”ti evaṃ veditabbāni.
atk-s0302a:608_7: Tattha ca yassa upaḍḍhā kilesā pahīnā,
atk-s0302a:608_11: tassa cittaṃ pahīnakilese vā vaṭṭaṃ vā sandhāya vimariyādikataṃ,
atk-s0302a:608_12: appahīnakilese vā vaṭṭaṃ vā sandhāya na vimariyādikataṃ.
atk-s0302a:608_13: Idha pana ubhayassāpi pahīnattā “vimariyādikatena cetasā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0302a:608_14: mariyādaṃ akatvā ṭhitena atikkantamariyādena cetasāti attho.
atk-s0302a:608_15: Iti tīsupi imesu suttesu catusaccameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:610_1: Pañcame ekantadukkhāti atikkamitvā ṭhitassa tattakāro viya ekanteneva dukkhā.
atk-s0302a:612_0: 119-123. Chaṭṭhasattamesu vivaṭṭaṃ, avasāne tīsu catusaccamevāti. Chaṭṭhādīni.
atk-s0302a:618_2: vassasataṃ vassasahassaṃ ñāṇena anugantvāpi amataggo aviditaggo,
atk-s0302a:618_3: nāssa sakkā ito vā etto vā aggaṃ jānituṃ,
atk-s0302a:618_6: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyatīti purimamariyādā na dissati.
atk-s0302a:618_7: Yadaggena cassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati,
atk-s0302a:618_10: Pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyāti idaṃ upamāya khuddakattā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:618_15: samuddo viya taḷāka”nti hi vutte na tesaṃ tādisaṃ pamāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:618_19: evarūpānaṃ pana jambudīpānaṃ satepi sahassepi satasahassepi tiṇādīni tena upakkamena pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyuṃ,
atk-s0302a:618_26: Sā hi punappunaṃ marantehi sarīranikkhepena vaḍḍhitā.
atk-s0302a:620_2: Nikkhipeyyāti taṃ pathaviṃ bhinditvā vuttappamāṇaṃ guḷikaṃ karitvā ekamantaṃ ṭhapeyya. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:622_3: Catūsu mahāsamuddesūti sinerurasmīhi paricchinnesu catūsu mahāsamuddesu.
atk-s0302a:622_8: Pubbadakkhiṇapassehi nikkhantā rajatamaṇirasmiyo ekato hutvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhena gantvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0302a:622_11: uttarapācīnapassehi nikkhantā suvaṇṇarajatarasmiyo ekato hutvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhena gantvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0302a:622_12: Tāsaṃ rasmīnaṃ antaresu cattāro mahāsamuddā honti.
atk-s0302a:622_18: Rogo pana sayameva ārogyaṃ viyasati vināsetīti byasanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:624_2: Imesañhi sattānaṃ gaṇḍuppādakipillikādīsu vā macchakacchapādīsu vā pakkhijātesu vā nibbattakāle mātukhīrameva natthi,
atk-s0302a:624_5: Tattha ajādikāle ca manussesu cāpi “devī sumanā tissā”ti evaṃ nānānāmikānaṃ kucchiyaṃ nibbattakāle aggahetvā
atk-s0302a:624_6: tissāti ekanāmikāya eva mātu kucchiyaṃ nibbattakāle pītaṃ thaññaṃ catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakato bahutaranti
atk-s0302a:626_3: “satthā anamataggassa saṃsārassa dīghatamattā ‘na sukaraṃ na sukara’nti kathetiyeva,
atk-s0302a:626_7: Kāsikenāti tayo kappāsaṃsū ekato gahetvā kantitasuttamayena atisukhumavatthena.
atk-s0302a:628_1: Chaṭṭhe āyasaṃ nagaranti āyasena pākārena parikkhittaṃ nagaraṃ,
atk-s0302a:628_2: na pana anto āyasehi ekabhūmikādipāsādehi ākiṇṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:630_1: Sattame anussareyyunti ekena kappasatasahasse anussarite aparo tassa ṭhitaṭṭhānato aññaṃ satasahassaṃ,
atk-s0302a:630_2: aññopi aññanti evaṃ cattāropi cattārisatasahassāni anussareyyuṃ. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:632_1: Aṭṭhame yā etasmiṃ antare vālikāti yā etasmiṃ āyāmato pañcayojanasatike antare vālikā.
atk-s0302a:634_2: Imesaṃ pana sattānaṃ saaṭṭhikālato anaṭṭhikālova bahutaro.
atk-s0302a:634_5: tasmā anaṭṭhikālañca bahuaṭṭhikālañca aggahetvā samaṭṭhikālova gahetabbo.
atk-s0302a:642_2: Sabbe āraññikātiādīsu dhutaṅgasamādānavasena tesaṃ āraññikādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:642_7: Tesu hi puthujjano vā khīṇāsavo vā natthi.
atk-s0302a:644_1: Catutthādīsu liṅganiyamena ceva cakkavāḷaniyamena ca attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:644_6: Tesu imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe mātugāmakāle mātubhūtaññeva dassento yo namātābhūtapubboti āha.
atk-s0302a:646_1: Dasame bhūtapubbanti atītakāle ekaṃ apadānaṃ āharitvā dasseti.
atk-s0302a:646_3: Catūhena ārohantīti idaṃ thāmamajjhime sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:646_6: Tīhena ārohantīti ettāvatā kira dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ antare yojanaṃ pathavī ussannā,
atk-s0302a:647_0: Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato uttariṃ appaṃ dasa vā vīsaṃ vā vassāni.
atk-s0302a:647_2: uttamakoṭiyā pana saṭṭhi vā asīti vā vassāni jīvanti.
atk-s0302a:647_3: Vassasataṃ pana appatvā pañcavassadasavassādikāle mīyamānāva bahukā.
atk-s0302a:647_5: koṇāgamano tiṃsavassasahassāyukakāle nibbattoti idaṃ anupubbena parihīnasadisaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0302a:647_8: Kakusandho tāva bhagavā imasmiṃyeva kappe cattālīsavassasahassāyukakāle nibbatto āyuppamāṇaṃ pañca koṭṭhāse
atk-s0302a:647_9: katvā cattāro ṭhatvā pañcame vijjamāneyeva parinibbuto.
atk-s0302a:647_10: Taṃ āyu parihāyamānaṃ dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ hutvā tato parihāyamānaṃ tiṃsavassasahassāyukakāle ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:647_12: Tasmimpi tatheva parinibbute taṃ āyu dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ hutvā parihāyitvā vīsavassasahassakāle ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:647_14: Tasmimpi tatheva parinibbute taṃ āyu dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ hutvā parihāyitvā vassasatakālaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0302a:647_16: Evaṃ anupubbena parihāyitvā vaḍḍhitvā vaḍḍhitvā parihīnanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:647_17: Tattha ca yaṃ āyuparimāṇesu mandesu buddhā nibbattanti,
atk-s0302a:652_3: atha kho yathāladdhādīnaṃ itarītarena yena kenaci santuṭṭhoti attho.
atk-s0302a:652_4: Cīvarasmiñhi tayo santosā yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti.
atk-s0302a:653_1: idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā,
atk-s0302a:653_6: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā,
atk-s0302a:653_8: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:653_11: so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvā –
atk-s0302a:653_15: idaṃ appalābhīnaṃ hotū”ti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito vā pana nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:654_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0302a:654_5: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati,
atk-s0302a:654_7: so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhutvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:654_13: tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:655_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā,
atk-s0302a:655_1: so tena neva somanassaṃ na paṭighaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0302a:655_4: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0302a:655_6: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:655_8: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati,
atk-s0302a:655_9: so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:655_13: niddābhibhūtassa paṭibujjhato pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0302a:655_14: so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasanto santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:656_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0302a:656_6: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato telaṃ gahetvā vā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:656_11: appalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:656_12: Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ “gaṇha, bhante,
atk-s0302a:656_13: yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0302a:656_14: atha “muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇita”nti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:657_8: Ayaṃ tādisoti dassetuṃ itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:657_11: Yathā ca ekacco “kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti puññavantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kohaññaṃ karonto uttasati paritassati,
atk-s0302a:657_12: ayaṃ evaṃ aladdhā ca cīvaraṃ na paritassati.
atk-s0302a:657_17: Ādīnavadassāvīti anesanāpattiyañca gadhitaparibhoge ca ādīnavaṃ passamāno.
atk-s0302a:657_19: “yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā”ti vuttanissaraṇameva jānanto paribhuñjatīti attho.
atk-s0302a:657_20: Itarītarena piṇḍapātenātiādīsupi yathāladdhādīnaṃ yena kenaci piṇḍapātena,
atk-s0302a:658_2: ovadissāmīti ettha yathā mahākassapatthero catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭho,
atk-s0302a:658_3: tumhepi tathārūpā bhavathāti ovadanto kassapena ovadati nāma.
atk-s0302a:658_4: Yo vā panassa kassapasadisoti etthāpi yo vā panaññopi kassapasadiso mahākassapatthero viya catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭho bhaveyya,
atk-s0302a:658_5: tumhepi tathārūpā bhavathāti ovadanto kassapasadisena ovadati nāma.
atk-s0302a:658_6: Tathattāya paṭipajjitabbanti “sammāsambuddhassa imāya imasmiṃ santuṭṭhisutte vuttasallekhācārapaṭipattiyā kathanaṃ nāma bhāro,
atk-s0302a:658_7: amhākampi imaṃ paṭipattiṃ paripūraṃ katvā pūraṇaṃ bhāroyeva,
atk-s0302a:658_8: āgato kho pana bhāro gahetabbo”ti cintetvā yathā mayā kathitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:660_1: Dutiye anātāpīti yaṃ vīriyaṃ kilese ātapati,
atk-s0302a:660_3: Anottappīti nibbhayo kilesuppattito kusalānuppattito ca bhayarahito.
atk-s0302a:660_6: Anuttarassa yogakkhemassāti arahattassa tañhi anuttarañceva catūhi ca yogehi khemaṃ.
atk-s0302a:661_0: Anuppannātiādīsu ye pubbe appaṭiladdhapubbaṃ cīvarādiṃ vā paccayaṃ upaṭṭhākasaddhivihārika-
atk-s0302a:661_1: antevāsīnaṃ vā aññatarato manuññavatthuṃ paṭilabhitvā taṃ subhaṃ sukhanti ayoniso gaṇhantassa aññataraṃ
atk-s0302a:661_2: vā pana ananubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathā tathā vā ayoniso āvajjentassa lobhādayo pāpakā akusalā dhammā
atk-s0302a:661_5: Aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā nāma pāpakā dhammā natthi.
atk-s0302a:661_6: Anubhūtapubbepi ca vatthumhi ārammaṇe vā yassa pakatibuddhiyā vā uddesaparipucchāya vā pariyattinavakammayonisomanasikārānaṃ
atk-s0302a:661_7: vā aññataravasena pubbe anuppajjitvā pacchā tādisena paccayena sahasā uppajjanti,
atk-s0302a:661_9: Tesuyeva pana vatthārammaṇesu punappunaṃ uppajjamānā nappahīyanti nāma,
atk-s0302a:661_12: vitthārato pana uppannānuppannabhedo ca pahānappahānavidhānañca sabbaṃ visuddhimagge ñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddese kathitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:662_0: Anuppannā me kusalā dhammāti appaṭiladdhāpi sīlasamādhimaggaphalasaṅkhātā anavajjadhammā.
atk-s0302a:662_2: Nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti te sīlādidhammā parihānivasena puna anuppattiyā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:662_5: “Uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā”ti imassa pana sammappadhānassa vasenāyaṃ desanā katā.
atk-s0302a:662_7: paṭhamamaggo nirujjhamāno anatthāya saṃvatteyyāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:662_8: Iti imasmiṃ sutte ime cattāro sammappadhānā pubbabhāgavipassanāvasena kathitāti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:664_3: apica kho yathā cando gaganatalaṃ pakkhandamāno na kenaci saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā sinehaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā nikantiṃ vā patthanaṃ vā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0302a:664_4: na ca na hoti mahājanassa piyo manāpo,
atk-s0302a:664_5: tumhepi evaṃ kenaci saddhiṃ santhavādīnaṃ akaraṇena bahujanassa piyā manāpā candūpamā hutvā khattiyakulādīni cattāri kulāni upasaṅkamathāti attho.
atk-s0302a:664_8: evaṃ kilesandhakāravidhamanena ñāṇālokapharaṇena cāpi candūpamā hutvāti evamādīhipi nayehi ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:665_0: Apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittanti teneva santhavādīnaṃ akaraṇena kāyañca cittañca apakassitvā,
atk-s0302a:665_2: Yo hi bhikkhu araññepi na vasati,
atk-s0302a:665_16: Evarūpā hutvā kulāni upasaṅkamathāti dīpento “apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa citta”nti āha.
atk-s0302a:666_2: Āgantuko hi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagehaṃ pavisitvā sace naṃ gharasāmikā disvā,
atk-s0302a:666_3: “amhākaṃ puttabhātaro vippavāsaṃ gatā evaṃ vicariṃsū”ti anukampamānā nisīdāpetvā bhojenti,
atk-s0302a:666_5: na tehi saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0302a:666_7: evaṃ tumhepi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagharaṃ pavisitvā yaṃ iriyāpathesu pasannā manussā denti,
atk-s0302a:666_9: tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīye abyāvaṭā hutvā nikkhamathāti dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:667_0: Imassa pana niccanavakabhāvassa āvibhāvatthaṃ dvebhātikavatthu kathetabbaṃ –
atk-s0302a:667_1: vasāḷanagaragāmato kira dve bhātikā nikkhamitvā pabbajitā,
atk-s0302a:667_2: te cūḷanāgatthero ca mahānāgatthero cāti paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:667_3: Te cittalapabbate tiṃsa vassāni vasitvā arahattaṃ pattā “mātaraṃ passissāmā”ti āgantvā vasāḷanagaravihāre
atk-s0302a:667_5: Mātāpi tesaṃ uḷuṅkena yāguṃ nīharitvā ekassa patte ākiri.
atk-s0302a:667_9: Thero “pacchimaṃ theraṃ puccha upāsike”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0302a:667_15: Evaṃ mātarāpi saddhiṃ chinnasanthavo bhikkhu niccanavako nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:668_10: idhekacco saṅghamajjhe pallatthikāya vā nisīdati pāde pādaṃ ādhāyitvā vāti evamādi.
atk-s0302a:668_14: Bhojanasālāya pana vuḍḍhānaṃ āsanaṃ na deti,
atk-s0302a:668_18: Nhānatitthe ca yadidaṃ “daharo vuḍḍhoti pamāṇaṃ akatvā āgatapaṭipāṭiyā nhāyitabba”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0302a:668_19: tampi anādiyanto pacchā āgantvā udakaṃ otaritvā vuḍḍhe ca nave ca bādhati.
atk-s0302a:668_20: Bhikkhācāramagge pana aggāsanaaggodakaaggapiṇḍānaṃ atthāya purato gacchati bāhāya bāhaṃ paharanto.
atk-s0302a:669_3: Tathā pubbe vuttappakārassa gaṇassa majjhe puggalassa ca santike,
atk-s0302a:669_4: tattheva manussehi pañhaṃ puṭṭho vuḍḍhataraṃ anāpucchā vissajjeti.
atk-s0302a:669_5: Antaraghare pana “itthannāme kiṃ atthi? Kiṃ yāgu,
atk-s0302a:670_0: Anekaṭṭhānaṃ manopāgabbhiyaṃ nāma tesu tesu ṭhānesu kāyavācāhi ajjhācāraṃ anāpajjitvāpi manasāva kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vitakkanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:670_1: Apica dussīlasseva sato “sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti evaṃ pavattā pāpicchatāpi manopāgabbhiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:670_2: Iti sabbesampi imesaṃ pāgabbhiyānaṃ abhāvena appagabbhā hutvā upasaṅkamathāti vadati.
atk-s0302a:671_3: Apakasseva kāyanti tādisāni ṭhānāni yo khiḍḍādipasuto kāyaṃ anapakassa ekatobhāriyaṃ akatvāva vāyupatthambhakaṃ
atk-s0302a:671_4: aggāhāpetvā cittampi anapakassa “ettha patito hatthapādabhañjanādīni pāpuṇātī”ti anādīnavadassāvitāya
atk-s0302a:671_7: Yo pana udakatthiko vā aññena vā kenaci kiccena oloketukāmo kāyaṃ apakassa ekato bhāriyaṃ katvā vāyupatthambhakaṃ gāhāpetvā,
atk-s0302a:672_3: Yathā anapakaṭṭhakāyacitto tāni olokento puriso tattha patati,
atk-s0302a:672_4: evaṃ arakkhitehi kāyādīhi kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu bajjhati,
atk-s0302a:672_6: Yathā pana apakaṭṭhakāyacitto puriso tattha na patati,
atk-s0302a:672_7: evaṃ rakkhiteneva kāyena rakkhitehi cittehi rakkhitāya vācāya suppaṭṭhitāya satiyā apakaṭṭhakāyacitto
atk-s0302a:672_8: hutvā kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu na bajjhati.
atk-s0302a:672_18: yathā ca taṃ khāṇukaṇṭakādayo na vijjhanti,
atk-s0302a:672_20: Yathā so nirupaddavo yathāruci oloketvā sukhī yenakāmaṃ pakkamati,
atk-s0302a:672_21: evaṃ bhikkhu kulāni nissāya cīvarādayo paccaye paṭisevanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto
atk-s0302a:672_22: arahattaṃ patvā lokuttarasukhena sukhito yenakāmaṃ agatapubbaṃ nibbānadisaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0302a:673_0: Idāni yo hīnādhimuttiko micchāpaṭipanno evaṃ vadeyya “sammāsambuddho ‘tividhaṃ pāgabbhiyaṃ pahāya niccanavakattena
atk-s0302a:673_1: candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamathā’ti vadanto aṭṭhāne ṭhapeti,
atk-s0302a:673_3: yaṃ na sakkā kātuṃ taṃ kāretī”ti,
atk-s0302a:674_0: Ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesīti nīle gaganantare yamakavijjutaṃ cārayamāno viya heṭṭhābhāgaṃ uparibhāgaṃ ubhatopassesu pāṇiṃ sañcāresi.
atk-s0302a:674_1: Idañca pana tepiṭake buddhavacane asambhinnapadaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:674_5: bhikkhaveti idampi purimanayeneva paravādaṃ pacchinditvā atthi evarūpo bhikkhūti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:675_1: Tathattāya paṭipajjeyyunti sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūrayamānā,
atk-s0302a:675_2: samādhivipassanā maggaphalānaṃ āgataṭṭhāne tāni tāni sampādayamānā tathābhāvāya paṭipajjeyyuṃ.
atk-s0302a:675_6: bhikkhaveti idampi purimanayeneva paravādaṃ pacchinditvā atthi evarūpo bhikkhūti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:675_7: Kassapena vāti ettha candopamādivasena yojanaṃ katvā purimanayeneva attho veditabbo. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:679_2: Garukānīti taṃ satthu santikā laddhakālato paṭṭhāya chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne suttasaṃsibbanena ceva aggaḷadānena ca anekāni paṭalāni hutvā garukāni jātāni.
atk-s0302a:679_3: Nibbasanānīti pubbe bhagavatā nivāsetvā apanītatāya evaṃladdhanāmāni.
atk-s0302a:679_4: Tasmāti yasmā tvaṃ jiṇṇo ceva garupaṃsukūlo ca.
atk-s0302a:679_5: Gahapatānīti paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ vissajjetvā gahapatīhi dinnacīvarāni dhārehīti vadati.
atk-s0302a:679_6: Nimantanānīti piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ vissajjetvā salākabhattādīni nimantanāni bhuñjāhīti vadati.
atk-s0302a:679_7: Mama ca santiketi āraññikaṅgaṃ vissajjetvā gāmantasenāsaneyeva vasāhīti vadati.
atk-s0302a:680_0: Nanu ca yathā rājā senāpatiṃ senāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā tassa rājūpaṭṭhānādinā attano kammena ārādhentasseva
atk-s0302a:680_1: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ gahetvā aññassa dadamāno ayuttaṃ nāma karoti,
atk-s0302a:680_2: evaṃ satthā mahākassapattherassa paccuggamanatthāya tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ gantvā rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya
atk-s0302a:680_3: ca antare bahuputtakarukkhamūle nisinno tīhi ovādehi upasampādetvā tena saddhiṃ attano cīvaraṃ parivattetvā
atk-s0302a:680_5: so tasmiṃ kattukamyatāchandena satthu cittaṃ ārādhentasseva paṃsukūlādīni vissajjāpetvā gahapaticīvarapaṭiggahaṇādīsu niyojento ayuttaṃ nāma karotīti.
atk-s0302a:680_9: yathā pana aghaṭṭitā bheriādayo saddaṃ na vissajjenti,
atk-s0302a:680_10: evaṃ aghaṭṭitā evarūpā puggalā na sīhanādaṃ nadantīti nadāpetukāmo sīhanādajjhāsayena evamāha.
atk-s0302a:680_12: dīgharattaṃ āraññiko cevā”tiādinā nayena sīhanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0302a:681_6: Āraññiko pana gāvutaṃ vā aḍḍhayojanaṃ vā atikkamitvā araññaṃ ajjhogāhetvā vasanto dīpibyagghasīhādīnaṃ sadde suṇāti,
atk-s0302a:683_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
atk-s0302a:686_0: “Purato pacchato vāpi, aparo ce na vijjati;
atk-s0302a:687_0: Tattheva phāsu bhavati, ekassa ramato vane”ti.
atk-s0302a:689_1: Apiṇḍapātiko hi gāmato dūravihāre vasamāno kālasseva “yāguṃ vā pārivāsikabhattaṃ vā lacchāmi,
atk-s0302a:689_2: āsanasālāya vā pana uddesabhattādīsu kiñcideva mayhaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti makkaṭakasuttāni chindanto sayitagorūpāni
atk-s0302a:689_4: Manusse khettakammādīnaṃ atthāya gehā nikkhanteyeva sampāpuṇituṃ migaṃ anubandhanto viya vegena gacchanto turitacārī hoti.
atk-s0302a:689_5: Antarā kiñcideva disvā “asukaupāsako vā asukaupāsikā vā gehe,
atk-s0302a:689_9: sayaṃ pacchimadisaṃ gantukāmo pācīnadisāya salākaṃ labhitvā aññaṃ pacchimadisāya laddhasalākaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0302a:689_12: tumhākaṃ salākaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”ti salākaṃ parivatteti.
atk-s0302a:689_13: Ekaṃ vā pana salākabhattaṃ āharitvā paribhuñjanto “aparassāpi salākabhattassa pattaṃ dethā”ti manussehi vutte, “bhante,
atk-s0302a:689_15: ahaṃ mayhaṃ patte bhattaṃ pakkhipitvā tumhākaṃ pattaṃ dassāmī”ti aññassa pattaṃ dāpetvā bhatte āhaṭe
atk-s0302a:689_16: attano patte pakkhipitvā pattaṃ paṭidento pattaṃ parivatteti nāma.
atk-s0302a:689_18: iminā ca bhiyyo dūragāme salākā laddhā,
atk-s0302a:689_19: tattha agacchanto puna sattāhaṃ salākaṃ na labhatīti alābhabhayena gacchati,
atk-s0302a:689_20: evaṃ gacchanto palibuddho hutvā gacchati nāma.
atk-s0302a:689_29: udāhu uṇha”nti evaṃ tattha ca bahusaṃsayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:690_0: Piṇḍapātiko pana kālasseva vuṭṭhāya vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0302a:690_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā kālaṃ sallakkhetvā mahājanassa uḷuṅkabhikkhādīni dātuṃ pahonakakāle gacchatīti
atk-s0302a:690_3: ekekaṃ padavāraṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā vipassanto gacchatīti na turitacārī hoti,
atk-s0302a:690_11: Ekasmiṃ gāme vā vīthiyā vā alabhitvā aññattha carati.
atk-s0302a:690_12: Tasmimpi alabhitvā aññattha caranto missakodanaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā amataṃ viya paribhuñjitvā gacchati.
atk-s0302a:691_4: Paṃsukūliko pana na vassāvāsikaṃ pariyesanto carati,
atk-s0302a:693_4: Evaṃ panassa ahosi “ime na ciraṃ ṭhassanti,
atk-s0302a:693_6: so mayi parinibbute sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ nisīditvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ katvā mama sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālapavattanakaṃ karissati,
atk-s0302a:693_12: Appadakkhiṇaggāhinoti anusāsaniṃ sutvā padakkhiṇaṃ na gaṇhanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ na paṭipajjanti,
atk-s0302a:693_15: sutapariyattiṃ nissāya ativiya vādaṃ karonteti attho.
atk-s0302a:693_16: Ko bahutaraṃ bhāsissatīti dhammaṃ kathento ko bahuṃ bhāsissati, kiṃ tvaṃ,
atk-s0302a:693_19: eko bahuṃ bhāsanto asahitaṃ amadhuraṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0302a:693_22: Eko pana bahuñca sundarañca kathento ciraṃ na bhāsati,
atk-s0302a:695_4: Na santi bhikkhū ovādakāti imassa puggalassa ovādakā anusāsakā kalyāṇamittā natthīti idaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0302a:697_1: Aṭṭhame tathā hi panāti pubbe sovacassatāya,
atk-s0302a:697_4: Ko nāmāyaṃ bhikkhūti ko nāmo ayaṃ bhikkhu?
atk-s0302a:697_9: Sabrahmacārikāmoti “ime maṃ parivāretvā carantū”ti evaṃ kāmeti icchati patthetīti sabrahmacārikāmo.
atk-s0302a:697_11: Brahmacārupaddavenāti yo sabrahmacārīnaṃ catūsu paccayesu adhimattacchandarāgo upaddavoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:699_2: Yāni pana ito paraṃ vivicceva kāmehītiādinā nayena cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni,
atk-s0302a:699_3: sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamātiādinā nayena catasso arūpasamāpattiyo,
atk-s0302a:699_4: sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhanti evaṃ nirodhasamāpatti,
atk-s0302a:699_5: anekavihitaṃ iddhividhantiādinā nayena pañca lokikābhiññā ca vuttā.
atk-s0302a:699_7: taṃ sabbaṃ anupadavaṇṇanāya ceva bhāvanāvidhānena ca saddhiṃ visuddhimagge vitthāritameva.
atk-s0302a:699_8: Chaḷabhiññāya pana āsavānaṃ khayāti āsavānaṃ khayena.
atk-s0302a:701_6: Nanu ca so sayampi tepiṭako bahussuto,
atk-s0302a:701_9: Buddhapaṭibhāgassa pana sāvakassa kathaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññissantīti yācati.
atk-s0302a:701_10: Bahukicco tvaṃ bahukaraṇīyoti kiṃ thero navakammādipasuto,
atk-s0302a:701_12: satthari pana parinibbute catasso parisā ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0302a:702_3: Paṇḍito hi ñāṇasaṅkhātena vedena īhati sabbakiccāni karoti,
atk-s0302a:702_7: Dhammaṃ bhāsitabbaṃ maññatīti tipiṭakadharassa dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa sammukhe sayaṃ araññavāsī paṃsukūliko
atk-s0302a:702_15: Mā te saṅgho uttari upaparikkhīti mā bhikkhusaṅgho atirekaokāse taṃ upaparikkhīti.
atk-s0302a:702_19: tāya saddhiṃ santhavo vā sineho vā bhavissatī”ti mā taṃ saṅgho evaṃ amaññīti.
atk-s0302a:703_0: Idāni attano buddhapaṭibhāgabhāvaṃ dīpento taṃ kiṃ maññasi,
atk-s0302a:703_5: purimapādato paṭṭhāya yāva kumbhā vidatthādhikasattahatthubbedhanti attho.
atk-s0302a:703_9: buddhapaṭibhāgassa pana sāvakassa upavādaṃ vatvā mahākassapatthere chahi abhiññāhi sīhanādaṃ nadante
atk-s0302a:703_10: tassā kāsāvāni kaṇṭakasākhā viya kacchusākhā viya ca sarīraṃ khādituṃ āraddhāni,
atk-s0302a:703_11: tāni hāretvā setakāni nivatthakkhaṇeyevassā cittassādo udapādīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:705_1: Ekādasame dakkhiṇāgirisminti rājagahaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitassa girino dakkhiṇabhāge janapado dakkhiṇāgiri nāma,
atk-s0302a:705_3: Cārikā ca nāma duvidhā hoti turitacārikā ca aturitacārikā ca.
atk-s0302a:705_4: Tattha yaṃ ekacco ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā pattacīvaraṃ aṃse laggetvā chattaṃ ādāya sarīrato
atk-s0302a:705_6: yaṃ vā pana buddhā kiñcideva bodhaneyyasattaṃ disvā yojanasatampi yojanasahassampi khaṇena gacchanti,
atk-s0302a:705_8: Devasikaṃ pana gāvutaṃ aḍḍhayojanaṃ tigāvutaṃ yojananti ettakaṃ addhānaṃ ajjatanāya nimantanaṃ adhivāsayato janasaṅgahaṃ karoto gamanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:706_0: Nanu ca thero pañcavīsati vassāni chāyā viya dasabalassa pacchato pacchato gacchantova ahosi,
atk-s0302a:706_2: so kismiṃ kāle bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ cārikaṃ carituṃ okāsaṃ labhatīti?
atk-s0302a:706_4: Parinibbute kira satthari mahākassapatthero satthu parinibbāne sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe
atk-s0302a:706_6: mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyissāma,
atk-s0302a:706_7: tumhe pure vassūpanāyikāya attano palibodhaṃ ucchinditvā rājagahe sannipatathā”ti vatvā attanā rājagahaṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:706_8: Ānandattheropi bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ ādāya mahājanaṃ saññāpento sāvatthiṃ gantvā tato nikkhamma rājagahaṃ gacchanto dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ cārikaṃ cari.
atk-s0302a:707_0: Yebhuyyena kumārabhūtāti ye te hīnāyāvattā nāma,
atk-s0302a:707_1: te yebhuyyena kumārakā daharā taruṇā ekavassikadvevassikā bhikkhū ceva anupasampannakumārakā ca.
atk-s0302a:707_5: “ānandatthero satthu vissāsiko aṭṭha vare yācitvā upaṭṭhahati,
atk-s0302a:707_9: tasmiṃ āgate mayaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ kātuṃ labhissāmā”ti.
atk-s0302a:707_10: Iminā tāva kāraṇena nesaṃ ñātakā te pabbājesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:707_11: Satthari pana parinibbute tesaṃ sā patthanā upacchinnā,
atk-s0302a:708_4: Tattha hi tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā ekato paṭiggaṇhantānampi anāpatti,
atk-s0302a:709_1: Pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyāti dummaṅkūnaṃ niggaheneva pesalānaṃ uposathapavāraṇā vattanti,
atk-s0302a:709_5: Mā pāpicchā pakkhaṃ nissāya saṅghaṃ bhindeyyunti yathā devadatto sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñjanto pāpicche nissāya saṅghaṃ bhindi,
atk-s0302a:709_6: evaṃ aññepi pāpicchā gaṇabandhena kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñjamānā gaṇaṃ vaḍḍhetvā taṃ pakkhaṃ nissāya mā saṅghaṃ bhindeyyunti,
atk-s0302a:709_8: Kulānuddayatāya cāti bhikkhusaṅghe uposathapavāraṇaṃ katvā samaggavāsaṃ vasante manussā salākabhattādīni datvā saggaparāyaṇā bhavanti,
atk-s0302a:709_9: iti imāya kulānuddayatāya ca paññattanti attho.
atk-s0302a:710_0: Sassaghātaṃ maññe carasīti sassaṃ ghātento viya āhiṇḍasi.
atk-s0302a:710_1: Kulūpaghātaṃ maññe carasīti kulāni upaghātento viya hananto viya āhiṇḍasi.
atk-s0302a:710_5: ete tuyhaṃ pāyena yebhuyyena navakā ekavassikaduvassikā daharā ceva sāmaṇerā ca palujjanti bhijjanti.
atk-s0302a:710_6: Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano pamāṇaṃ na jānātīti theraṃ tajjento āha.
atk-s0302a:711_0: Kumārakavādā na muccāmāti kumārakavādato na muccāma.
atk-s0302a:711_1: Tathā hi pana tvanti idamassa evaṃ vattabbatāya kāraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:711_3: yasmā tvaṃ imehi navehi bhikkhūhi indriyasaṃvararahitehi saddhiṃ vicarasi,
atk-s0302a:711_4: tasmā kumārakehi saddhiṃ vicaranto kumārakoti vattabbataṃ arahasīti.
atk-s0302a:712_0: Aññatitthiyapubbo samānoti idaṃ yasmā therassa imasmiṃ sāsane neva ācariyo na upajjhāyo paññāyati,
atk-s0302a:713_5: Tattha aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddisitunti ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ aññaṃ mayhaṃ satthāti evaṃ uddisituṃ na jānāmi.
atk-s0302a:713_6: Sambādho gharāvāsotiādīsu sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti,
atk-s0302a:713_11: Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanamayapāsādadevavimānādīsu pihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati na sajjati na bajjhati,
atk-s0302a:713_13: Apica sambādho gharāvāso kusalakiriyāya okāsābhāvato rajāpatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:713_15: abbhokāso pabbajjā kusalakiriyāya yathā sukhaṃ okāsasabbhāvato.
atk-s0302a:714_2: yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ caritabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:714_3: ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:714_5: idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ,
atk-s0302a:714_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni
atk-s0302a:714_7: acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjeyyanti.
atk-s0302a:714_8: Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:715_0: Paṭapilotikānanti jiṇṇapilotikānaṃ terasahatthopi hi navasāṭako dasānaṃ chinnakālato paṭṭhāya pilotikāti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:715_1: Iti mahārahāni vatthāni chinditvā kataṃ saṅghāṭiṃ sandhāya “paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:715_2: Addhānamaggappaṭipannoti aḍḍhayojanato paṭṭhāya maggo addhānanti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:716_2: imassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya anupubbikathā kathetabbā –
atk-s0302a:716_3: atīte kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma satthā udapādi,
atk-s0302a:716_4: tasmiṃ haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya kheme migadāye viharante vedeho nāma kuṭumbiko asītikoṭidhanavibhavo
atk-s0302a:716_5: pātova subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya gandhapupphādīni gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0302a:716_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā mahānisabhattheraṃ nāma tatiyasāvakaṃ “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0302a:716_9: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ nisabho”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:716_10: Upāsako taṃ sutvā pasanno dhammakathāvasāne mahājane uṭṭhāya gate satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0302a:716_11: sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethā”ti āha. Mahā kho, upāsaka,
atk-s0302a:716_15: ekaṃ sāmaṇerampi vihāre asesetvā bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethāti.
atk-s0302a:716_17: Upāsako satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā gehaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ sajjetvā punadivase satthu kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0302a:716_18: Satthā pattacīvaramādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upāsakassa gharaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisinno dakkhiṇodakāvasāne
atk-s0302a:717_0: Tasmiṃ antare mahānisabhatthero piṇḍāya caranto tameva vīthiṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0302a:717_1: Upāsako disvā uṭṭhāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā “pattaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0302a:717_7: Upāsako therassa pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātassa pūretvā nīharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0302a:717_8: Tato theraṃ anugantvā nivatto satthu santike nisīditvā evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0302a:717_9: mahānisabhatthero ‘satthā gehe nisinno’ti vuttepi pavisituṃ na icchi,
atk-s0302a:717_10: atthi nu kho etassa tumhākaṃ guṇehi atireko guṇo”ti.
atk-s0302a:717_14: so bhikkhu na evaṃ nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ udikkhati.
atk-s0302a:717_19: Iti tassa ayañca ayañca guṇo”ti mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamānova kathesi.
atk-s0302a:717_20: Upāsako pakatiyāpi jalamānadīpo telena āsitto viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pasanno hutvā cintesi –
atk-s0302a:717_22: anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike dhutavādānaṃ aggabhāvatthāya patthanaṃ karissāmī”ti?
atk-s0302a:718_0: So punapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā teneva niyāmena satta divasāni dānaṃ datvā sattame divase aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassassa
atk-s0302a:718_1: ticīvarāni datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0302a:718_2: satta divasāni dānaṃ dentassa mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:718_3: imināhaṃ na aññaṃ devasampattiṃ vā sakkamārabrahmasampattiṃ vā patthemi,
atk-s0302a:718_4: idaṃ pana me kammaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike mahānisabhattherena pattaṭṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇanatthāya
atk-s0302a:718_7: samijjhissati nu kho”ti olokento samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā āha –
atk-s0302a:718_9: anāgate satasahassakappamatthake gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0302a:718_10: tassa tvaṃ tatiyasāvako mahākassapatthero nāma bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0302a:718_11: Taṃ sutvā upāsako “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti punadivase pattabbaṃ viya taṃ sampattiṃ amaññittha.
atk-s0302a:718_12: So yāvatāyukaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tattha kālaṅkato sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:719_0: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ito ekanavutikappe vipassimhi sammāsambuddhe bandhumatīnagaraṃ
atk-s0302a:719_1: nissāya kheme migadāye viharante devalokā cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ parijiṇṇe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:719_2: Tasmiñca kāle “vipassī bhagavā sattame sattame saṃvacchare dhammaṃ kathetī”ti mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:719_9: Brāhmaṇānaṃ kenacideva kiccena sannipāte sati brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā sayaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0302a:719_10: brāhmaṇīnaṃ sannipāte sati sayaṃ gehe tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0302a:719_12: Tasmiṃ pana divase brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ āha – “bhoti,
atk-s0302a:719_14: “Mayaṃ mātugāmajātikā nāma rattiṃ sotuṃ na sakkoma,
atk-s0302a:719_15: divā sossāmī”ti brāhmaṇaṃ gehe ṭhapetvā vatthaṃ pārupitvā upāsikāhi saddhiṃ divā gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0302a:719_16: ekamante nisinnā dhammaṃ sutvā upāsikāhiyeva saddhiṃ āgamāsi.
atk-s0302a:719_17: Atha brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā vatthaṃ pārupitvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:720_0: Tasmiṃ ca samaye satthā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane sannisinno cittabījaniṃ ādāya ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento
atk-s0302a:720_1: viya sineruṃ matthaṃ katvā sāgaraṃ nimmathento viya dhammakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0302a:720_2: Brāhmaṇassa parisante nisinnassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭhamayāmasmiṃyeva sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji.
atk-s0302a:720_7: apārupitvā ca nāma bahi carituṃ na sakkā”ti sabbathāpi adātukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:720_8: Athassa nikkhante paṭhamayāme majjhimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji,
atk-s0302a:720_9: so tatheva ca cintetvā tatheva adātukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:720_10: Athassa majjhimayāme nikkhante pacchimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji,
atk-s0302a:720_12: pacchāpi jānissāmī”ti vatthaṃ saṅgharitvā satthu pādamūle ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:720_13: Tato vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena tikkhattuṃ apphoṭetvā “jitaṃ me jitaṃ me”ti tayo vāre nadi.
atk-s0302a:721_0: Tasmiñca samaye bandhumarājā dhammāsanassa pacchato antosāṇiyaṃ nisinno dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0302a:721_1: Rañño ca nāma “jitaṃ me”ti saddo amanāpo hoti.
atk-s0302a:721_2: So purisaṃ pesesi “gaccha etaṃ puccha kiṃ vadesī”ti?
atk-s0302a:721_4: “avasesā hatthiyānādīni āruyha asicammādīni gahetvā parasenaṃ jinanti,
atk-s0302a:721_6: ahaṃ pana pacchato āgacchantassa kūṭagoṇassa muggarena sīsaṃ bhinditvā taṃ palāpento viya maccheracittaṃ madditvā pārutavatthaṃ dasabalassa adāsiṃ,
atk-s0302a:721_8: Puriso gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0302a:721_13: “ayaṃ mayhaṃ tuṇhī nisinnassa paṭhamaṃ kiñci adatvā satthu guṇe kathentassa adāsi,
atk-s0302a:721_14: satthu guṇe paṭicca uppannena mayhaṃ ko attho”ti tampi vatthayugaṃ dasabalasseva adāsi.
atk-s0302a:721_17: “tampi tena vatthayugaṃ tathāgatasseva dinna”nti sutvā aññāni dve vatthayugāni pesesi.
atk-s0302a:721_19: Rājā aññānipi cattārīti evaṃ yāva dvattiṃsa vatthayugāni pesesi.
atk-s0302a:721_20: Atha brāhmaṇo “idaṃ vaḍḍhetvā gahaṇaṃ viya hotī”ti attano atthāya ekaṃ brāhmaṇiyā atthāya ekanti dve
atk-s0302a:721_21: vatthayugāni gahetvā tiṃsa yugāni tathāgatasseva adāsi.
atk-s0302a:721_22: Tato paṭṭhāya ca satthu vissāsiko jāto.
atk-s0302a:722_0: Atha naṃ rājā ekadivasaṃ sītasamaye satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā satasahassagghanikaṃ attano pārutaṃ rattakambalaṃ datvā āha –
atk-s0302a:722_2: So “kiṃ me iminā kambalena imasmiṃ pūtikāye upanītenā”ti? Cintetvā,
atk-s0302a:722_3: antogandhakuṭiyaṃ tathāgatamañcassa upari vitānaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:722_4: Atha ekadivasaṃ rājā pātova vihāraṃ gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ satthu santike nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:722_5: Tasmiñca samaye chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo kambalaṃ paṭihaññanti,
atk-s0302a:722_13: na maya”nti pasīditvā yaṃ manussānaṃ upakārabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0302a:722_14: taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā sabbaṭṭhakaṃ nāma dānaṃ datvā purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:722_15: Sopi “aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ nāma catusaṭṭhi hotī”ti catusaṭṭhi salākabhattāni upanibandhāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cuto sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:723_0: Puna tato cuto imasmiṃ kappe koṇāgamanassa ca bhagavato kassapadasabalassa cāti dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ antare bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto,
atk-s0302a:723_1: so vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ araññe jaṅghavihāraṃ carati.
atk-s0302a:723_2: Tasmiñca samaye paccekabuddho nadītīre cīvarakammaṃ karonto anuvāte appahonte saṅgharitvā ṭhapetuṃ āraddho. So disvā, “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0302a:723_6: “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kenaci parihāni mā hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:723_7: Gharepissa bhaginiyā saddhiṃ bhariyāya kalahaṃ karontiyā paccekabuddho piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0302a:724_0: Athassa bhaginī paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā tassa bhariyaṃ sandhāya “evarūpaṃ bālaṃ yojanasatena parivajjeyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:724_2: “imāya dinnaṃ bhattaṃ esa mā bhuñjatū”ti pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalassa pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0302a:724_4: “bāle maṃ tāva akkosa vā pahara vā.
atk-s0302a:724_5: Evarūpassa pana dve asaṅkheyyāni pūritapāramissa pattato bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalaṃ dātuṃ na yutta”nti āha.
atk-s0302a:724_8: bhante”ti kalalaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattaṃ dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā pavarassa catumadhurassa pūretvā
atk-s0302a:724_9: upari āsittena padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0302a:724_11: evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ me sarīraṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:724_13: Tepi jāyampatikā yāvatāyukaṃ kusalaṃ katvā sagge nibbattitvā puna tato cavitvā upāsako bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0302a:725_1: Tassā pubbe adinnavipākassa tassa kammassa ānubhāvena patikulaṃ paviṭṭhamattāya ummārabbhantare sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0302a:725_3: Seṭṭhikumāro “kassāyaṃ gandho”ti pucchitvā “seṭṭhikaññāyā”ti sutvā “nīharatha nīharathā”ti ābhataniyāmeneva kulagharaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0302a:725_4: Sā eteneva nīhārena sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivattitā cintesi –
atk-s0302a:725_7: Attano ābharaṇabhaṇḍaṃ bhañjāpetvā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ kāresi ratanāyataṃ vidatthivitthataṃ caturaṅgulubbedhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:725_8: Tato haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ gahetvā aṭṭha uppalahatthake ādāya kassapadasabalassa cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatā.
atk-s0302a:725_9: Tasmiñca khaṇe ekā iṭṭhakapanti parikkhipitvā āgacchamānā ghaṭaniṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti.
atk-s0302a:725_14: Sā āruyha telena haritālamanosilaṃ yojetvā tena bandhanena iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā upari aṭṭhahi uppalahatthakehi pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā,
atk-s0302a:726_0: Atha tasmiṃyeva khaṇe yassa seṭṭhiputtassa paṭhamaṃ gehaṃ nītā,
atk-s0302a:726_19: Tassā saha gharappavesena sakalagehaṃ candanagandhañceva nīluppalagandhañca vāyi.
atk-s0302a:727_5: Sā ādito paṭṭhāya attano katakammaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0302a:727_6: Seṭṭhiputto “niyyānikaṃ vata buddhānaṃ sāsana”nti pasīditvā yojanikaṃ suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ kambalakañcukena
atk-s0302a:727_7: parikkhipitvā tattha tattha rathacakkappamāṇehi suvaṇṇapadumehi alaṅkari.
atk-s0302a:727_9: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasito yojanamatte ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:727_10: Seṭṭhikaññā devalokato cavitvā rājakule jeṭṭhadhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:728_0: Tesu vayappattesu kumārassa vasanagāme nakkhattaṃ saṃghuṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:728_12: natthi no ito sukhumatarassa paṭilābhāya puñña”nti.
atk-s0302a:728_14: “Putta ahaṃ ajjeva tuyhaṃ bārāṇasinagare rajjapaṭilābhampi icchāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:728_19: idha vā ettha vā gehe nisīdissatī”ti?
atk-s0302a:728_20: So pana puññaniyāmena nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā uyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipajji.
atk-s0302a:728_21: So cā bārāṇasirañño kālaṅkatassa sattamo divaso hoti.
atk-s0302a:729_0: Amaccā rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā mantayiṃsu –
atk-s0302a:729_11: pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ setacchattañca rathasmiṃyeva ṭhapetvā rathaṃ vissajjetvā pacchato tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:729_16: Ratho kumāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā ārohanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:729_17: Purohito pārupanakaṇṇaṃ apanetvā pādatalāni olokento “tiṭṭhatu ayaṃ dīpo,
atk-s0302a:729_18: dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu dīpesu esa rajjaṃ kātuṃ yutto”ti vatvā,
atk-s0302a:729_19: “punapi tūriyāni paggaṇhātha punapi paggaṇhāthā”ti tikkhattuṃ tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:730_11: Te tāvadeva abhisekamaṇḍapaṃ katvā rājadhītaraṃ sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā uyyānaṃ ānetvā kumārassa abhisekaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:731_15: Puna udakaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇaṃ pacchimaṃ uttaranti evaṃ catasso disā abbhukkiri,
atk-s0302a:731_16: sabbadisāsu aṭṭha aṭṭha katvā dvattiṃsa kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:731_17: So ekaṃ dibbadussaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā “nandarañño vijite suttakantikā itthiyo mā suttaṃ kantiṃsūti evaṃ bheriṃ cārāpethā”ti vatvā,
atk-s0302a:732_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante ekadivasaṃ devī rañño sampattiṃ disvā,
atk-s0302a:732_6: idāni anāgatassa paccayaṃ kusalaṃ na karothā”ti? Āha.
atk-s0302a:732_13: Devī pātova uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uparipāsāde puratthābhimukhā urena nipajjitvā –
atk-s0302a:733_0: Punadivase dakkhiṇadvāre dānaṃ sajjetvā tatheva akāsi,
atk-s0302a:733_2: Uttaradvāre sajjitadivase pana deviyā tatheva nimantentiyā himavante vasantānaṃ padumavatiyā puttānaṃ
atk-s0302a:733_3: pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ jeṭṭhako mahāpadumapaccekabuddho bhātike āmantesi “mārisā,
atk-s0302a:733_6: Te adhivāsetvā punadivase anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā ākāsena āgantvā uttaradvāre otariṃsu.
atk-s0302a:733_9: Rājā saddhiṃ deviyā gantvā vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā paccekabuddhe pāsādaṃ āropetvā tesaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne rājā saṅghatherassa,
atk-s0302a:733_13: amhākaṃ yāvajīvaṃ idha nivāsāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā uyyāne pañca paṇṇasālāsatāni pañca
atk-s0302a:733_14: caṅkamanasatānīti sabbākārena nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ sampādetvā tattha vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:734_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante rañño paccanto kupito.
atk-s0302a:734_2: tvaṃ paccekabuddhesu mā pamajjī”ti deviṃ ovaditvā gato.
atk-s0302a:734_4: Mahāpadumapaccekabuddho tiyāmarattiṃ jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā aruṇuggamane ālambanaphalakaṃ ālambitvā ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi,
atk-s0302a:734_6: Punadivase devī paccekabuddhānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ haritūpalittaṃ kāretvā pupphāni vikiritvā dhūpaṃ datvā
atk-s0302a:734_7: tesaṃ āgamanaṃ olokayantī nisinnā āgamanaṃ apassantī purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, tāta, jānāhi,
atk-s0302a:734_9: So gantvā mahāpadumassa paṇṇasālāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā tattha apassanto caṅkamanaṃ gantvā ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ disvā vanditvā, “kālo,
atk-s0302a:734_12: So “niddāyati maññe”ti gantvā piṭṭhipāde hatthena parāmasi.
atk-s0302a:734_13: Pādānaṃ sītalatāya ceva thaddhatāya ca parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā dutiyassa santikaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0302a:734_14: evaṃ tatiyassāti sabbesaṃ parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā rājakulaṃ gato. “Kahaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0302a:734_18: Devī kandantī rodantī nikkhamitvā nāgarehi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā sādhukīḷitaṃ kāretvā paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:734_19: sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:735_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato paccuggamanaṃ āgataṃ deviṃ pucchi “kiṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0302a:735_7: So nagaraṃ agantvā uyyānameva pavisitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa rajjaṃ paṭiyādetvā sayaṃ samaṇakapabbajjaṃ pabbaji,
atk-s0302a:735_10: Dvepi jhānaṃ bhāvetvā tato cutā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:736_0: Tesu tattheva vasantesu amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0302a:736_1: Ayaṃ pippalimāṇavo magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthabrāhmaṇagāme kapilabrāhmaṇassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatto,
atk-s0302a:736_2: ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare kosiyagottabrāhmaṇassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattā.
atk-s0302a:736_3: Tesaṃ kho anukkamena vaḍḍhamānānaṃ pippalimāṇavassa vīsatime vasse bhaddāya soḷasame vasse sampatte mātāpitaro puttaṃ oloketvā, “tāta,
atk-s0302a:737_0: Māṇavo “mama mātaraṃ saññāpessāmī”ti rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ datvā suvaṇṇakārehi ekaṃ itthirūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:737_1: kārāpetvā tassa majjanaghaṭṭanādikammapariyosāne taṃ rattavatthaṃ nivāsāpetvā vaṇṇasampannehi pupphehi
atk-s0302a:737_2: ceva nānāalaṅkārehi ca alaṅkārāpetvā mātaraṃ pakkosāpetvā āha –
atk-s0302a:737_8: addhā etena saha katapuññā suvaṇṇarūpakapaṭibhāgā bhavissatī”ti aṭṭha brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā sabbakāmehi santappetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā,
atk-s0302a:737_10: yattha amhākaṃ jātigottabhogehi samānakule evarūpaṃ dārikaṃ passatha,
atk-s0302a:738_4: Tattha taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ nhānatitthe ṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:738_5: Atha bhaddāya dhātī bhaddaṃ nhāpetvā alaṅkaritvā sirigabbhe nisīdāpetvā nhāyituṃ āgacchantī taṃ rūpakaṃ disvā,
atk-s0302a:738_11: Sā paṭikkamitvā “evaṃ thaddhaṃ nāma mahāgīvaṃ disvā,
atk-s0302a:738_13: ayyadhītāya hi me ayaṃ nivāsanapaṭiggāhikāpi ayuttā”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:738_14: Atha naṃ te manussā parivāretvā “evarūpā te sāmidhītā”ti pucchiṃsu. “Kiṃ esā,
atk-s0302a:738_15: imāya sataguṇena sahassaguṇena mayhaṃ ayyā abhirūpatarā,
atk-s0302a:738_18: “Tena hi āgacchā”ti taṃ khujjaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā kosiyagottassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā āgamanaṃ nivedayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:739_15: anatthiko hutvā paṇṇaṃ pesissāmī”ti rahogato paṇṇaṃ likhi,
atk-s0302a:739_19: Bhaddāpi “asukassa kira maṃ dātukāmā”ti sutvā rahogatā paṇṇaṃ likhi,
atk-s0302a:739_27: Bhaddāya pippalimāṇavassa pahitanti ca vutte dvepi vācetvā,
atk-s0302a:739_28: “passatha dārakānaṃ kamma”nti phāletvā araññe chaḍḍetvā samānapaṇṇaṃ likhitvā ito ca etto ca pesesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:740_0: Taṃdivasaṃyeva ca māṇavopi ekaṃ pupphadāmaṃ ganthāpesi,
atk-s0302a:740_2: Tāni āsanamajjhe ṭhapetvā bhuttasāyamāsā ubhopi “sayanaṃ āruhissāmā”ti samāgantvā māṇavo dakkhiṇapassena sayanaṃ āruhi.
atk-s0302a:740_7: Te pana aññamaññassa sarīrasamphassabhayena tiyāmarattiṃ niddaṃ anokkamantāva vītināmenti,
atk-s0302a:740_9: Te lokāmisena asaṃsaṭṭhā yāva mātāpitaro dharanti,
atk-s0302a:740_10: tāva kuṭumbaṃ avicāretvā tesu kālaṅkatesu vicārayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:740_12: ekadivasaṃ sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭetvā chaḍḍetabbaṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇameva magadhanāḷiyā dvādasanāḷimattaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0302a:741_0: So ekadivasaṃ alaṅkataṃ assaṃ āruyha mahājanaparivuto kammantaṃ gantvā khettakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito naṅgalehi
atk-s0302a:741_1: bhinnaṭṭhānato kākādayo sakuṇe gaṇḍuppādakādipāṇe uddharitvā khādante disvā, “tātā,
atk-s0302a:741_12: Sabbametaṃ bhaddāya kāpilāniyā niyyātetvā nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:742_0: Bhaddāpi kāpilānī tasmiṃ khaṇe abbhantaravatthumhi tayo tilakumbhe pattharāpetvā dhātīhi parivutā nisinnā kāke tilapāṇake khādamāne disvā,
atk-s0302a:742_7: yadi ca panetaṃ ettakena janena kataṃ akusalaṃ mayhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:742_8: bhavasahassenapi vaṭṭato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0302a:742_9: ayyaputte āgatamatteyeva sabbaṃ tassa niyyātetvā nikkhamma pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:743_0: Māṇavo āgantvā nhatvā pāsādaṃ āruyha mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdi,
atk-s0302a:743_2: Dvepi bhuñjitvā parijane nikkhante rahogatā phāsukaṭṭhāne nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:743_4: tvaṃ imaṃ gharaṃ āgacchantī kittakaṃ dhanaṃ āharī”ti?
atk-s0302a:743_14: Tesaṃ ādittapaṇṇakuṭi viya tayo bhavā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:743_15: Te “pabbajissāmā”ti vatvā antarāpaṇato kasāyarasapītāni vatthāni mattikāpatte ca āharāpetvā aññamaññaṃ kese ohāretvā,
atk-s0302a:743_17: te uddissa amhākaṃ pabbajjā”ti pabbajitvā thavikāsu patte osāpetvā aṃse laggetvā pāsādato otariṃsu.
atk-s0302a:743_18: Gehe dāsesu ca kammakāresu ca na koci sañjāni.
atk-s0302a:744_0: Atha ne brāhmaṇagāmato nikkhamma dāsagāmadvārena gacchante ākappakuttavasena dāsagāmavāsino sañjāniṃsu.
atk-s0302a:744_1: Te rudantā pādesu nipatitvā “kiṃ amhe anāthe karotha ayyā”ti? Āhaṃsu. “Mayaṃ,
atk-s0302a:744_5: tumheva tumhākaṃ sīsaṃ dhovitvā bhujissā hutvā jīvathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ rodantānaṃyeva pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:744_6: Thero purato gacchanto nivattitvā olokento cintesi –
atk-s0302a:744_7: “ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī sakalajambudīpagghanikā itthī mayhaṃ pacchato āgacchati.
atk-s0302a:744_9: yaṃ kocideva evaṃ cinteyya ‘ime pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0302a:744_11: “Koci vā pana manaṃ padūsetvā apāyapūrako bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:744_12: Imaṃ pahāya mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0302a:745_0: So purato gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ disvā tassa matthake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:745_3: tādisiṃ itthiṃ mama pacchato āgacchantiṃ disvā,
atk-s0302a:745_4: ‘ime pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkontī’ti cintetvā amhesu paduṭṭhacitto mahājano apāyapūrako bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:745_8: ‘pabbajitvāpi vinā na bhavantī’ti amhākaṃ dosaṃ passanti,
atk-s0302a:745_10: vinā bhavissāmā”ti tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha,
atk-s0302a:745_11: “satasahassakappappamāṇe addhāne kato mittasanthavo ajja bhijjatī”ti vatvā,
atk-s0302a:745_15: amhākaṃ vāmamaggo vaṭṭatī”ti vanditvā maggaṃ paṭipannā.
atk-s0302a:745_16: Tesaṃ dvedhābhūtakāle ayaṃ mahāpathavī “ahaṃ cakkavāḷagirisinerupabbate dhāretuṃ sakkontīpi tumhākaṃ
atk-s0302a:745_17: guṇe dhāretuṃ na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya viravamānā akampi,

atk-s0302a:753_1: Imañca pana vācaṃ bhagavā taṃ cīvaraṃ padumapupphavaṇṇena pāṇinā antantena parāmasanto āha.
atk-s0302a:753_6: Thero pana yasmā cīvarassa vā pattassa vā vaṇṇe kathite “imaṃ tumhākaṃ gaṇhathā”tivacanaṃ cārittameva,
atk-s0302a:753_11: tvaṃ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni paṃsukūlāni pārupituṃ sakkhissasīti vadati.
atk-s0302a:753_15: ahaṃ imaṃ cīvaraṃ puṇṇaṃ nāma dāsiṃ pārupitvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ taṃ susānaṃ pavisitvā tumbamattehi

atk-s0302a:753_20: “imaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhantena bhikkhunā jātipaṃsukūlikena jātiāraññikena jātiekāsanikena jātisapadānacārikena bhavituṃ vaṭṭati,

atk-s0302a:753_26: Evaṃ pana cīvaraparivattanaṃ katvā ca therena pārutacīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi,

atk-s0302a:754_0: Bhagavato puttotiādīsu thero bhagavantaṃ nissāya ariyāya jātiyā jātoti bhagavato putto.
atk-s0302a:754_1: Urena vasitvā mukhato nikkhantaovādavasena pabbajjāya ceva upasampadāya ca patiṭṭhitattā oraso mukhato jāto.
atk-s0302a:754_2: Ovādadhammato jātattā ovādadhammena ca nimmitattā dhammajo dhammanimmito.
atk-s0302a:754_4: Paṭiggahitāni sāṇāni paṃsukūlānīti satthārā pārutaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupanatthāya paṭiggahitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:755_0: Sammā vadamāno vadeyyāti yaṃ puggalaṃ “bhagavato putto”tiādīhi guṇehi sammā vadamāno vadeyya,
atk-s0302a:755_3: Ettāvatā therena pabbajjā ca parisodhitā hoti.
atk-s0302a:755_7: kiṃ so anupajjhāyo anācariyo nhāpitamuṇḍako sayaṃgahitakāsāvo “titthiyapakkantako”ti saṅkhaṃ gato evaṃ tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ paccuggamanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0302a:755_8: tīhi ovādehi pabbajjaṃ vā upasampadaṃ vā labhati,
atk-s0302a:755_10: Passa yāva dubbhāsitaṃ vacanaṃ thullanandāya bhikkhuniyāti.
atk-s0302a:755_11: Evaṃ pabbajjaṃ sodhetvā idāni chahi abhiññāhi sīhanādaṃ nadituṃ ahaṃ kho,

atk-s0302a:768_2: Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu,

atk-s0302a:768_10: Atha nesaṃ yadā vipassanā imehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā āraddhamattāva ṭhassati,
atk-s0302a:769_0: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi bhikkhū catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ anucchavikaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūrayiṃsu.

atk-s0302a:769_4: Gacchante pana kāle arahattassa anucchavikaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ asakkontā anāgāmiphalassa anucchavikaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūressanti,
atk-s0302a:769_7: Yadā pana sotāpattiphalassapi anucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretuṃ asakkontā sīlapārisuddhimatteva ṭhassanti,

atk-s0302a:770_9: Tasmiṃ antarahite sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:771_0: Nanu ca kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kapilo nāma anārādhakabhikkhu “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti bījaniṃ gahetvā
atk-s0302a:771_2: atha tassa bhayena yesampi pātimokkho vattati,

atk-s0302a:771_11: tesu sati mahātaḷāke padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti na vattabbāti evaṃ ekantato pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:772_0: Pathavīdhātūti dve satasahassāni cattāri ca nahutāni bahalā mahāpathavī.

atk-s0302a:773_7: Pariyattiyā pūrayamānāya pariyattidharā puggalā paṭipattiṃ pūrenti,

atk-s0302a:774_6: Tattha yo cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ ārohanto chattaṃ dhāreti,

atk-s0302a:777_0: Tisso pana sikkhā apūrentova sikkhāya agāravo nāma hoti.
