atk-s0302a:796_6: Arakkhiteneva kāyenātiādīsu hatthapāde kīḷāpento khandhaṭṭhiṃ vā nāmento kāyaṃ na rakkhati nāma,
atk-s0302a:796_7: nānāvidhaṃ duṭṭhullakathaṃ kathento vācaṃ na rakkhati nāma,
atk-s0302a:796_8: kāmavitakkādayo vitakkento cittaṃ na rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0302a:798_1: Dasame asakkārena cūbhayanti asakkārena ca ubhayena.
atk-s0302a:798_6: Sukhumaṃdiṭṭhivipassakanti arahattamaggadiṭṭhiyā sukhumadiṭṭhiphalasamāpattiatthāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā āgatattā vipassakaṃ.
atk-s0302a:798_8: Āhu sappuriso itīti sappurisoti kathentīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:802_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame sampajānamusā bhāsantanti appamattakenapi kāraṇena sampajānameva musā bhāsantaṃ.
atk-s0302a:802_2: “Sīlaṃ pūressāmī”ti saṃvihitabhikkhuṃ sinerumattopi paccayarāsi cāletuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0302a:802_3: Yadā pana sīlaṃ pahāya sakkāranissito hoti,
atk-s0302a:804_4: Āmisakiñcikkhahetūti kassacideva āmisassa hetu antamaso kuṇḍakamuṭṭhinopi.
atk-s0302a:804_5: Jīvitahetūti aṭaviyaṃ corehi gahetvā jīvite voropiyamāne tassapi hetu.
atk-s0302a:808_3: mātugāmoti na tassa raho ekakassa nisinnassa tena dhammena atthikopi mātugāmo cittaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:808_4: yassa lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṃ pariyādātuṃ sakkotīti, attho.
atk-s0302a:812_1: Sattame samudayantiādīsu saha pubbakammena attabhāvo kolaputtiyaṃ vaṇṇapokkharatā kalyāṇavākkaraṇatā
atk-s0302a:812_2: dhutaguṇāvīkaraṇaṃ cīvaradhāraṇaṃ parivārasampattīti evamādi lābhasakkārassa samudayo nāma,
atk-s0302a:812_4: nirodho ca paṭipadā ca nirodhasaccamaggasaccavaseneva veditabbā. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:816_1: Navame vāḷarajjuyāti suttādimayā rajju mudukā hoti vāḷarajju kharā pharusā,
atk-s0302a:818_3: Khīṇāsavo hi lābhī puññasampanno yāgukhajjakādīni gahetvā āgatāgatānaṃ anumodanaṃ karonto dhammaṃ desento
atk-s0302a:818_4: pañhaṃ vissajjento phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdituṃ okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0302a:822_5: yassa kusalamūlādisaṅkhātassa anavajjadhammassa asamucchinnattā devadatto sagge vā nibbatteyya,
atk-s0302a:824_3: Attavadhāya gabbhaṃ gaṇhātīti taṃ assena saddhiṃ sampayojenti,
atk-s0302a:824_4: sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā kāle sampatte vijāyituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:824_6: athassā cattāro pāde catūsu khāṇukesu bandhitvā kucchiṃ phāletvā potaṃ nīharanti,
atk-s0302a:826_2: Tassa pana pamāṇaṃ dassetuṃ pañca ca thālipākasatānīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:826_3: Tattha eko thālipāko dasannaṃ purisānaṃ bhattaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0302a:826_4: Nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyyunti acchapittaṃ vā macchapittaṃ vāssa nāsapuṭe pakkhipeyyaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:828_4: na vissajjessāmā”ti evaṃ corehi aṭaviyaṃ pucchamāno tassā corahatthagatāya mātuyāpi hetu sampajānamusā na bhāseyyāti attho.
atk-s0302a:833_1: Rāhulasaṃyuttassa paṭhame ekoti catūsu iriyāpathesu ekavihārī.
atk-s0302a:833_5: Pahitatto vihareyyanti visesādhigamatthāya pesitatto hutvā vihareyyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:833_7: Atha vā uppādavayavantatāya tāvakālikatāya vipariṇāmakoṭiyā niccapaṭikkhepatoti imehipi kāraṇehi aniccaṃ.
atk-s0302a:833_8: Dukkhanti catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhaṃ dukkhamanaṭṭhena dukkhavatthukaṭṭhena satatasampīḷanaṭṭhena sukhapaṭikkhepenāti.
atk-s0302a:833_16: Nibbindaṃ virajjatīti ettha virāgavasena cattāro maggā kathitā,
atk-s0302a:833_17: virāgā vimuccatīti ettha vimuttivasena cattāri sāmaññaphalāni.
atk-s0302a:834_0: Ettha ca pañcasu dvāresu pasādāva gahitā,
atk-s0302a:834_7: Aṭṭhame pana taṇhāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dvāre javanappattāva labbhati.
atk-s0302a:836_0: 196. Navame viññāṇadhātuvasena nāmaṃ, sesāhi rūpanti nāmarūpaṃ kathitaṃ. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:844_1: Ekādasame imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāyeti attano saviññāṇakakāyaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0302a:844_2: bahiddhā cāti parassa saviññāṇakaṃ vā aviññāṇakaṃ vā.
atk-s0302a:844_3: Purimena vā attano ca parassa ca viññāṇameva dasseti,
atk-s0302a:844_5: Ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayāti ahaṃkāradiṭṭhi ca mamaṃkārataṇhā ca mānānusayā ca.
atk-s0302a:844_6: Na hontīti ete kilesā kathaṃ jānantassa etesu vatthūsu na hontīti pucchati.
atk-s0302a:844_7: Sammappaññāya passatīti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya suṭṭhu passati.
atk-s0302a:846_1: Dvādasame ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānāpagatanti ahaṃkārato ca mamaṃkārato ca mānato ca apagataṃ.
atk-s0302a:848_3: Sakalepi pana rāhulasaṃyutte therassa vimuttiparipācanīyadhammāva kathitāti.
atk-s0302a:853_1: Lakkhaṇasaṃyutte yvāyaṃ āyasmā ca lakkhaṇoti lakkhaṇatthero vutto,
atk-s0302a:853_2: esa jaṭilasahassabbhantare ehibhikkhūpasampadāya upasampanno ādittapariyāyāvasāne arahattaṃ patto eko mahāsāvakoti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:853_3: Yasmā panesa lakkhaṇasampannena sabbākāraparipūrena brahmasamena attabhāvena samannāgato,
atk-s0302a:853_5: Mahāmoggallāno pana pabbajitadivasato sattame divase arahattaṃ patto dutiyo aggasāvako.
atk-s0302a:854_2: Kiṃ pana disvā thero sitaṃ pātvākāsīti?
atk-s0302a:854_3: Upari pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ ekaṃ petaloke nibbattaṃ sattaṃ disvā.
atk-s0302a:854_6: Pasādacakkhussa hi ete attabhāvā na āpāthaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0302a:854_7: Evarūpaṃ pana attabhāvaṃ disvā kāruññe kattabbe kasmā sitaṃ pātvākāsīti?
atk-s0302a:854_8: Attano ca buddhañāṇassa ca sampattiṃ samanussaraṇato.
atk-s0302a:854_9: Tañhi disvā thero “adiṭṭhasaccena nāma puggalena paṭilabhitabbā evarūpā attabhāvā mutto ahaṃ,
atk-s0302a:854_11: suladdhaṃ vata me”ti attano ca sampattiṃ anussaritvā –
atk-s0302a:854_17: suppaṭividdhā buddhānaṃ dhammadhātū”ti evaṃ buddhañāṇasampattiñca anussaritvā sitaṃ pātvākāsīti.
atk-s0302a:855_5: Yasmā pana khīṇāsavā nāma na akāraṇā sitaṃ karonti,
atk-s0302a:855_6: tasmā taṃ lakkhaṇatthero pucchi ko nu kho,
atk-s0302a:855_9: Thero pana yasmā yehi ayaṃ upapatti sāmaṃ adiṭṭhā,
atk-s0302a:855_11: tasmā bhagavantaṃ sakkhiṃ katvā byākātukāmatāya akālo kho,
atk-s0302a:856_1: Gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpīti etepi yakkhagijjhā ceva yakkhakākā ca yakkhakulalā ca paccetabbā.
atk-s0302a:856_2: Pākatikānaṃ pana gijjhādīnaṃ āpāthampi etaṃ rūpaṃ nāgacchati.
atk-s0302a:856_4: Vitudentīti asidhārūpamehi tikhiṇehi lohatuṇḍakehi vijjhitvā vijjhitvā ito cito ca caranti gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:856_5: Sā sudaṃ aṭṭassaraṃ karotīti ettha sudanti nipāto,
atk-s0302a:856_6: sā aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikā aṭṭassaraṃ āturassaraṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0302a:856_7: Akusalavipākānubhavanatthaṃ kira yojanappamāṇāpi tādisā attabhāvā nibbattanti,
atk-s0302a:856_9: Tasmā sā aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikā balavavedanāturā tādisaṃ saddamakāsīti.
atk-s0302a:857_0: Evañca pana vatvā puna āyasmā mahāmoggallāno “vaṭṭagāmisattā nāma evarūpā attabhāvā na muccantī”ti sattesu
atk-s0302a:857_1: kāruññaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ dhammasaṃvegaṃ dassento tassa mayhaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0302a:857_3: Tato bhagavā therassa ānubhāvaṃ pakāsento cakkhubhūtā vata,
atk-s0302a:857_6: Tattha cakkhu bhūtaṃ jātaṃ uppannaṃ etesanti cakkhubhūtā,
atk-s0302a:857_7: bhūtacakkhukā uppannacakkhukā cakkhuṃ uppādetvā viharantīti attho.
atk-s0302a:857_9: Yatra hi nāmāti ettha yatrāti kāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:857_11: yasmā nāma sāvakopi evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā karissati,
atk-s0302a:857_21: satto diṭṭhoti bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭivedhena appamāṇesu cakkavāḷesu appamāṇe sattanikāye bhavagatiyoniṭhitinivāse
atk-s0302a:857_22: ca paccakkhaṃ karontena mayā pubbeva so satto diṭṭhoti vadati.
atk-s0302a:858_0: Goghātakoti gāvo vadhitvā aṭṭhito maṃsaṃ mocetvā vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappanakasatto.
atk-s0302a:858_1: Tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesenāti tassa nānācetanāhi āyūhitassa aparāpariyakammassa.
atk-s0302a:858_2: Tatra hi yāya cetanāya narake paṭisandhi janitā,
atk-s0302a:858_3: tassā vipāke parikkhīṇe avasesakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ katvā puna petādīsu paṭisandhi nibbattati,
atk-s0302a:858_4: tasmā sā paṭisandhi kammasabhāgatāya ārammaṇasabhāgatāya vā “tasseva kammassa vipākāvaseso”ti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:858_7: Tassa kira narakā cavanakāle nimmaṃsakatānaṃ gunnaṃ aṭṭhirāsiyeva nimittaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:858_8: So paṭicchannampi taṃ kammaṃ viññūnaṃ pākaṭaṃ viya karonto aṭṭhisaṅkhalikapeto jāto. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:860_1: Maṃsapesivatthusmiṃ goghātakoti gomaṃsapesiyo katvā sukkhāpetvā vallūravikkayena anekāni vassāni jīvikaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0302a:860_2: tenassa narakā cavanakāle maṃsapesiyeva nimittaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:862_1: Maṃsapiṇḍavatthusmiṃ sākuṇikoti sakuṇe gahetvā vikkiṇanakāle nippakkhacamme maṃsapiṇḍamatte katvā vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0302a:862_2: tenassa narakā cavanakāle maṃsapiṇḍova nimittaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:864_1: Nicchavivatthusmiṃ tassa orabbhikassa eḷake vadhitvā vadhitvā niccamme katvā kappitajīvikassa purimanayeneva niccammaṃ eḷakasarīraṃ nimittaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:866_1: Asilomavatthusmiṃ so sūkariko dīgharattaṃ nivāpapuṭṭhe sūkare asinā vadhitvā vadhitvā dīgharattaṃ jīvikaṃ kappesi,
atk-s0302a:868_1: Sattilomavatthusmiṃ so māgaviko ekaṃ migañca sattiñca gahetvā vanaṃ gantvā tassa migassa samīpaṃ āgatāgate mige sattiyā vijjhitvā māresi,
atk-s0302a:870_1: Usulomavatthusmiṃ kāraṇikoti rājāparādhike anekāhi kāraṇāhi pīḷetvā avasāne kaṇḍena vijjhitvā māraṇakapuriso.
atk-s0302a:870_2: So kira “amukasmiṃ padese viddho maratī”ti ñatvāva vijjhati.
atk-s0302a:870_3: Tassevaṃ jīvikaṃ kappetvā narake uppannassa tato pakkāvasesena idhūpapattikāle usunā vijjhanabhāvoyeva nimittaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:874_4: iminā idaṃ nāma kata”nti sūcetvā sūcetvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0302a:874_5: Tasmā yathā tena sūcetvā manussā bhinnā,
atk-s0302a:874_6: tathā sūcīhi bhedanadukkhaṃ paccanubhotuṃ kammameva nimittaṃ katvā sūcilomapeto jāto. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:876_2: Tassa kammasabhāgatāya kumbhamattā mahāghaṭappamāṇā aṇḍā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:876_3: So hi yasmā raho paṭicchanne ṭhāne lañjaṃ gahetvā kūṭavinicchayena pākaṭaṃ dosaṃ karonto sāmike assāmike akāsi,
atk-s0302a:876_5: Yasmā daṇḍaṃ paṭṭhapento paresaṃ asayhaṃ bhāraṃ āropesi,
atk-s0302a:876_6: tasmāssa rahassaṃ aṅgaṃ asayhabhāro hutvā nibbattaṃ.
atk-s0302a:876_7: Yasmā yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitena samena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:876_9: tasmāssa rahassaṅge visamā nisajjāva ahosīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:880_1: Pāradārikavatthusmiṃ so satto parassa rakkhitagopitaṃ sassāmikaṃ phassaṃ phusanto mīḷhasukhena kāmasukhena
atk-s0302a:880_2: cittaṃ ramayitvā kammasabhāgatāya gūthaphassaṃ phusanto dukkhamanubhavituṃ tattha nibbatto. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:884_1: Nicchavitthivatthusmiṃ yasmā mātugāmo nāma attano phasse anissaro,
atk-s0302a:884_2: sā ca taṃ sāmikassa santakaṃ phassaṃ thenetvā paresaṃ abhiratiṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0302a:884_3: tasmā kammasabhāgatāya sukhasamphassā vaṭṭitvā dukkhasamphassaṃ anubhavituṃ nicchavitthī hutvā uppannā. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:886_2: Sā kira yakkhadāsikammaṃ karontī “iminā ca iminā ca evaṃ balikamme kate ayaṃ nāma tumhākaṃ vaḍḍhi bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0302a:886_3: mahājanassa gandhapupphādīni vañcanāya gahetvā mahājanaṃ duddiṭṭhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāpesi,
atk-s0302a:886_4: tasmā tāya kammasabhāgatāya gandhapupphādīnaṃ thenitattā duggandhā,
atk-s0302a:886_5: duddassanassa gāhitattā duddasikā virūpā bībhacchā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0302a:888_1: Okilinīvatthusmiṃ uppakkaṃ okiliniṃ okirininti sā kira aṅgāracitake nipannā vipphandamānā viparivattamānā paccati,
atk-s0302a:888_2: tasmā uppakkā ceva hoti uṇhena agginā pakkasarīrā,
atk-s0302a:888_11: Sā issāpakatā sapattiṃ aṅgārakaṭāhena okirīti tassa kira rañño ekā nāṭakinī aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ samīpe ṭhapetvā gattato udakaṃ puñchati,
atk-s0302a:888_15: Aggamahesī taṃ asahamānā issāpakatā hutvā acirapakkantassa rañño taṃ aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ gahetvā tassā upari aṅgāre okiri.
atk-s0302a:888_16: Sā taṃ kammaṃ katvā tādisaṃyeva vipākaṃ paccanubhavituṃ petaloke nibbattā. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:890_1: Coraghātavatthusmiṃ so rañño āṇāya dīgharattaṃ corānaṃ sīsāni chinditvā petaloke nibbattanto asīsakaṃ kabandhaṃ hutvā nibbatti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:892_2: So kira lokassa saddhādeyye cattāro paccaye paribhuñjitvā kāyavacīdvārehi asaṃyato bhinnājīvo cittakeḷiṃ kīḷanto vicari.
atk-s0302a:892_3: Tato ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā petaloke nibbattanto bhikkhusadiseneva attabhāvena nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:896_5: Appamattāti satiyā avippavāse ṭhitā hutvā. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:898_1: Dutiye manussesu paccājāyantīti ye manussalokato cutā manussesu jāyanti,
atk-s0302a:898_3: Aññatra manussehīti ye pana manussalokato cutā ṭhapetvā manussalokaṃ catūsu apāyesu paccājāyanti,
atk-s0302a:900_2: Kumbhatthenakehīti ye paragharaṃ pavisitvā dīpālokena oloketvā parabhaṇḍaṃ haritukāmā ghaṭe dīpaṃ katvā pavisanti,
atk-s0302a:900_5: Suppadhaṃsiyo hoti amanussehīti mettābhāvanārahitaṃ paṃsupisācakā vidhaṃsayanti,
atk-s0302a:902_2: Dānaṃ dadeyyāti paṇītabhojanabharitānaṃ mahāukkhalīnaṃ sataṃ dānaṃ dadeyya.
atk-s0302a:902_5: Ekāya pana dīpikāya yattake ṭhāne āloko hoti,
atk-s0302a:902_6: tato sataguṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ sattahi ratanehi pūretvā dānaṃ dadeyyāti attho.
atk-s0302a:902_10: dvīhi aṅgulīhi gandhapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā ekavāraṃ ghāyanamattanti attho.
atk-s0302a:902_11: Ettakampi hi kālaṃ yo pana gabbhapariveṇavihārūpacāra paricchedena vā cakkavāḷaparicchedena vā aparimāṇāsu
atk-s0302a:902_12: lokadhātūsu vā sabbasattesu hitapharaṇaṃ mettacittaṃ bhāvetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:902_13: idaṃ tato ekadivasaṃ tikkhattuṃ dinnadānato mahapphalataraṃ.
atk-s0302a:904_1: Pañcame paṭileṇissāmītiādīsu agge paharitvā kappāsavaṭṭiṃ viya nāmento niyyāsavaṭṭiṃ viya ca ekato katvā alliyāpento paṭileṇeti nāma.
atk-s0302a:904_2: Majjhe paharitvā nāmetvā dhārāya vā paharitvā dvepi dhārā ekato alliyāpento paṭikoṭṭeti nāma.
atk-s0302a:904_3: Kappāsavaṭṭanakaraṇīyaṃ viya pavattento cirakālaṃ saṃvellitakilañjaṃ pasāretvā puna saṃvellento viya ca paṭivaṭṭeti nāma. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:906_3: dvisahassathāmaṃ nāma yassa āropitassa jiyābaddho lohasīsādīnaṃ bhāro daṇḍe gahetvā yāva kaṇḍappamāṇā ukkhittassa pathavito muccati.
atk-s0302a:907_0: Tassa purisassa javoti evarūpo añño puriso nāma na bhūtapubbo,
atk-s0302a:907_7: na sakkhissatha tumhe tena saddhiṃ javitu”nti.
atk-s0302a:907_8: Te dutiyaṃ tatiyampi tatheva vatvā ekadivasaṃ “gacchāmā”ti yugandharapabbataṃ āruhitvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:907_12: “vinassissanti tapassino”ti te anukampamāno sayampi gantvā tesaṃ santike nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:907_13: Atha sūriye uggacchante dvepi bhātaro sūriyena saddhiṃyeva ākāsaṃ pakkhantā,
atk-s0302a:907_15: Tesu ekassa apatteyeva antarabhattasamaye pakkhantaresu aggi uṭṭhahi,
atk-s0302a:907_17: Tamenaṃ bodhisatto “mā bhāyī”ti samassāsetvā pakkhapañjarena paliveṭhetvā darathaṃ vinodetvā “gacchā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0302a:908_0: Dutiyo yāva antarabhattā javitvā pakkhantaresu aggimhi uṭṭhahite tathevāha.
atk-s0302a:908_3: “ete bālāti mayāpi bālena na bhavitabba”nti nivattitvā –
atk-s0302a:908_5: Tasmiṃ nagaramatthake paribbhamante dvādasayojanaṃ nagaraṃ pattakaṭāhena otthaṭapatto viya ahosi.
atk-s0302a:908_6: Atha paribbhamantassa paribbhamantassa tattha tattha chiddāni paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:908_10: “āgato kira me piyasahāyo javanahaṃso”ti vātapānaṃ vivaritvā ratanapīṭhaṃ paññāpetvā olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:909_0: Athassa rājā sahassapākena telena pakkhantarāni makkhetvā,
atk-s0302a:909_8: tumhākaṃ sūriyena saddhiṃ javanavegaṃ passitukāmo”ti. Dukkaraṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0302a:909_9: na sakkā tayā passitunti. Tena hi, sāmi,
atk-s0302a:909_13: Haṃso tato cattāro gahetvā nagaramajjhe toraṇaṃ kāretvā attano gīvāya ghaṇḍaṃ piḷandhāpetvā toraṇassa upari nisīditvā –
atk-s0302a:909_14: “cattāro janā toraṇaṃ nissāya catudisābhimukhā ekekaṃ kaṇḍaṃ khipantū”ti vatvā,
atk-s0302a:909_21: Atha naṃ cattāri kaṇḍāni gahetvā toraṇe nisinnakāleyeva addasaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:909_24: Evaṃ bodhisatteneva javanahaṃsakāle tāni kaṇḍāni āharitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0302a:910_7: vegena pana gantvā puna puratova dhāvanti.
atk-s0302a:910_10: Arūpadhammānaṃ pana bhedo na sakkā paññāpetuṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:912_6: Tattha mahanto kuḷīro otiṇṇotiṇṇaṃ hatthiṃ khādati.
atk-s0302a:912_7: Atha hatthī upaddutā ekaṃ kareṇuṃ sakkariṃsu “imissā puttaṃ nissāya amhākaṃ sotthi bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:912_14: Etha gacchāmā”ti mahāhatthiparivāro tattha gantvā paṭhamameva otari.
atk-s0302a:912_17: so taṃ ito vā etto vā cāletuṃ asakkonto mukhe soṇḍaṃ pakkhipitvā viravi.
atk-s0302a:912_19: so paṭhamataraṃ gahito”ti tato tato palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:913_2: nāgehi nāgo na viheṭhetabbo”ti kuḷīraṃ piyavacanena vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0302a:915_0: Tesaṃ tvaṃ vārijo seṭṭho, muñca rodantiyā paja”nti.
atk-s0302a:916_2: Hatthipoto vegena ubho pāde ukkhipitvā taṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ akkami.
atk-s0302a:916_3: Saha akkamanā piṭṭhi mattikabhājanaṃ viya bhijji.
atk-s0302a:916_4: Atha naṃ dantehi vijjhitvā ukkhipitvā thale chaḍḍetvā tuṭṭharavaṃ ravi.
atk-s0302a:916_5: Atha naṃ hatthī ito cito ca āgantvā maddiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:917_0: Itaro pana aḷo vātātapena sukkhitvā pakkalākhārasavaṇṇo ahosi,
atk-s0302a:917_1: so deve vuṭṭhe udakoghena vuyhanto dasabhātikānaṃ rājūnaṃ uparisote jālaṃ pasārāpetvā gaṅgāya kīḷantānaṃ āgantvā jāle laggi.
atk-s0302a:917_2: Te kīḷāpariyosāne jālamhi ukkhipiyamāne taṃ disvā pucchiṃsu “kiṃ eta”nti?
atk-s0302a:917_11: Tasmiṃ vādite mahājano anhāyitvā apiḷandhitvā hatthiyānādīni āruyha sīghaṃ sannipatanti.
atk-s0302a:917_12: Iti mahājanaṃ pakkositvā viya ānetīti ānako tvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:918_0: Aññaṃ āṇiṃ odahiṃsūti aññaṃ suvaṇṇarajatādimayaṃ āṇiṃ ghaṭayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:918_1: Āṇisaṅghāṭova avasissīti suvaṇṇādimayānaṃ āṇīnaṃ saṅghāṭamattameva avasesaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:918_2: Athassa dvādasayojanappamāṇo saddo antosālāyampi dukkhena suyyittha.
atk-s0302a:919_4: Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbanti uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe ca.
atk-s0302a:919_11: Sussūsissantīti akkharacittatāya ceva savanasampattiyā ca attamanā hutvā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhumātugāmamahāgahapatikādayo
atk-s0302a:919_13: Tasmāti yasmā tathāgatabhāsitā suttantā anuggayhamānā antaradhāyanti, tasmā. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:921_1: Aṭṭhame kaliṅgarūpadhānāti kaliṅgaraghaṭikaṃ sīsūpadhānañceva pādūpadhānañca katvā.
atk-s0302a:921_5: Te kira tadā pātova uṭṭhāya sippasālaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0302a:921_6: tattha sippaṃ uggahetvā sajjhāyādīhi abhiyogaṃ katvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā yāgupānāya gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:921_7: Yāguṃ pivitvā puna sippasālaṃ gantvā sippaṃ gaṇhitvā sajjhāyaṃ karontā pātarāsāya gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:921_8: Katapātarāsā samānā “mā pamādena ciraṃ niddokkamanaṃ ahosī”ti khadiraghaṭikāsu sīse ca pāde ca upadahitvā
atk-s0302a:921_9: thokaṃ nipajjitvā puna sippasālaṃ gantvā sippaṃ gahetvā sajjhāyanti.
atk-s0302a:921_10: Sāyaṃ sajjhāyaṃ karontā ca gehaṃ gantvā bhuttasāyamāsā paṭhamayāmaṃ sajjhāyaṃ katvā sayanakāle tatheva kaliṅgaraṃ upadhānaṃ katvā sayanti.
atk-s0302a:921_11: Evaṃ te akkhaṇavedhino vālavedhino ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:922_3: Paṭhamabodhiyaṃ kira bhikkhū bhattakiccaṃ katvāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karonti.
atk-s0302a:922_5: Te nhāyitvā puna caṅkamaṃ otaritvā paṭhamayāmaṃ caṅkamanti.
atk-s0302a:922_6: Tato “mā ciraṃ niddāyimhā”ti sarīradarathavinodanatthaṃ nipajjantā kaṭṭhakhaṇḍaṃ upadahitvā nipajjanti,
atk-s0302a:922_7: te puna pacchimayāme vuṭṭhāya caṅkamaṃ otaranti.
atk-s0302a:922_9: Ayampi dīpo tiṇṇaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle ekaghaṇḍinigghoso ekapadhānabhūmi ahosi.
atk-s0302a:922_13: ayaṃ puthujjano”ti aṅguliṃ pasāretvā dassetabbo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:922_15: Tasmāti yasmā kaliṅgarūpadhānānaṃ māro ārammaṇaṃ na labhati, tasmā. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:924_1: Navame ativelanti atikkantavelaṃ kālaṃ atikkantappamāṇaṃ kālaṃ.
atk-s0302a:924_2: Kimaṅgaṃ panāhanti ahaṃ pana kiṃkāraṇā na upasaṅkamissāmi?
atk-s0302a:924_10: Dhammaṃ bhāsantīti ekaṃ dve jātakāni vā suttante vā uggaṇhitvā asambhinnena sarena dhammaṃ desenti.
atk-s0302a:924_11: Pasannākāraṃ karontīti tesaṃ tāya desanāya pasannā gihī paccaye denti.
atk-s0302a:924_12: Neva vaṇṇāya hoti na balāyāti neva guṇavaṇṇāya,
atk-s0302a:924_14: guṇavaṇṇe pana parihāyante sarīravaṇṇopi sarīrabalampi parihāyati,
atk-s0302a:924_15: tasmā sarīrassa neva vaṇṇāya na balāya hoti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:926_1: Dasame sandhisamalasaṃkaṭīreti ettha sandhīti bhinnagharānaṃ sandhi,
atk-s0302a:928_1: Ekādasame yena yena icchatīti so jarasiṅgālo icchiticchitaṭṭhāne iriyāpathakappanena sītavātūpavāyanena
atk-s0302a:928_4: So hi ettakampi cittassādaṃ anāgate attabhāve na labhissatīti.
atk-s0302a:930_5: Tesaṃ sabbakaniṭṭho khettapariyante ṭhatvā gāvo rakkhati.
atk-s0302a:930_7: so taṃ disvā yaṭṭhiyā pothetvā vissajjāpesi.
atk-s0302a:930_11: ahampi imassa dassāmī”ti yāgughaṭassa upari ṭhapitaṃ vāsiṃ mukhena ḍaṃsitvā tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:930_14: So tehi diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā vāsiṃ tassa santike chaḍḍetvā palāyi.
atk-s0302a:930_15: Itare āgantvā kaniṭṭhaṃ ajagarena gahitaṃ disvā vāsiyā ajagaraṃ chinditvā taṃ gahetvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:930_16: Evaṃ jarasiṅgāle siyā yā kāci kataññutā kataveditā.
atk-s0302a:930_17: Sakyaputtiyapaṭiññeti idampi devadattassa ācārameva sandhāya vuttanti.
atk-s0302a:934_11: Ayaṃ vuccatīti yasmā dutiyajjhāne vitakkavicārā nirujjhanti,
atk-s0302a:934_16: “Dhammī vā kathā ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo”ti ettha pana kammaṭṭhānamanasikāropi paṭhamajjhānādīnipi ariyo tuṇhībhāvotveva saṅkhaṃ gatāni.
atk-s0302a:935_4: Athassa tato vuṭṭhitassa vitakkavicārā na santato upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:935_11: Satthā kira iminā upāyena satta divase therassa hānabhāgiyaṃ samādhiṃ vaḍḍhetvā theraṃ chaḷabhiññataṃ pāpesi. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:937_1: Dutiye atthi nu kho taṃ kiñci lokasminti idaṃ atiuḷārampi sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:937_2: Satthupi khoti idaṃ yasmā ānandattherassa satthari adhimatto chando ca pemañca,
atk-s0302a:937_3: tasmā “kiṃ nu kho imassa therassa satthu vipariṇāmenapi sokādayo nuppajjeyyu”nti jānanatthaṃ pucchati?
atk-s0302a:937_4: Dīgharattanti sūkarakhataleṇadvāre dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasuttantaṃ desitadivasato paṭṭhāya atikkantakālaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0302a:937_5: Tasmiñhi divase therassa ime vaṭṭānugatakilesā samūhatāti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:939_2: Tadā kira bahū āgantukā bhikkhū sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:939_3: Tasmiṃ pariveṇaggena vā vihāraggena vā senāsanesu apāpuṇantesu dvinnaṃ therānaṃ eko gabbho sampatto.
atk-s0302a:939_5: rattiṃ pana nesaṃ antare cīvarasāṇiṃ pasārenti.
atk-s0302a:939_11: Iti dibbacakkhunā rūpassa diṭṭhattā dibbāya ca sotadhātuyā saddassa sutattā so vihāro oḷāriko nāma jāto.
atk-s0302a:939_12: Dibbacakkhu visujjhīti bhagavato rūpadassanatthāya visuddhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:939_13: Dibbā ca sotadhātūti sāpi bhagavato saddasuṇanatthaṃ visujjhi.
atk-s0302a:939_14: Bhagavatopi therassa rūpadassanatthañceva saddasuṇanatthañca tadubhayaṃ visujjhi.
atk-s0302a:939_15: Tadā kira thero “kathaṃ nu kho etarahi satthā viharatī”ti ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā satthāraṃ
atk-s0302a:939_16: jetavane vihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā tassa dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇi.
atk-s0302a:940_1: Yāvadeva upanikkhepanamattāyāti tiyojanasahassavitthārassa himavato santike ṭhapitā sāsapamattā pāsāṇasakkharā “himavā nu kho mahā,
atk-s0302a:940_2: ayaṃ nu kho pāsāṇasakkharā”ti evaṃ yāva upanikkhepanamattasseva atthāya bhaveyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:940_5: Loṇaghaṭāyāti cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyā ādhārakaṃ katvā mukhavaṭṭiyā brahmalokaṃ āhacca ṭhitāya loṇacāṭiyāti dasseti.
atk-s0302a:941_0: Ime pana therā upamaṃ āharantā sarikkhakeneva ca vijjamānaguṇena ca āhariṃsu. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:941_1: Ayañhi iddhi nāma accuggataṭṭhena ceva vipulaṭṭhena ca himavantasadisā,
atk-s0302a:941_2: paññā catubhūmakadhamme anupavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhena sabbabyañjanesu anupaviṭṭhaloṇarasasadisā.
atk-s0302a:941_8: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti ayameva etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:941_13: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti ayameva etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:941_14: Tasmā yathā ete aññamaññassa dhuraṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0302a:943_6: Akicchalābhīti jhānapāripanthike sukhena vikkhambhetvā samāpajjanasamatthatāya adukkhalābhī.
atk-s0302a:947_6: bhaddiyā”ti tattha tattha parāmasitvā nānappakāraṃ kīḷanti ākaḍḍhanti parikaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0302a:947_9: Ayaṃ kira atīte eko mahārājā ahosi,
atk-s0302a:947_10: tassa mahallakā ca mahallakitthiyo ca paṭikūlā honti.
atk-s0302a:947_12: tesaṃ cūḷaṃ ṭhapāpetvā kacchaṃ bandhāpetvā yathāruci kīḷāpeti.
atk-s0302a:947_13: Mahallakitthiyopi disvā tāsampi icchiticchitaṃ vippakāraṃ katvā yathāruci kīḷāpeti.
atk-s0302a:947_15: Tassa pāpakiriyā pathavito paṭṭhāya chadevaloke ekakolāhalaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0302a:948_3: So mahallakagāmiyavaṇṇaṃ katvā yānake ekaṃ takkacāṭiṃ āropetvā yānaṃ pesento nagaraṃ pavisati.
atk-s0302a:948_4: Rājāpi hatthiṃ āruyha nagarato nikkhanto taṃ disvā –
atk-s0302a:948_7: Manussā ito cito ca pakkhandantāpi na passanti.
atk-s0302a:948_11: kahaṃ devā”ti vadantesu eva rājā saha hatthinā vaccho viya dhenuyā yānassa heṭṭhā pāvisi.
atk-s0302a:949_0: Rājā sīsato paṭṭhāya takkena kilinnasarīro ahosi.
atk-s0302a:949_1: So sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭāpetvā uyyānapokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā alaṅkatasarīro nagaraṃ pavisanto puna taṃ addasa.
atk-s0302a:949_2: Disvā “ayaṃ so amhehi diṭṭhamahallako puna dissati.
atk-s0302a:949_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko goṇe ca yānañca antaradhāpetvā ākāse ṭhatvā āha,
atk-s0302a:949_9: tvaṃ mayi takkavāṇijako eso”ti saññaṃ karosi,
atk-s0302a:950_0: Vipassīsammāsambuddhakāle panesa cittapattakokilo nāma hutvā kheme migadāye vasanto ekadivasaṃ himavantaṃ
atk-s0302a:950_1: gantvā madhuraṃ ambaphalaṃ tuṇḍena gahetvā āgacchanto bhikkhusaṅghaparivāraṃ satthāraṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0302a:950_3: Ajja pana me imaṃ ambapakkaṃ atthi,
atk-s0302a:950_4: dasabalassa taṃ dassāmī”ti otaritvā ākāse carati.
atk-s0302a:950_5: Satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā upaṭṭhākaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0302a:950_6: So pattaṃ nīharitvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā satthu hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:950_9: Kokilo pasannacitto punappunaṃ dasabalassa guṇe āvajjetvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā attano kulāvakaṃ gantvā sattāhaṃ pītisukheneva vītināmesi.
atk-s0302a:951_10: anāgate sukhapaṭijaggitaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā rajjuṃ ādāya parikkhipanto gāvutamattake ṭhatvā,
atk-s0302a:952_0: Hatthayo pasadā migāti hatthino ca pasadamigā ca.
atk-s0302a:952_1: Natthi kāyasmiṃ tulyatāti kāyasmiṃ pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0302a:954_1: Sattame poriyā vācāyāti puravāsīnaṃ nagaramanussānaṃ vācāsadisāya aparihīnakkharapadāya madhuravācāya.
atk-s0302a:954_4: Anelagalāyāti yathā dandhamanussā mukhena kheḷaṃ gaḷantena vācaṃ bhāsanti,
atk-s0302a:954_7: Pariyāpannāyāti catusaccapariyāpannāya cattāri saccāni amuñcitvā pavattāya.
atk-s0302a:954_9: Dhammo hi isinaṃ dhajoti navavidhalokuttaradhammo isīnaṃ dhajo nāmāti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:956_1: Aṭṭhame ākoṭitapaccākoṭitānīti ekasmiṃ passe pāṇinā vā muggarena vā ākoṭanena ākoṭitāni,
atk-s0302a:956_7: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “sace satthā ‘sobhati vata me ayaṃ kaniṭṭhabhātiko’ti vakkhati,
atk-s0302a:956_10: imaṃ ākāraṃ pahāya saṅkāracoḷaṃ gahetvā cīvaraṃ katvā dhārento pariyantasenāsane vasanto carissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:957_0: Aññātuñchenāti abhilakkhitesu issarajanagehesu kaṭukabhaṇḍasambhāraṃ sugandhaṃ bhojanaṃ pariyesantassa uñcho ñātuñcho nāma.
atk-s0302a:957_1: Gharapaṭipāṭiyā pana dvāre ṭhitena laddhaṃ missakabhojanaṃ aññātuñcho nāma.
atk-s0302a:957_5: Kāmesu ca anapekkhoti idaṃ suttaṃ devaloke accharāyo dassetvā āgatena aparabhāge kathitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:957_6: Imassa kathitadivasato paṭṭhāya thero ghaṭento vāyamanto katipāheneva arahatte patiṭṭhāya sadevake loke aggadakkhiṇeyyo jāto. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:959_2: Kasmā panāyaṃ evaṃ dukkhī dummano jātoti?
atk-s0302a:959_4: tena naṃ pabbājetvā dupaṭṭasāṭakaṃ nivāsāpetvā varacīvaraṃ pārupetvā akkhīni añjetvā manosilātelena sīsaṃ makkhesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:959_5: So bhikkhūsu rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ gatesu “bhikkhunā nāma vivittokāse nisīditabba”nti ajānanto bhojanasālaṃ gantvā mahāpīṭhaṃ āruhitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:959_7: “imināva nīhārena rajokiṇṇehi gattehi na sakkā dasabalaṃ passituṃ.
atk-s0302a:959_9: So tesu mahātheresu āgacchantesu niccalo nisīdiyeva.
atk-s0302a:959_20: tvaṃ nāma ettakesu vuḍḍhataresu vattaṃ āpucchantesu nissaddo niccalo nisinno,
atk-s0302a:959_23: Parivāretvā taṃ vācāsattīhi paharantā “kiṃ tvaṃ iṇaṭṭo vā bhayaṭṭo vā jīvituṃ asakkonto pabbajito”ti? Āhaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:959_27: tenapi tatheva vutte athassa “ime maṃ parivāretvā vācāsattīhi vijjhantī”ti khattiyamāno uppajji.
atk-s0302a:959_33: “sadevake loke aggapuggalassa satthu santikaṃ āgatamhā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:959_35: yadi evaṃ idāni vo āgatamaggeneva gamanaṃ karissāmī”ti kujjhitvā nikkhanto antarāmagge cintesi –
atk-s0302a:959_36: “mayi imināva nīhārena gate satthā ete na nīharāpessatī”ti dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:960_4: No ca vacanakkhamoti paresaṃ vacanaṃ khamituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0302a:960_5: Idāni tāva tvaṃ iminā kopena iminā vuttavācāsannitodakena viddho.
atk-s0302a:961_3: eko mātaṅgoti dve isayo bārāṇasiṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:961_4: Tesu jātimā puretaraṃ gantvā kumbhakārasālāyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:961_5: Mātaṅgo tāpaso pacchā gantvā tattha okāsaṃ yāci kumbhakāro “atthettha paṭhamataraṃ paviṭṭho pabbajito,
atk-s0302a:961_7: So attano parikkhāraṃ gahetvā sālāya dvāramūle ṭhatvā,
atk-s0302a:961_8: “amhākampi ācariya ekarattivāsāya okāsaṃ dethā”ti āha. “Pavisa, bho”ti.
atk-s0302a:961_14: So ca tattheva tiṇasanthārakaṃ pattharitvā nipajji,
atk-s0302a:961_16: Itaro passāvatthāya nikkhamanto taṃ urasmiṃ akkami.
atk-s0302a:961_27: pādasamīpena gamissāmī”ti pavisanto puna urasmiṃyeva akkami.
atk-s0302a:961_32: sūriye te uggacchante sattadhā muddhā phalatū”ti sapi.
atk-s0302a:961_33: Mahāpuriso kiñci avatvā purearuṇeyeva sūriyaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0302a:962_5: Te parivīmaṃsantā kumbhakārasālāyaṃ dve tāpase disvā,
atk-s0302a:962_6: “imesaṃ etaṃ kammaṃ bhavissatī”ti gantvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:962_7: Raññā ca “pucchatha ne”ti vuttā āgantvā jātimantaṃ pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0302a:962_26: Itaro “mādiso jātimā kiṃ evarūpaṃ caṇḍālaṃ khamāpessati?
atk-s0302a:963_0: Atha naṃ manussā “na kiṃ tvaṃ attano ruciyā khamāpessasī”ti?
atk-s0302a:963_1: Vatvā hatthesu ca pādesu ca gahetvā pādamūle nipajjāpetvā “khamāpehī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:963_6: Mahāpuriso “ahaṃ tāva tuyhaṃ khamitvā sūriyaṃ vissajjessāmi,
atk-s0302a:963_7: sūriye pana uggate tava sīsaṃ sattadhā phalissatī”ti vatvā,
atk-s0302a:963_8: “imassa sīsappamāṇaṃ mattikāpiṇḍaṃ matthake ṭhapetvā etaṃ nadiyā galappamāṇe udake ṭhapethā”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:963_14: Tāvadeva so nimujjitvā ekena titthena uttaritvā palāyi.
atk-s0302a:963_16: “idāni tāva tvaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike paribhāsaṃ labhasi,
atk-s0302a:963_17: pubbepi imaṃ kodhaṃ nissāya raṭṭhato pabbājito”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā atha naṃ ovadanto na kho te taṃ tissa patirūpantiādimāha. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:965_2: Yaṃ atītaṃ taṃ pahīnanti atīte khandhapañcake chandarāgappahānena taṃ pahīnaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:965_3: Anāgatanti anāgatampi khandhapañcakaṃ tattha chandarāgapaṭinissaggena paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:965_4: Sabbābhibhunti sabbā khandhāyatanadhātuyo ca tayo bhave ca abhibhavitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:965_5: Sabbavidunti taṃ vuttappakāraṃ sabbaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:965_6: Sabbesu dhammesūti tesveva dhammesu taṇhādiṭṭhilepehi anupalittaṃ.
atk-s0302a:965_7: Sabbañjahanti tadeva sabbaṃ tattha chandarāgappahānena jahitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:965_8: Taṇhakkhaye vimuttanti taṇhakkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne tadārammaṇāya vimuttiyā vimuttaṃ. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:967_1: Ekādasame mahākappinoti evaṃnāmako abhiññābalappatto asītimahāsāvakānaṃ abbhantaro mahāthero.
atk-s0302a:967_2: So kira gihikāle kukkuṭavatīnagare tiyojanasatikaṃ rajjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0302a:967_3: Pacchimabhavikattā pana tathārūpaṃ sāsanaṃ sotuṃ ohitasoto vicarati.
atk-s0302a:967_5: Tadā ca majjhimadesato jaṅghavāṇijā taṃ nagaraṃ gantvā,
atk-s0302a:967_12: Atha rañño nivedite rājā pakkosāpetvā niyyātitapaṇṇākāre vanditvā ṭhite, “tātā,
atk-s0302a:967_17: “Atthi pana tumhākaṃ dese kiñci sāsana”nti? “Atthi, deva,
atk-s0302a:967_20: Te mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā dasabalābhimukhā añjaliṃ paggaṇhitvā, “deva,
atk-s0302a:967_21: amhākaṃ dese buddharatanaṃ nāma uppanna”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:967_22: Rañño “buddho”ti vacane sutamatte sakalasarīraṃ pharamānā pīti uppajji.
atk-s0302a:967_28: nāssa sakkā parimāṇaṃ kātu”nti tasmiṃyeva pasanno satasahassaṃ datvā puna “aññaṃ kiṃ sāsana”nti? Pucchi.
atk-s0302a:967_30: Tampi sutvā tatheva tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā aparampi satasahassaṃ datvā puna “aññaṃ kiṃ sāsana”nti? Pucchi.
atk-s0302a:967_32: Tampi sutvā tatheva tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā aparampi satasahassaṃ datvā dinnabhāvaṃ paṇṇe likhitvā, “tātā,
atk-s0302a:967_40: Te sabbepi gharaṃ vā kuṭumbaṃ vā anapaloketvā ye asse āruyha gatā,
atk-s0302a:968_0: Vāṇijā anojādeviyā santikaṃ gantvā paṇṇaṃ dassesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:968_1: Sā vācetvā “raññā tumhākaṃ bahū kahāpaṇā dinnā,
atk-s0302a:968_9: Te mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā rañño ārocitanayeneva ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:968_10: Sāpi sutvā uppannapāmojjā teneva nayena ekekasmiṃ pade tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā paṭiññāgaṇanāya tīṇi tīṇi katvā navasatasahassāni adāsi.
atk-s0302a:968_14: tumhe gacchathā”ti te uyyojetvā raññā saddhiṃ gatānaṃ amaccānaṃ mātugāme pakkosāpetvā,
atk-s0302a:968_15: “tumhe attano sāmikānaṃ gataṭṭhānaṃ jānātha ammā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0302a:968_17: raññā saddhiṃ uyyānakīḷikaṃ gatā”ti. Āma gatā,
atk-s0302a:968_28: mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti sabbā rathe yojāpetvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:969_0: Rājāpi amaccasahassena saddhiṃ gaṅgāya tīraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0302a:969_4: amhehi saddhiṃ āgatā dāsā vā manussā vā natthi,
atk-s0302a:969_5: ye no nāvaṃ vā uḷumpaṃ vā katvā dadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0302a:969_6: etassa pana satthu guṇā nāma heṭṭhā avīcito upari yāva bhavaggā patthaṭā,
atk-s0302a:969_8: imesaṃ assānaṃ khurapiṭṭhāni mā tementū”ti udakapiṭṭhena asse pakkhandāpesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:969_10: rājamaggena gacchantā viya paratīraṃ patvā purato aññaṃ mahānadiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:969_12: tāya eva saccakiriyāya tampi aḍḍhayojanavitthāraṃ nadiṃ atikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:969_13: Atha tatiyaṃ candabhāgaṃ nāma mahānadiṃ patvā tampi tāya eva saccakiriyāya atikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:970_0: Satthāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ olokento “ajja mahākappino tiyojanasatikaṃ
atk-s0302a:970_1: rajjaṃ pahāya amaccasahassaparivāro mama santike pabbajituṃ āgacchatī”ti disvā,
atk-s0302a:970_2: “mayā tesaṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātuṃ yutta”nti pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā,
atk-s0302a:970_5: ākāse uppatitvā candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre tesaṃ uttaraṇatitthassa abhimukhe ṭhāne mahānigrodharukkho atthi,
atk-s0302a:970_6: tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjesi.
atk-s0302a:970_7: Te tena titthena uttarantā ca chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo ito cito ca vidhāvantiyo olokentā dasabalassa puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ mukhaṃ disvā,
atk-s0302a:970_9: addhā so eso”ti dassaneneva niṭṭhaṃ gantvā diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya onatā vandamānā āgamma satthāraṃ vandiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:970_10: Rājā gopphakesu gahetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena.
atk-s0302a:970_12: Desanāpariyosāne sabbe arahatte patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0302a:970_13: Satthā “pubbe ime cīvaradānassa dinnattā attano cīvarāni gahetvāva āgatā”ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā,
atk-s0302a:970_15: caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:970_16: Sāva tesaṃ āyasmantānaṃ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi,
atk-s0302a:971_0: Anojāpi devī rathasahassaparivārā gaṅgātīraṃ patvā rañño atthāya ābhataṃ nāvaṃ vā uḷumpaṃ vā adisvā attano byattatāya cintesi –
atk-s0302a:971_2: so pana satthā na kevalaṃ tesaṃyeva atthāya nibbatto,
atk-s0302a:971_4: amhākaṃ rathā mā udake nimujjiṃsū”ti udakapiṭṭhe rathe pakkhandāpesi.
atk-s0302a:971_6: Dutiyatatiyanadīpi teneva saccakārena uttaramānāyeva nigrodharukkhamūle satthāraṃ addasa.
atk-s0302a:971_7: Satthā “imāsaṃ attano sāmike passantīnaṃ chandarāgo uppajjitvā maggaphalānaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0302a:971_8: so evaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti yathā aññamaññe na passanti,
atk-s0302a:971_10: Tā sabbāpi titthato uttaritvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:971_12: desanāpariyosāne sabbāpi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aññamaññe passiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:971_14: Therī āgantvā sabbā pabbājetvā ādāya bhikkhunīnaṃ upassayaṃ gatā.
atk-s0302a:971_15: Satthā bhikkhusahassaṃ gahetvā ākāsena jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:971_17: “mahākappinoti evaṃ nāmako abhiññābalappatto asītimahāsāvakānaṃ abbhantaro mahāthero”ti.
atk-s0302a:972_1: Ye gottapaṭisārinoti ye “mayaṃ vāseṭṭhā gotamā”ti gottaṃ paṭisaranti paṭijānanti,
atk-s0302a:972_3: Vijjācaraṇasampannoti aṭṭhahi vijjāhi ceva pannarasadhammabhedena caraṇena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0302a:972_5: Jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇoti khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo duvidhena jhānena jhāyamāno tapati virocati.
atk-s0302a:972_6: Tasmiṃ pana khaṇe kāludāyitthero duvidhena jhānena jhāyamāno avidūre nisinno hoti.
atk-s0302a:972_9: Bhātikarājā kira ekaṃ pūjaṃ kāretvā ācariyakaṃ āha –
atk-s0302a:972_11: So tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā imaṃ gāthaṃ vadanto “divā tapati ādicco”ti vatvā atthaṅgamentassa sūriyassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:972_16: “Buddho tapati tejasā”ti vatvā pana mahācetiyassa añjaliṃ paggaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:972_17: Atha naṃ rājā “mā hatthaṃ otārehī”ti ukkhittasmiṃyeva hatthe sahassaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:974_1: Dvādasame cirarattaṃsametikāti dīgharattaṃ saṃsanditvā sametvā ṭhitaladdhino.
atk-s0302a:974_3: Sameti nesaṃ saddhammoti idāni imesaṃ ayaṃ sāsanadhammo saṃsandati sameti.
atk-s0302a:974_4: Dhamme buddhappavediteti buddhena pavedite dhamme etesaṃ sāsanadhammo sobhatīti attho.
atk-s0302a:974_5: Suvinītā kappinenāti attano upajjhāyena ariyappavedite dhamme suṭṭhu vinītā.
